243// used

251#endif

295namespace httplib {

297namespace detail {
298
299/*
300 * Backport std::make_unique from C++14.
301 *
302 * NOTE: This code came up with the following stackoverflow post:
303 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10149840/c-arrays-and-make-unique
304 *
305 */
306
307template <class T, class... Args>
308typename std::enable_if<!std::is_array<T>::value, std::unique_ptr<T>>::type
309make_unique(Args &&...args) {
310 return std::unique_ptr<T>(new T(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
311}
312
313template <class T>
314typename std::enable_if<std::is_array<T>::value, std::unique_ptr<T>>::type
315make_unique(std::size_t n) {
316 typedef typename std::remove_extent<T>::type RT;
317 return std::unique_ptr<T>(new RT[n]);
318}
319
320struct ci {
321 bool operator()(const std::string &s1, const std::string &s2) const {
322 return std::lexicographical_compare(s1.begin(), s1.end(), s2.begin(),
323 s2.end(),
324 [](unsigned char c1, unsigned char c2) {
325 return ::tolower(c1) < ::tolower(c2);
326 });
327 }
328};
329
330// This is based on
331// "http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2014/n4189".
332
333struct scope_exit {
334 explicit scope_exit(std::function<void(void)> &&f)
335 : exit_function(std::move(f)), execute_on_destruction{true} {}
336
337 scope_exit(scope_exit &&rhs) noexcept
338 : exit_function(std::move(rhs.exit_function)),
339 execute_on_destruction{rhs.execute_on_destruction} {
340 rhs.release();
341 }
342
343 ~scope_exit() {
344 if (execute_on_destruction) { this->exit_function(); }
345 }
346
347 void release() { this->execute_on_destruction = false; }
348
349private:
350 scope_exit(const scope_exit &) = delete;
351 void operator=(const scope_exit &) = delete;
352 scope_exit &operator=(scope_exit &&) = delete;
353
354 std::function<void(void)> exit_function;
355 bool execute_on_destruction;
356};
357
358} // namespace detail
359
360enum StatusCode {
361 // Information responses
362 Continue_100 = 100,
363 SwitchingProtocol_101 = 101,
364 Processing_102 = 102,
365 EarlyHints_103 = 103,
366
367 // Successful responses
368 OK_200 = 200,
369 Created_201 = 201,
370 Accepted_202 = 202,
371 NonAuthoritativeInformation_203 = 203,
372 NoContent_204 = 204,
373 ResetContent_205 = 205,
374 PartialContent_206 = 206,
375 MultiStatus_207 = 207,
376 AlreadyReported_208 = 208,
377 IMUsed_226 = 226,
378
379 // Redirection messages
380 MultipleChoices_300 = 300,
381 MovedPermanently_301 = 301,
382 Found_302 = 302,
383 SeeOther_303 = 303,
384 NotModified_304 = 304,
385 UseProxy_305 = 305,
386 unused_306 = 306,
387 TemporaryRedirect_307 = 307,
388 PermanentRedirect_308 = 308,
389
390 // Client error responses
391 BadRequest_400 = 400,
392 Unauthorized_401 = 401,
393 PaymentRequired_402 = 402,
394 Forbidden_403 = 403,
395 NotFound_404 = 404,
396 MethodNotAllowed_405 = 405,
397 NotAcceptable_406 = 406,
398 ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407 = 407,
399 RequestTimeout_408 = 408,
400 Conflict_409 = 409,
401 Gone_410 = 410,
402 LengthRequired_411 = 411,
403 PreconditionFailed_412 = 412,
404 PayloadTooLarge_413 = 413,
405 UriTooLong_414 = 414,
406 UnsupportedMediaType_415 = 415,
407 RangeNotSatisfiable_416 = 416,
408 ExpectationFailed_417 = 417,
409 ImATeapot_418 = 418,
410 MisdirectedRequest_421 = 421,
411 UnprocessableContent_422 = 422,
412 Locked_423 = 423,
413 FailedDependency_424 = 424,
414 TooEarly_425 = 425,
415 UpgradeRequired_426 = 426,
416 PreconditionRequired_428 = 428,
417 TooManyRequests_429 = 429,
418 RequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge_431 = 431,
419 UnavailableForLegalReasons_451 = 451,
420
421 // Server error responses
422 InternalServerError_500 = 500,
423 NotImplemented_501 = 501,
424 BadGateway_502 = 502,
425 ServiceUnavailable_503 = 503,
426 GatewayTimeout_504 = 504,
427 HttpVersionNotSupported_505 = 505,
428 VariantAlsoNegotiates_506 = 506,
429 InsufficientStorage_507 = 507,
430 LoopDetected_508 = 508,
431 NotExtended_510 = 510,
432 NetworkAuthenticationRequired_511 = 511,
433};
434
435using Headers = std::multimap<std::string, std::string, detail::ci>;
436
437using Params = std::multimap<std::string, std::string>;
438using Match = std::smatch;
439
440using Progress = std::function<bool(uint64_t current, uint64_t total)>;
441
442struct Response;
443using ResponseHandler = std::function<bool(const Response &response)>;
444
445struct MultipartFormData {
446 std::string name;
447 std::string content;
448 std::string filename;
449 std::string content_type;
450};
451using MultipartFormDataItems = std::vector<MultipartFormData>;
452using MultipartFormDataMap = std::multimap<std::string, MultipartFormData>;
453
454class DataSink {
455public:
456 DataSink() : os(&sb_), sb_(*this) {}
457
458 DataSink(const DataSink &) = delete;
459 DataSink &operator=(const DataSink &) = delete;
460 DataSink(DataSink &&) = delete;
461 DataSink &operator=(DataSink &&) = delete;
462
463 std::function<bool(const char *data, size_t data_len)> write;
464 std::function<bool()> is_writable;
465 std::function<void()> done;
466 std::function<void(const Headers &trailer)> done_with_trailer;
467 std::ostream os;
468
469private:
470 class data_sink_streambuf final : public std::streambuf {
471 public:
472 explicit data_sink_streambuf(DataSink &sink) : sink_(sink) {}
473
474 protected:
475 std::streamsize xsputn(const char *s, std::streamsize n) override {
476 sink_.write(s, static_cast<size_t>(n));
477 return n;
478 }
479
480 private:
481 DataSink &sink_;
482 };
483
484 data_sink_streambuf sb_;
485};
486
487using ContentProvider =
488 std::function<bool(size_t offset, size_t length, DataSink &sink)>;
489
490using ContentProviderWithoutLength =
491 std::function<bool(size_t offset, DataSink &sink)>;
492
493using ContentProviderResourceReleaser = std::function<void(bool success)>;
494
495struct MultipartFormDataProvider {
496 std::string name;
497 ContentProviderWithoutLength provider;
498 std::string filename;
499 std::string content_type;
500};
501using MultipartFormDataProviderItems = std::vector<MultipartFormDataProvider>;
502
503using ContentReceiverWithProgress =
504 std::function<bool(const char *data, size_t data_length, uint64_t offset,
505 uint64_t total_length)>;
506
507using ContentReceiver =
508 std::function<bool(const char *data, size_t data_length)>;
509
510using MultipartContentHeader =
511 std::function<bool(const MultipartFormData &file)>;
512
513class ContentReader {
514public:
515 using Reader = std::function<bool(ContentReceiver receiver)>;
516 using MultipartReader = std::function<bool(MultipartContentHeader header,
517 ContentReceiver receiver)>;
518
519 ContentReader(Reader reader, MultipartReader multipart_reader)
520 : reader_(std::move(reader)),
521 multipart_reader_(std::move(multipart_reader)) {}
522
523 bool operator()(MultipartContentHeader header,
524 ContentReceiver receiver) const {
525 return multipart_reader_(std::move(header), std::move(receiver));
526 }
527
528 bool operator()(ContentReceiver receiver) const {
529 return reader_(std::move(receiver));
530 }
531
532 Reader reader_;
533 MultipartReader multipart_reader_;
534};
535
536using Range = std::pair<ssize_t, ssize_t>;
537using Ranges = std::vector<Range>;
538
539struct Request {
540 std::string method;
541 std::string path;
542 Headers headers;
543 std::string body;
544
545 std::string remote_addr;
546 int remote_port = -1;
547 std::string local_addr;
548 int local_port = -1;
549
550 // for server
551 std::string version;
552 std::string target;
553 Params params;
554 MultipartFormDataMap files;
555 Ranges ranges;
556 Match matches;
557 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> path_params;
558
559 // for client
560 ResponseHandler response_handler;
561 ContentReceiverWithProgress content_receiver;
562 Progress progress;
563#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
564 const SSL *ssl = nullptr;
565#endif
566
567 bool has_header(const std::string &key) const;
568 std::string get_header_value(const std::string &key, size_t id = 0) const;
569 uint64_t get_header_value_u64(const std::string &key, size_t id = 0) const;
570 size_t get_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const;
571 void set_header(const std::string &key, const std::string &val);
572
573 bool has_param(const std::string &key) const;
574 std::string get_param_value(const std::string &key, size_t id = 0) const;
575 size_t get_param_value_count(const std::string &key) const;
576
577 bool is_multipart_form_data() const;
578
579 bool has_file(const std::string &key) const;
580 MultipartFormData get_file_value(const std::string &key) const;
581 std::vector<MultipartFormData> get_file_values(const std::string &key) const;
582
583 // private members...
584 size_t redirect_count_ = CPPHTTPLIB_REDIRECT_MAX_COUNT;
585 size_t content_length_ = 0;
586 ContentProvider content_provider_;
587 bool is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
588 size_t authorization_count_ = 0;
589};
590
591struct Response {
592 std::string version;
593 int status = -1;
594 std::string reason;
595 Headers headers;
596 std::string body;
597 std::string location; // Redirect location
598
599 bool has_header(const std::string &key) const;
600 std::string get_header_value(const std::string &key, size_t id = 0) const;
601 uint64_t get_header_value_u64(const std::string &key, size_t id = 0) const;
602 size_t get_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const;
603 void set_header(const std::string &key, const std::string &val);
604
605 void set_redirect(const std::string &url, int status = StatusCode::Found_302);
606 void set_content(const char *s, size_t n, const std::string &content_type);
607 void set_content(const std::string &s, const std::string &content_type);
608 void set_content(std::string &&s, const std::string &content_type);
609
610 void set_content_provider(
611 size_t length, const std::string &content_type, ContentProvider provider,
612 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser = nullptr);
613
614 void set_content_provider(
615 const std::string &content_type, ContentProviderWithoutLength provider,
616 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser = nullptr);
617
618 void set_chunked_content_provider(
619 const std::string &content_type, ContentProviderWithoutLength provider,
620 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser = nullptr);
621
622 Response() = default;
623 Response(const Response &) = default;
624 Response &operator=(const Response &) = default;
625 Response(Response &&) = default;
626 Response &operator=(Response &&) = default;
627 ~Response() {
628 if (content_provider_resource_releaser_) {
629 content_provider_resource_releaser_(content_provider_success_);
630 }
631 }
632
633 // private members...
634 size_t content_length_ = 0;
635 ContentProvider content_provider_;
636 ContentProviderResourceReleaser content_provider_resource_releaser_;
637 bool is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
638 bool content_provider_success_ = false;
639};
640
641class Stream {
642public:
643 virtual ~Stream() = default;
644
645 virtual bool is_readable() const = 0;
646 virtual bool is_writable() const = 0;
647
648 virtual ssize_t read(char *ptr, size_t size) = 0;
649 virtual ssize_t write(const char *ptr, size_t size) = 0;
650 virtual void get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const = 0;
651 virtual void get_local_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const = 0;
652 virtual socket_t socket() const = 0;
653
654 template <typename... Args>
655 ssize_t write_format(const char *fmt, const Args &...args);
656 ssize_t write(const char *ptr);
657 ssize_t write(const std::string &s);
658};
659
660class TaskQueue {
661public:
662 TaskQueue() = default;
663 virtual ~TaskQueue() = default;
664
665 virtual bool enqueue(std::function<void()> fn) = 0;
666 virtual void shutdown() = 0;
667
668 virtual void on_idle() {}
669};
670
671class ThreadPool final : public TaskQueue {
672public:
673 explicit ThreadPool(size_t n, size_t mqr = 0)
674 : shutdown_(false), max_queued_requests_(mqr) {
675 while (n) {
676 threads_.emplace_back(worker(*this));
677 n--;
678 }
679 }
680
681 ThreadPool(const ThreadPool &) = delete;
682 ~ThreadPool() override = default;
683
684 bool enqueue(std::function<void()> fn) override {
685 {
686 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mutex_);
687 if (max_queued_requests_ > 0 && jobs_.size() >= max_queued_requests_) {
688 return false;
689 }
690 jobs_.push_back(std::move(fn));
691 }
692
693 cond_.notify_one();
694 return true;
695 }
696
697 void shutdown() override {
698 // Stop all worker threads...
699 {
700 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(mutex_);
701 shutdown_ = true;
702 }
703
704 cond_.notify_all();
705
706 // Join...
707 for (auto &t : threads_) {
708 t.join();
709 }
710 }
711
712private:
713 struct worker {
714 explicit worker(ThreadPool &pool) : pool_(pool) {}
715
716 void operator()() {
717 for (;;) {
718 std::function<void()> fn;
719 {
720 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(pool_.mutex_);
721
722 pool_.cond_.wait(
723 lock, [&] { return !pool_.jobs_.empty() || pool_.shutdown_; });
724
725 if (pool_.shutdown_ && pool_.jobs_.empty()) { break; }
726
727 fn = pool_.jobs_.front();
728 pool_.jobs_.pop_front();
729 }
730
731 assert(true == static_cast<bool>(fn));
732 fn();
733 }
734
735#if defined(CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT) && !defined(OPENSSL_IS_BORINGSSL)
736 OPENSSL_thread_stop();
737#endif
738 }
739
740 ThreadPool &pool_;
741 };
742 friend struct worker;
743
744 std::vector<std::thread> threads_;
745 std::list<std::function<void()>> jobs_;
746
747 bool shutdown_;
748 size_t max_queued_requests_ = 0;
749
750 std::condition_variable cond_;
751 std::mutex mutex_;
752};
753
754using Logger = std::function<void(const Request &, const Response &)>;
755
756using SocketOptions = std::function<void(socket_t sock)>;
757
758void default_socket_options(socket_t sock);
759
760const char *status_message(int status);
761
762std::string get_bearer_token_auth(const Request &req);
763
764namespace detail {
765
766class MatcherBase {
767public:
768 virtual ~MatcherBase() = default;
769
770 // Match request path and populate its matches and
771 virtual bool match(Request &request) const = 0;
772};
773
792class PathParamsMatcher final : public MatcherBase {
793public:
794 PathParamsMatcher(const std::string &pattern);
795
796 bool match(Request &request) const override;
797
798private:
799 static constexpr char marker = ':';
800 // Treat segment separators as the end of path parameter capture
801 // Does not need to handle query parameters as they are parsed before path
802 // matching
803 static constexpr char separator = '/';
804
805 // Contains static path fragments to match against, excluding the '/' after
806 // path params
807 // Fragments are separated by path params
808 std::vector<std::string> static_fragments_;
809 // Stores the names of the path parameters to be used as keys in the
810 // Request::path_params map
811 std::vector<std::string> param_names_;
812};
813
822class RegexMatcher final : public MatcherBase {
823public:
824 RegexMatcher(const std::string &pattern) : regex_(pattern) {}
825
826 bool match(Request &request) const override;
827
828private:
829 std::regex regex_;
830};
831
832ssize_t write_headers(Stream &strm, const Headers &headers);
833
834} // namespace detail
835
836class Server {
837public:
838 using Handler = std::function<void(const Request &, Response &)>;
839
840 using ExceptionHandler =
841 std::function<void(const Request &, Response &, std::exception_ptr ep)>;
842
843 enum class HandlerResponse {
844 Handled,
845 Unhandled,
846 };
847 using HandlerWithResponse =
848 std::function<HandlerResponse(const Request &, Response &)>;
849
850 using HandlerWithContentReader = std::function<void(
851 const Request &, Response &, const ContentReader &content_reader)>;
852
853 using Expect100ContinueHandler =
854 std::function<int(const Request &, Response &)>;
855
856 Server();
857
858 virtual ~Server();
859
860 virtual bool is_valid() const;
861
862 Server &Get(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
863 Server &Post(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
864 Server &Post(const std::string &pattern, HandlerWithContentReader handler);
865 Server &Put(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
866 Server &Put(const std::string &pattern, HandlerWithContentReader handler);
867 Server &Patch(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
868 Server &Patch(const std::string &pattern, HandlerWithContentReader handler);
869 Server &Delete(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
870 Server &Delete(const std::string &pattern, HandlerWithContentReader handler);
871 Server &Options(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler);
872
873 bool set_base_dir(const std::string &dir,
874 const std::string &mount_point = std::string());
875 bool set_mount_point(const std::string &mount_point, const std::string &dir,
876 Headers headers = Headers());
877 bool remove_mount_point(const std::string &mount_point);
878 Server &set_file_extension_and_mimetype_mapping(const std::string &ext,
879 const std::string &mime);
880 Server &set_default_file_mimetype(const std::string &mime);
881 Server &set_file_request_handler(Handler handler);
882
883 template <class ErrorHandlerFunc>
884 Server &set_error_handler(ErrorHandlerFunc &&handler) {
885 return set_error_handler_core(
886 std::forward<ErrorHandlerFunc>(handler),
887 std::is_convertible<ErrorHandlerFunc, HandlerWithResponse>{});
888 }
889
890 Server &set_exception_handler(ExceptionHandler handler);
891 Server &set_pre_routing_handler(HandlerWithResponse handler);
892 Server &set_post_routing_handler(Handler handler);
893
894 Server &set_expect_100_continue_handler(Expect100ContinueHandler handler);
895 Server &set_logger(Logger logger);
896
897 Server &set_address_family(int family);
898 Server &set_tcp_nodelay(bool on);
899 Server &set_socket_options(SocketOptions socket_options);
900
901 Server &set_default_headers(Headers headers);
902 Server &
903 set_header_writer(std::function<ssize_t(Stream &, Headers &)> const &writer);
904
905 Server &set_keep_alive_max_count(size_t count);
906 Server &set_keep_alive_timeout(time_t sec);
907
908 Server &set_read_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
909 template <class Rep, class Period>
910 Server &set_read_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
911
912 Server &set_write_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
913 template <class Rep, class Period>
914 Server &set_write_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
915
916 Server &set_idle_interval(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
917 template <class Rep, class Period>
918 Server &set_idle_interval(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
919
920 Server &set_payload_max_length(size_t length);
921
922 bool bind_to_port(const std::string &host, int port, int socket_flags = 0);
923 int bind_to_any_port(const std::string &host, int socket_flags = 0);
924 bool listen_after_bind();
925
926 bool listen(const std::string &host, int port, int socket_flags = 0);
927
928 bool is_running() const;
929 void wait_until_ready() const;
930 void stop();
931
932 std::function<TaskQueue *(void)> new_task_queue;
933
934protected:
935 bool process_request(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
936 bool &connection_closed,
937 const std::function<void(Request &)> &setup_request);
938
939 std::atomic<socket_t> svr_sock_{INVALID_SOCKET};
940 size_t keep_alive_max_count_ = CPPHTTPLIB_KEEPALIVE_MAX_COUNT;
941 time_t keep_alive_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_KEEPALIVE_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
942 time_t read_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_READ_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
943 time_t read_timeout_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_READ_TIMEOUT_USECOND;
944 time_t write_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_WRITE_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
945 time_t write_timeout_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_WRITE_TIMEOUT_USECOND;
946 time_t idle_interval_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_IDLE_INTERVAL_SECOND;
947 time_t idle_interval_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_IDLE_INTERVAL_USECOND;
948 size_t payload_max_length_ = CPPHTTPLIB_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH;
949
950private:
951 using Handlers =
952 std::vector<std::pair<std::unique_ptr<detail::MatcherBase>, Handler>>;
953 using HandlersForContentReader =
954 std::vector<std::pair<std::unique_ptr<detail::MatcherBase>,
955 HandlerWithContentReader>>;
956
957 static std::unique_ptr<detail::MatcherBase>
958 make_matcher(const std::string &pattern);
959
960 Server &set_error_handler_core(HandlerWithResponse handler, std::true_type);
961 Server &set_error_handler_core(Handler handler, std::false_type);
962
963 socket_t create_server_socket(const std::string &host, int port,
964 int socket_flags,
965 SocketOptions socket_options) const;
966 int bind_internal(const std::string &host, int port, int socket_flags);
967 bool listen_internal();
968
969 bool routing(Request &req, Response &res, Stream &strm);
970 bool handle_file_request(const Request &req, Response &res,
971 bool head = false);
972 bool dispatch_request(Request &req, Response &res,
973 const Handlers &handlers) const;
974 bool dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
975 Request &req, Response &res, ContentReader content_reader,
976 const HandlersForContentReader &handlers) const;
977
978 bool parse_request_line(const char *s, Request &req) const;
979 void apply_ranges(const Request &req, Response &res,
980 std::string &content_type, std::string &boundary) const;
981 bool write_response(Stream &strm, bool close_connection, Request &req,
982 Response &res);
983 bool write_response_with_content(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
984 const Request &req, Response &res);
985 bool write_response_core(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
986 const Request &req, Response &res,
987 bool need_apply_ranges);
988 bool write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
989 Response &res, const std::string &boundary,
990 const std::string &content_type);
991 bool read_content(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res);
992 bool
993 read_content_with_content_receiver(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res,
994 ContentReceiver receiver,
995 MultipartContentHeader multipart_header,
996 ContentReceiver multipart_receiver);
997 bool read_content_core(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res,
998 ContentReceiver receiver,
999 MultipartContentHeader multipart_header,
1000 ContentReceiver multipart_receiver) const;
1001
1002 virtual bool process_and_close_socket(socket_t sock);
1003
1004 std::atomic<bool> is_running_{false};
1005 std::atomic<bool> done_{false};
1006
1007 struct MountPointEntry {
1008 std::string mount_point;
1009 std::string base_dir;
1010 Headers headers;
1011 };
1012 std::vector<MountPointEntry> base_dirs_;
1013 std::map<std::string, std::string> file_extension_and_mimetype_map_;
1014 std::string default_file_mimetype_ = "application/octet-stream";
1015 Handler file_request_handler_;
1016
1017 Handlers get_handlers_;
1018 Handlers post_handlers_;
1019 HandlersForContentReader post_handlers_for_content_reader_;
1020 Handlers put_handlers_;
1021 HandlersForContentReader put_handlers_for_content_reader_;
1022 Handlers patch_handlers_;
1023 HandlersForContentReader patch_handlers_for_content_reader_;
1024 Handlers delete_handlers_;
1025 HandlersForContentReader delete_handlers_for_content_reader_;
1026 Handlers options_handlers_;
1027
1028 HandlerWithResponse error_handler_;
1029 ExceptionHandler exception_handler_;
1030 HandlerWithResponse pre_routing_handler_;
1031 Handler post_routing_handler_;
1032 Expect100ContinueHandler expect_100_continue_handler_;
1033
1034 Logger logger_;
1035
1036 int address_family_ = AF_UNSPEC;
1037 bool tcp_nodelay_ = CPPHTTPLIB_TCP_NODELAY;
1038 SocketOptions socket_options_ = default_socket_options;
1039
1040 Headers default_headers_;
1041 std::function<ssize_t(Stream &, Headers &)> header_writer_ =
1042 detail::write_headers;
1043};
1044
1045enum class Error {
1046 Success = 0,
1047 Unknown,
1048 Connection,
1049 BindIPAddress,
1050 Read,
1051 Write,
1052 ExceedRedirectCount,
1053 Canceled,
1054 SSLConnection,
1055 SSLLoadingCerts,
1056 SSLServerVerification,
1057 UnsupportedMultipartBoundaryChars,
1058 Compression,
1059 ConnectionTimeout,
1060 ProxyConnection,
1061
1062 // For internal use only
1063 SSLPeerCouldBeClosed_,
1064};
1065
1066std::string to_string(Error error);
1067
1068std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Error &obj);
1069
1070class Result {
1071public:
1072 Result() = default;
1073 Result(std::unique_ptr<Response> &&res, Error err,
1074 Headers &&request_headers = Headers{})
1075 : res_(std::move(res)), err_(err),
1076 request_headers_(std::move(request_headers)) {}
1077 // Response
1078 operator bool() const { return res_ != nullptr; }
1079 bool operator==(std::nullptr_t) const { return res_ == nullptr; }
1080 bool operator!=(std::nullptr_t) const { return res_ != nullptr; }
1081 const Response &value() const { return *res_; }
1082 Response &value() { return *res_; }
1083 const Response &operator*() const { return *res_; }
1084 Response &operator*() { return *res_; }
1085 const Response *operator->() const { return res_.get(); }
1086 Response *operator->() { return res_.get(); }
1087
1088 // Error
1089 Error error() const { return err_; }
1090
1091 // Request Headers
1092 bool has_request_header(const std::string &key) const;
1093 std::string get_request_header_value(const std::string &key,
1094 size_t id = 0) const;
1095 uint64_t get_request_header_value_u64(const std::string &key,
1096 size_t id = 0) const;
1097 size_t get_request_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const;
1098
1099private:
1100 std::unique_ptr<Response> res_;
1101 Error err_ = Error::Unknown;
1102 Headers request_headers_;
1103};
1104
1105class ClientImpl {
1106public:
1107 explicit ClientImpl(const std::string &host);
1108
1109 explicit ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port);
1110
1111 explicit ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port,
1112 const std::string &client_cert_path,
1113 const std::string &client_key_path);
1114
1115 virtual ~ClientImpl();
1116
1117 virtual bool is_valid() const;
1118
1119 Result Get(const std::string &path);
1120 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1121 Result Get(const std::string &path, Progress progress);
1122 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1123 Progress progress);
1124 Result Get(const std::string &path, ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1125 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1126 ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1127 Result Get(const std::string &path, ContentReceiver content_receiver,
1128 Progress progress);
1129 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1130 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress);
1131 Result Get(const std::string &path, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1132 ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1133 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1134 ResponseHandler response_handler,
1135 ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1136 Result Get(const std::string &path, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1137 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress);
1138 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1139 ResponseHandler response_handler, ContentReceiver content_receiver,
1140 Progress progress);
1141
1142 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1143 const Headers &headers, Progress progress = nullptr);
1144 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1145 const Headers &headers, ContentReceiver content_receiver,
1146 Progress progress = nullptr);
1147 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1148 const Headers &headers, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1149 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress = nullptr);
1150
1151 Result Head(const std::string &path);
1152 Result Head(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1153
1154 Result Post(const std::string &path);
1155 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1156 Result Post(const std::string &path, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1157 const std::string &content_type);
1158 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers, const char *body,
1159 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type);
1160 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers, const char *body,
1161 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type,
1162 Progress progress);
1163 Result Post(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1164 const std::string &content_type);
1165 Result Post(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1166 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1167 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1168 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);
1169 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1170 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type,
1171 Progress progress);
1172 Result Post(const std::string &path, size_t content_length,
1173 ContentProvider content_provider,
1174 const std::string &content_type);
1175 Result Post(const std::string &path,
1176 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1177 const std::string &content_type);
1178 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1179 size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
1180 const std::string &content_type);
1181 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1182 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1183 const std::string &content_type);
1184 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Params &params);
1185 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1186 const Params &params);
1187 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1188 const Params &params, Progress progress);
1189 Result Post(const std::string &path, const MultipartFormDataItems &items);
1190 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1191 const MultipartFormDataItems &items);
1192 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1193 const MultipartFormDataItems &items, const std::string &boundary);
1194 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1195 const MultipartFormDataItems &items,
1196 const MultipartFormDataProviderItems &provider_items);
1197
1198 Result Put(const std::string &path);
1199 Result Put(const std::string &path, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1200 const std::string &content_type);
1201 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers, const char *body,
1202 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type);
1203 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers, const char *body,
1204 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type,
1205 Progress progress);
1206 Result Put(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1207 const std::string &content_type);
1208 Result Put(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1209 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1210 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1211 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);
1212 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1213 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type,
1214 Progress progress);
1215 Result Put(const std::string &path, size_t content_length,
1216 ContentProvider content_provider, const std::string &content_type);
1217 Result Put(const std::string &path,
1218 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1219 const std::string &content_type);
1220 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1221 size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
1222 const std::string &content_type);
1223 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1224 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1225 const std::string &content_type);
1226 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Params &params);
1227 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1228 const Params &params);
1229 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1230 const Params &params, Progress progress);
1231 Result Put(const std::string &path, const MultipartFormDataItems &items);
1232 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1233 const MultipartFormDataItems &items);
1234 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1235 const MultipartFormDataItems &items, const std::string &boundary);
1236 Result Put(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1237 const MultipartFormDataItems &items,
1238 const MultipartFormDataProviderItems &provider_items);
1239
1240 Result Patch(const std::string &path);
1241 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1242 const std::string &content_type);

1244 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1245 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1246 const char *body, size_t content_length,
1247 const std::string &content_type);
1248 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1249 const char *body, size_t content_length,
1250 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1251 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1252 const std::string &content_type);
1253 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1254 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1255 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1256 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);
1257 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1258 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type,
1259 Progress progress);
1260 Result Patch(const std::string &path, size_t content_length,
1261 ContentProvider content_provider,
1262 const std::string &content_type);
1263 Result Patch(const std::string &path,
1264 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1265 const std::string &content_type);
1266 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1267 size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
1268 const std::string &content_type);
1269 Result Patch(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1270 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1271 const std::string &content_type);
1272
1273 Result Delete(const std::string &path);
1274 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1275 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const char *body,
1276 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type);
1277 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const char *body,
1278 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type,
1279 Progress progress);
1280 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1281 const char *body, size_t content_length,
1282 const std::string &content_type);
1283 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1284 const char *body, size_t content_length,
1285 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1286 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1287 const std::string &content_type);
1288 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1289 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1290 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1291 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);
1292 Result Delete(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1293 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type,
1294 Progress progress);
1295
1296 Result Options(const std::string &path);

1298
1299 bool send(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error);
1300 Result send(const Request &req);
1301
1302 void stop();
1303
1304 std::string host() const;
1305 int port() const;
1306
1307 size_t is_socket_open() const;
1308 socket_t socket() const;
1309
1310 void set_hostname_addr_map(std::map<std::string, std::string> addr_map);
1311
1312 void set_default_headers(Headers headers);
1313
1314 void
1315 set_header_writer(std::function<ssize_t(Stream &, Headers &)> const &writer);
1316
1317 void set_address_family(int family);
1318 void set_tcp_nodelay(bool on);
1319 void set_socket_options(SocketOptions socket_options);
1320
1321 void set_connection_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
1322 template <class Rep, class Period>
1323 void
1324 set_connection_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
1325
1326 void set_read_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
1327 template <class Rep, class Period>
1328 void set_read_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
1329
1330 void set_write_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
1331 template <class Rep, class Period>
1332 void set_write_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
1333
1334 void set_basic_auth(const std::string &username, const std::string &password);
1335 void set_bearer_token_auth(const std::string &token);
1336#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1337 void set_digest_auth(const std::string &username,
1338 const std::string &password);
1339#endif
1340
1341 void set_keep_alive(bool on);
1342 void set_follow_location(bool on);
1343
1344 void set_url_encode(bool on);
1345
1346 void set_compress(bool on);
1347
1348 void set_decompress(bool on);
1349
1350 void set_interface(const std::string &intf);
1351
1352 void set_proxy(const std::string &host, int port);
1353 void set_proxy_basic_auth(const std::string &username,
1354 const std::string &password);
1355 void set_proxy_bearer_token_auth(const std::string &token);
1356#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1357 void set_proxy_digest_auth(const std::string &username,
1358 const std::string &password);
1359#endif
1360
1361#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1362 void set_ca_cert_path(const std::string &ca_cert_file_path,
1363 const std::string &ca_cert_dir_path = std::string());
1364 void set_ca_cert_store(X509_STORE *ca_cert_store);
1365 X509_STORE *create_ca_cert_store(const char *ca_cert, std::size_t size) const;
1366#endif
1367
1368#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1369 void enable_server_certificate_verification(bool enabled);
1370#endif
1371
1372 void set_logger(Logger logger);
1373
1374protected:
1375 struct Socket {
1376 socket_t sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
1377#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1378 SSL *ssl = nullptr;
1379#endif
1380
1381 bool is_open() const { return sock != INVALID_SOCKET; }
1382 };
1383
1384 virtual bool create_and_connect_socket(Socket &socket, Error &error);
1385
1386 // All of:
1387 // shutdown_ssl
1388 // shutdown_socket
1389 // close_socket
1390 // should ONLY be called when socket_mutex_ is locked.
1391 // Also, shutdown_ssl and close_socket should also NOT be called concurrently
1392 // with a DIFFERENT thread sending requests using that socket.
1393 virtual void shutdown_ssl(Socket &socket, bool shutdown_gracefully);
1394 void shutdown_socket(Socket &socket) const;
1395 void close_socket(Socket &socket);
1396
1397 bool process_request(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res,
1398 bool close_connection, Error &error);
1399
1400 bool write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
1401 Error &error) const;
1402
1403 void copy_settings(const ClientImpl &rhs);
1404
1405 // Socket endpoint information
1406 const std::string host_;
1407 const int port_;
1408 const std::string host_and_port_;
1409
1410 // Current open socket
1411 Socket socket_;
1412 mutable std::mutex socket_mutex_;
1413 std::recursive_mutex request_mutex_;
1414
1415 // These are all protected under socket_mutex
1416 size_t socket_requests_in_flight_ = 0;
1417 std::thread::id socket_requests_are_from_thread_ = std::thread::id();
1418 bool socket_should_be_closed_when_request_is_done_ = false;
1419
1420 // Hostname-IP map
1421 std::map<std::string, std::string> addr_map_;
1422
1423 // Default headers
1424 Headers default_headers_;
1425
1426 // Header writer
1427 std::function<ssize_t(Stream &, Headers &)> header_writer_ =
1428 detail::write_headers;
1429
1430 // Settings
1431 std::string client_cert_path_;
1432 std::string client_key_path_;
1433
1434 time_t connection_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
1435 time_t connection_timeout_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_USECOND;
1436 time_t read_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_READ_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
1437 time_t read_timeout_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_READ_TIMEOUT_USECOND;
1438 time_t write_timeout_sec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_WRITE_TIMEOUT_SECOND;
1439 time_t write_timeout_usec_ = CPPHTTPLIB_WRITE_TIMEOUT_USECOND;
1440
1441 std::string basic_auth_username_;
1442 std::string basic_auth_password_;
1443 std::string bearer_token_auth_token_;
1444#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1445 std::string digest_auth_username_;
1446 std::string digest_auth_password_;
1447#endif
1448
1449 bool keep_alive_ = false;
1450 bool follow_location_ = false;
1451
1452 bool url_encode_ = true;
1453
1454 int address_family_ = AF_UNSPEC;
1455 bool tcp_nodelay_ = CPPHTTPLIB_TCP_NODELAY;
1456 SocketOptions socket_options_ = nullptr;
1457
1458 bool compress_ = false;
1459 bool decompress_ = true;
1460
1461 std::string interface_;
1462
1463 std::string proxy_host_;
1464 int proxy_port_ = -1;
1465
1466 std::string proxy_basic_auth_username_;
1467 std::string proxy_basic_auth_password_;
1468 std::string proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_;
1469#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1470 std::string proxy_digest_auth_username_;
1471 std::string proxy_digest_auth_password_;
1472#endif
1473
1474#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1475 std::string ca_cert_file_path_;
1476 std::string ca_cert_dir_path_;
1477
1478 X509_STORE *ca_cert_store_ = nullptr;
1479#endif
1480
1481#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1482 bool server_certificate_verification_ = true;
1483#endif
1484
1485 Logger logger_;
1486
1487private:
1488 bool send_(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error);
1489 Result send_(Request &&req);
1490
1491 socket_t create_client_socket(Error &error) const;
1492 bool read_response_line(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
1493 Response &res) const;
1494 bool write_request(Stream &strm, Request &req, bool close_connection,
1495 Error &error);
1496 bool redirect(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error);
1497 bool handle_request(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res,
1498 bool close_connection, Error &error);
1499 std::unique_ptr<Response> send_with_content_provider(
1500 Request &req, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1501 ContentProvider content_provider,
1502 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
1503 const std::string &content_type, Error &error);
1504 Result send_with_content_provider(
1505 const std::string &method, const std::string &path,
1506 const Headers &headers, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1507 ContentProvider content_provider,
1508 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
1509 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1510 ContentProviderWithoutLength get_multipart_content_provider(
1511 const std::string &boundary, const MultipartFormDataItems &items,
1512 const MultipartFormDataProviderItems &provider_items) const;
1513
1514 std::string adjust_host_string(const std::string &host) const;
1515
1516 virtual bool process_socket(const Socket &socket,
1517 std::function<bool(Stream &strm)> callback);
1518 virtual bool is_ssl() const;
1519};
1520
1521class Client {
1522public:
1523 // Universal interface
1524 explicit Client(const std::string &scheme_host_port);
1525
1526 explicit Client(const std::string &scheme_host_port,
1527 const std::string &client_cert_path,
1528 const std::string &client_key_path);
1529
1530 // HTTP only interface
1531 explicit Client(const std::string &host, int port);
1532
1533 explicit Client(const std::string &host, int port,
1534 const std::string &client_cert_path,
1535 const std::string &client_key_path);
1536
1537 Client(Client &&) = default;
1538 Client &operator=(Client &&) = default;
1539
1540 ~Client();
1541
1542 bool is_valid() const;
1543
1544 Result Get(const std::string &path);
1545 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1546 Result Get(const std::string &path, Progress progress);

1548 Progress progress);
1549 Result Get(const std::string &path, ContentReceiver content_receiver);

1551 ContentReceiver content_receiver);

1553 Progress progress);
1554 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1555 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress);
1556 Result Get(const std::string &path, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1557 ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1558 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1559 ResponseHandler response_handler,
1560 ContentReceiver content_receiver);
1561 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1562 ResponseHandler response_handler, ContentReceiver content_receiver,
1563 Progress progress);
1564 Result Get(const std::string &path, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1565 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress);
1566
1567 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1568 const Headers &headers, Progress progress = nullptr);
1569 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1570 const Headers &headers, ContentReceiver content_receiver,
1571 Progress progress = nullptr);
1572 Result Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
1573 const Headers &headers, ResponseHandler response_handler,
1574 ContentReceiver content_receiver, Progress progress = nullptr);
1575
1576 Result Head(const std::string &path);
1577 Result Head(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers);
1578
1579 Result Post(const std::string &path);

1581 Result Post(const std::string &path, const char *body, size_t content_length,
1582 const std::string &content_type);

1584 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type);
1585 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers, const char *body,
1586 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type,
1587 Progress progress);
1588 Result Post(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
1589 const std::string &content_type);

1591 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);
1592 Result Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
1593 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);

1595 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type,

1602 const std::string &content_type);

1604 size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
1605 const std::string &content_type);

1607 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,
1608 const std::string &content_type);

1625 const std::string &content_type);

1627 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type);

1629 size_t content_length, const std::string &content_type,
1630 Progress progress);

1632 const std::string &content_type);

1634 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress);

1636 const std::string &body, const std::string &content_type);

1644 const std::string &content_type);

1649 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider,

1748 void
1749 set_connection_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);

1753 void set_read_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
1754
1755 void set_write_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec = 0);
1756 template <class Rep, class Period>
1757 void set_write_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration);
1758
1759 void set_basic_auth(const std::string &username, const std::string &password);
1760 void set_bearer_token_auth(const std::string &token);

1763 const std::string &password);
1764#endif

1766 void set_keep_alive(bool on);

1768

1772
1773 void set_decompress(bool on);
1774

1779 const std::string &password);

1781#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT

1783 const std::string &password);
1784#endif
1785
1786#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1787 void enable_server_certificate_verification(bool enabled);
1788#endif

1791
1792 // SSL
1793#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT

1795 const std::string &ca_cert_dir_path = std::string());

1798 void load_ca_cert_store(const char *ca_cert, std::size_t size);
1799
1800 long get_openssl_verify_result() const;
1801
1802 SSL_CTX *ssl_context() const;
1803#endif
1804
1805private:
1806 std::unique_ptr<ClientImpl> cli_;
1807
1808#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1809 bool is_ssl_ = false;
1810#endif
1811};
1812
1813#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
1814class SSLServer : public Server {
1815public:
1816 SSLServer(const char *cert_path, const char *private_key_path,
1817 const char *client_ca_cert_file_path = nullptr,
1818 const char *client_ca_cert_dir_path = nullptr,
1819 const char *private_key_password = nullptr);
1820
1821 SSLServer(X509 *cert, EVP_PKEY *private_key,
1822 X509_STORE *client_ca_cert_store = nullptr);
1823
1824 SSLServer(
1825 const std::function<bool(SSL_CTX &ssl_ctx)> &setup_ssl_ctx_callback);
1826
1827 ~SSLServer() override;
1828
1829 bool is_valid() const override;
1830
1831 SSL_CTX *ssl_context() const;
1832
1833 void update_certs(X509 *cert, EVP_PKEY *private_key,
1834 X509_STORE *client_ca_cert_store = nullptr);
1835
1836private:
1837 bool process_and_close_socket(socket_t sock) override;
1838
1839 SSL_CTX *ctx_;
1840 std::mutex ctx_mutex_;
1841};
1842
1843class SSLClient final : public ClientImpl {
1844public:
1845 explicit SSLClient(const std::string &host);
1846
1847 explicit SSLClient(const std::string &host, int port);
1848
1849 explicit SSLClient(const std::string &host, int port,
1850 const std::string &client_cert_path,
1851 const std::string &client_key_path,
1852 const std::string &private_key_password = std::string());
1853
1854 explicit SSLClient(const std::string &host, int port, X509 *client_cert,
1855 EVP_PKEY *client_key,
1856 const std::string &private_key_password = std::string());
1857
1858 ~SSLClient() override;
1859
1860 bool is_valid() const override;
1861
1862 void set_ca_cert_store(X509_STORE *ca_cert_store);
1863 void load_ca_cert_store(const char *ca_cert, std::size_t size);
1864
1865 long get_openssl_verify_result() const;
1866
1867 SSL_CTX *ssl_context() const;
1868
1869private:
1870 bool create_and_connect_socket(Socket &socket, Error &error) override;
1871 void shutdown_ssl(Socket &socket, bool shutdown_gracefully) override;
1872 void shutdown_ssl_impl(Socket &socket, bool shutdown_gracefully);
1873
1874 bool process_socket(const Socket &socket,
1875 std::function<bool(Stream &strm)> callback) override;
1876 bool is_ssl() const override;
1877
1878 bool connect_with_proxy(Socket &sock, Response &res, bool &success,
1879 Error &error);
1880 bool initialize_ssl(Socket &socket, Error &error);
1881
1882 bool load_certs();
1883
1884 bool verify_host(X509 *server_cert) const;
1885 bool verify_host_with_subject_alt_name(X509 *server_cert) const;
1886 bool verify_host_with_common_name(X509 *server_cert) const;
1887 bool check_host_name(const char *pattern, size_t pattern_len) const;
1888
1889 SSL_CTX *ctx_;
1890 std::mutex ctx_mutex_;
1891 std::once_flag initialize_cert_;
1892
1893 std::vector<std::string> host_components_;
1894
1895 long verify_result_ = 0;
1896
1897 friend class ClientImpl;
1898};
1899#endif
1900
1901/*
1902 * Implementation of template methods.
1903 */
1904
1905namespace detail {
1906
1907template <typename T, typename U>
1908inline void duration_to_sec_and_usec(const T &duration, U callback) {
1909 auto sec = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::seconds>(duration).count();
1910 auto usec = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::microseconds>(
1911 duration - std::chrono::seconds(sec))
1912 .count();
1913 callback(static_cast<time_t>(sec), static_cast<time_t>(usec));
1914}
1915
1916inline uint64_t get_header_value_u64(const Headers &headers,
1917 const std::string &key, size_t id,
1918 uint64_t def) {
1919 auto rng = headers.equal_range(key);
1920 auto it = rng.first;
1921 std::advance(it, static_cast<ssize_t>(id));
1922 if (it != rng.second) {
1923 return std::strtoull(it->second.data(), nullptr, 10);
1924 }
1925 return def;
1926}
1927
1928} // namespace detail
1929
1930inline uint64_t Request::get_header_value_u64(const std::string &key,
1931 size_t id) const {
1932 return detail::get_header_value_u64(headers, key, id, 0);
1933}
1934
1935inline uint64_t Response::get_header_value_u64(const std::string &key,
1936 size_t id) const {
1937 return detail::get_header_value_u64(headers, key, id, 0);
1938}
1939
1940template <typename... Args>
1941inline ssize_t Stream::write_format(const char *fmt, const Args &...args) {
1942 const auto bufsiz = 2048;
1943 std::array<char, bufsiz> buf{};
1944
1945 auto sn = snprintf(buf.data(), buf.size() - 1, fmt, args...);
1946 if (sn <= 0) { return sn; }
1947
1948 auto n = static_cast<size_t>(sn);
1949
1950 if (n >= buf.size() - 1) {
1951 std::vector<char> glowable_buf(buf.size());
1952
1953 while (n >= glowable_buf.size() - 1) {
1954 glowable_buf.resize(glowable_buf.size() * 2);
1955 n = static_cast<size_t>(
1956 snprintf(&glowable_buf[0], glowable_buf.size() - 1, fmt, args...));
1957 }
1958 return write(&glowable_buf[0], n);
1959 } else {
1960 return write(buf.data(), n);
1961 }
1962}
1963
1964inline void default_socket_options(socket_t sock) {
1965 int yes = 1;
1966#ifdef _WIN32
1967 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR,
1968 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
1969 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_EXCLUSIVEADDRUSE,
1970 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
1971#else
1972#ifdef SO_REUSEPORT
1973 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEPORT,
1974 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
1975#else
1976 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR,
1977 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
1978#endif
1979#endif
1980}
1981
1982inline const char *status_message(int status) {
1983 switch (status) {
1984 case StatusCode::Continue_100: return "Continue";
1985 case StatusCode::SwitchingProtocol_101: return "Switching Protocol";
1986 case StatusCode::Processing_102: return "Processing";
1987 case StatusCode::EarlyHints_103: return "Early Hints";
1988 case StatusCode::OK_200: return "OK";
1989 case StatusCode::Created_201: return "Created";
1990 case StatusCode::Accepted_202: return "Accepted";
1991 case StatusCode::NonAuthoritativeInformation_203:
1992 return "Non-Authoritative Information";
1993 case StatusCode::NoContent_204: return "No Content";
1994 case StatusCode::ResetContent_205: return "Reset Content";
1995 case StatusCode::PartialContent_206: return "Partial Content";
1996 case StatusCode::MultiStatus_207: return "Multi-Status";
1997 case StatusCode::AlreadyReported_208: return "Already Reported";
1998 case StatusCode::IMUsed_226: return "IM Used";
1999 case StatusCode::MultipleChoices_300: return "Multiple Choices";
2000 case StatusCode::MovedPermanently_301: return "Moved Permanently";
2001 case StatusCode::Found_302: return "Found";
2002 case StatusCode::SeeOther_303: return "See Other";
2003 case StatusCode::NotModified_304: return "Not Modified";
2004 case StatusCode::UseProxy_305: return "Use Proxy";
2005 case StatusCode::unused_306: return "unused";
2006 case StatusCode::TemporaryRedirect_307: return "Temporary Redirect";
2007 case StatusCode::PermanentRedirect_308: return "Permanent Redirect";
2008 case StatusCode::BadRequest_400: return "Bad Request";
2009 case StatusCode::Unauthorized_401: return "Unauthorized";
2010 case StatusCode::PaymentRequired_402: return "Payment Required";
2011 case StatusCode::Forbidden_403: return "Forbidden";
2012 case StatusCode::NotFound_404: return "Not Found";
2013 case StatusCode::MethodNotAllowed_405: return "Method Not Allowed";
2014 case StatusCode::NotAcceptable_406: return "Not Acceptable";
2015 case StatusCode::ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407:
2016 return "Proxy Authentication Required";
2017 case StatusCode::RequestTimeout_408: return "Request Timeout";
2018 case StatusCode::Conflict_409: return "Conflict";
2019 case StatusCode::Gone_410: return "Gone";
2020 case StatusCode::LengthRequired_411: return "Length Required";
2021 case StatusCode::PreconditionFailed_412: return "Precondition Failed";
2022 case StatusCode::PayloadTooLarge_413: return "Payload Too Large";
2023 case StatusCode::UriTooLong_414: return "URI Too Long";
2024 case StatusCode::UnsupportedMediaType_415: return "Unsupported Media Type";
2025 case StatusCode::RangeNotSatisfiable_416: return "Range Not Satisfiable";
2026 case StatusCode::ExpectationFailed_417: return "Expectation Failed";
2027 case StatusCode::ImATeapot_418: return "I'm a teapot";
2028 case StatusCode::MisdirectedRequest_421: return "Misdirected Request";
2029 case StatusCode::UnprocessableContent_422: return "Unprocessable Content";
2030 case StatusCode::Locked_423: return "Locked";
2031 case StatusCode::FailedDependency_424: return "Failed Dependency";
2032 case StatusCode::TooEarly_425: return "Too Early";
2033 case StatusCode::UpgradeRequired_426: return "Upgrade Required";
2034 case StatusCode::PreconditionRequired_428: return "Precondition Required";
2035 case StatusCode::TooManyRequests_429: return "Too Many Requests";
2036 case StatusCode::RequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge_431:
2037 return "Request Header Fields Too Large";
2038 case StatusCode::UnavailableForLegalReasons_451:
2039 return "Unavailable For Legal Reasons";
2040 case StatusCode::NotImplemented_501: return "Not Implemented";
2041 case StatusCode::BadGateway_502: return "Bad Gateway";
2042 case StatusCode::ServiceUnavailable_503: return "Service Unavailable";
2043 case StatusCode::GatewayTimeout_504: return "Gateway Timeout";
2044 case StatusCode::HttpVersionNotSupported_505:
2045 return "HTTP Version Not Supported";
2046 case StatusCode::VariantAlsoNegotiates_506: return "Variant Also Negotiates";
2047 case StatusCode::InsufficientStorage_507: return "Insufficient Storage";
2048 case StatusCode::LoopDetected_508: return "Loop Detected";
2049 case StatusCode::NotExtended_510: return "Not Extended";
2050 case StatusCode::NetworkAuthenticationRequired_511:
2051 return "Network Authentication Required";
2052
2053 default:
2054 case StatusCode::InternalServerError_500: return "Internal Server Error";
2055 }
2056}
2057
2058inline std::string get_bearer_token_auth(const Request &req) {
2059 if (req.has_header("Authorization")) {
2060 static std::string BearerHeaderPrefix = "Bearer ";
2061 return req.get_header_value("Authorization")
2062 .substr(BearerHeaderPrefix.length());
2063 }
2064 return "";
2065}
2066
2067template <class Rep, class Period>
2068inline Server &
2069Server::set_read_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {
2070 detail::duration_to_sec_and_usec(
2071 duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) { set_read_timeout(sec, usec); });
2072 return *this;
2073}
2074
2075template <class Rep, class Period>
2076inline Server &
2077Server::set_write_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {
2078 detail::duration_to_sec_and_usec(
2079 duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) { set_write_timeout(sec, usec); });
2080 return *this;
2081}
2082
2083template <class Rep, class Period>
2084inline Server &
2085Server::set_idle_interval(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {
2086 detail::duration_to_sec_and_usec(
2087 duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) { set_idle_interval(sec, usec); });
2088 return *this;
2089}
2090
2091inline std::string to_string(const Error error) {
2092 switch (error) {
2093 case Error::Success: return "Success (no error)";
2094 case Error::Connection: return "Could not establish connection";
2095 case Error::BindIPAddress: return "Failed to bind IP address";
2096 case Error::Read: return "Failed to read connection";
2097 case Error::Write: return "Failed to write connection";
2098 case Error::ExceedRedirectCount: return "Maximum redirect count exceeded";
2099 case Error::Canceled: return "Connection handling canceled";
2100 case Error::SSLConnection: return "SSL connection failed";
2101 case Error::SSLLoadingCerts: return "SSL certificate loading failed";
2102 case Error::SSLServerVerification: return "SSL server verification failed";
2103 case Error::UnsupportedMultipartBoundaryChars:
2104 return "Unsupported HTTP multipart boundary characters";
2105 case Error::Compression: return "Compression failed";
2106 case Error::ConnectionTimeout: return "Connection timed out";
2107 case Error::ProxyConnection: return "Proxy connection failed";
2108 case Error::Unknown: return "Unknown";
2109 default: break;
2110 }
2111
2112 return "Invalid";
2113}
2114
2115inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Error &obj) {
2116 os << to_string(obj);
2117 os << " (" << static_cast<std::underlying_type<Error>::type>(obj) << ')';
2118 return os;
2119}
2120
2121inline uint64_t Result::get_request_header_value_u64(const std::string &key,
2122 size_t id) const {
2123 return detail::get_header_value_u64(request_headers_, key, id, 0);
2124}

2128 const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {
2129 detail::duration_to_sec_and_usec(duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) {
2130 set_connection_timeout(sec, usec);
2131 });
2132}

2138 duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) { set_read_timeout(sec, usec); });
2139}

2143 const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {

2145 duration, [&](time_t sec, time_t usec) { set_write_timeout(sec, usec); });
2146}

2150 const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {

2152}

2158}

2162Client::set_write_timeout(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> &duration) {

2246class BufferStream final : public Stream {
2247public:
2248 BufferStream() = default;
2249 ~BufferStream() override = default;
2250
2251 bool is_readable() const override;
2252 bool is_writable() const override;
2253 ssize_t read(char *ptr, size_t size) override;
2254 ssize_t write(const char *ptr, size_t size) override;
2255 void get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
2256 void get_local_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
2257 socket_t socket() const override;
2258
2259 const std::string &get_buffer() const;
2260
2261private:
2262 std::string buffer;
2263 size_t position = 0;
2264};
2265
2266class compressor {
2267public:
2268 virtual ~compressor() = default;
2269
2270 typedef std::function<bool(const char *data, size_t data_len)> Callback;
2271 virtual bool compress(const char *data, size_t data_length, bool last,
2272 Callback callback) = 0;
2273};
2274
2275class decompressor {
2276public:
2277 virtual ~decompressor() = default;
2278
2279 virtual bool is_valid() const = 0;
2280
2281 typedef std::function<bool(const char *data, size_t data_len)> Callback;
2282 virtual bool decompress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
2283 Callback callback) = 0;
2284};
2285
2286class nocompressor final : public compressor {
2287public:
2288 ~nocompressor() override = default;
2289
2290 bool compress(const char *data, size_t data_length, bool /*last*/,
2291 Callback callback) override;
2292};
2293
2294#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
2295class gzip_compressor final : public compressor {
2296public:
2297 gzip_compressor();
2298 ~gzip_compressor() override;
2299
2300 bool compress(const char *data, size_t data_length, bool last,
2301 Callback callback) override;
2302
2303private:
2304 bool is_valid_ = false;
2305 z_stream strm_;
2306};
2307
2308class gzip_decompressor final : public decompressor {
2309public:
2310 gzip_decompressor();
2311 ~gzip_decompressor() override;
2312
2313 bool is_valid() const override;
2314
2315 bool decompress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
2316 Callback callback) override;
2317
2318private:
2319 bool is_valid_ = false;
2320 z_stream strm_;
2321};
2322#endif
2323
2324#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
2325class brotli_compressor final : public compressor {
2326public:
2327 brotli_compressor();
2328 ~brotli_compressor();
2329
2330 bool compress(const char *data, size_t data_length, bool last,
2331 Callback callback) override;
2332
2333private:
2334 BrotliEncoderState *state_ = nullptr;
2335};
2336
2337class brotli_decompressor final : public decompressor {
2338public:
2339 brotli_decompressor();
2340 ~brotli_decompressor();
2341
2342 bool is_valid() const override;
2343
2344 bool decompress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
2345 Callback callback) override;
2346
2347private:
2348 BrotliDecoderResult decoder_r;
2349 BrotliDecoderState *decoder_s = nullptr;
2350};
2351#endif
2352
2353// NOTE: until the read size reaches `fixed_buffer_size`, use `fixed_buffer`
2354// to store data. The call can set memory on stack for performance.
2355class stream_line_reader {
2356public:
2357 stream_line_reader(Stream &strm, char *fixed_buffer,
2358 size_t fixed_buffer_size);
2359 const char *ptr() const;
2360 size_t size() const;
2361 bool end_with_crlf() const;
2362 bool getline();
2363
2364private:
2365 void append(char c);
2366
2367 Stream &strm_;
2368 char *fixed_buffer_;
2369 const size_t fixed_buffer_size_;
2370 size_t fixed_buffer_used_size_ = 0;
2371 std::string glowable_buffer_;
2372};
2373

2375public:

2385

2387#if defined(_WIN32)

2389 HANDLE hMapping_;
2390#else

2392#endif

2395};

2398
2399// ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2400
2401/*
2402 * Implementation that will be part of the .cc file if split into .h + .cc.
2403 */
2404
2405namespace detail {
2406
2407inline bool is_hex(char c, int &v) {
2408 if (0x20 <= c && isdigit(c)) {
2409 v = c - '0';
2410 return true;
2411 } else if ('A' <= c && c <= 'F') {
2412 v = c - 'A' + 10;
2413 return true;
2414 } else if ('a' <= c && c <= 'f') {
2415 v = c - 'a' + 10;
2416 return true;
2417 }
2418 return false;
2419}
2420
2421inline bool from_hex_to_i(const std::string &s, size_t i, size_t cnt,
2422 int &val) {
2423 if (i >= s.size()) { return false; }
2424
2425 val = 0;
2426 for (; cnt; i++, cnt--) {
2427 if (!s[i]) { return false; }
2428 auto v = 0;
2429 if (is_hex(s[i], v)) {
2430 val = val * 16 + v;
2431 } else {
2432 return false;
2433 }
2434 }
2435 return true;
2436}
2437
2438inline std::string from_i_to_hex(size_t n) {
2439 static const auto charset = "0123456789abcdef";
2440 std::string ret;
2441 do {
2442 ret = charset[n & 15] + ret;
2443 n >>= 4;
2444 } while (n > 0);
2445 return ret;
2446}
2447
2448inline size_t to_utf8(int code, char *buff) {
2449 if (code < 0x0080) {
2450 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(code & 0x7F);
2451 return 1;
2452 } else if (code < 0x0800) {
2453 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xC0 | ((code >> 6) & 0x1F));
2454 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (code & 0x3F));
2455 return 2;
2456 } else if (code < 0xD800) {
2457 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xE0 | ((code >> 12) & 0xF));
2458 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((code >> 6) & 0x3F));
2459 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (code & 0x3F));
2460 return 3;
2461 } else if (code < 0xE000) { // D800 - DFFF is invalid...
2462 return 0;
2463 } else if (code < 0x10000) {
2464 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xE0 | ((code >> 12) & 0xF));
2465 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((code >> 6) & 0x3F));
2466 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (code & 0x3F));
2467 return 3;
2468 } else if (code < 0x110000) {
2469 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xF0 | ((code >> 18) & 0x7));
2470 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((code >> 12) & 0x3F));
2471 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((code >> 6) & 0x3F));
2472 buff[3] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (code & 0x3F));
2473 return 4;
2474 }
2475
2476 // NOTREACHED
2477 return 0;
2478}
2479
2480// NOTE: This code came up with the following stackoverflow post:
2481// https://stackoverflow.com/questions/180947/base64-decode-snippet-in-c
2482inline std::string base64_encode(const std::string &in) {
2483 static const auto lookup =
2484 "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
2485
2486 std::string out;
2487 out.reserve(in.size());
2488
2489 auto val = 0;
2490 auto valb = -6;
2491
2492 for (auto c : in) {
2493 val = (val << 8) + static_cast<uint8_t>(c);
2494 valb += 8;
2495 while (valb >= 0) {
2496 out.push_back(lookup[(val >> valb) & 0x3F]);
2497 valb -= 6;
2498 }
2499 }
2500
2501 if (valb > -6) { out.push_back(lookup[((val << 8) >> (valb + 8)) & 0x3F]); }
2502
2503 while (out.size() % 4) {
2504 out.push_back('=');
2505 }
2506
2507 return out;
2508}
2509
2510inline bool is_file(const std::string &path) {
2511#ifdef _WIN32
2512 return _access_s(path.c_str(), 0) == 0;
2513#else
2514 struct stat st;
2515 return stat(path.c_str(), &st) >= 0 && S_ISREG(st.st_mode);
2516#endif
2517}
2518
2519inline bool is_dir(const std::string &path) {
2520 struct stat st;
2521 return stat(path.c_str(), &st) >= 0 && S_ISDIR(st.st_mode);
2522}
2523
2524inline bool is_valid_path(const std::string &path) {
2525 size_t level = 0;
2526 size_t i = 0;
2527
2528 // Skip slash
2529 while (i < path.size() && path[i] == '/') {
2530 i++;
2531 }
2532
2533 while (i < path.size()) {
2534 // Read component
2535 auto beg = i;
2536 while (i < path.size() && path[i] != '/') {
2537 if (path[i] == '\0') {
2538 return false;
2539 } else if (path[i] == '\\') {
2540 return false;
2541 }
2542 i++;
2543 }
2544
2545 auto len = i - beg;
2546 assert(len > 0);
2547
2548 if (!path.compare(beg, len, ".")) {
2549 ;
2550 } else if (!path.compare(beg, len, "..")) {
2551 if (level == 0) { return false; }
2552 level--;
2553 } else {
2554 level++;
2555 }
2556
2557 // Skip slash
2558 while (i < path.size() && path[i] == '/') {
2559 i++;
2560 }
2561 }
2562
2563 return true;
2564}
2565
2566inline std::string encode_query_param(const std::string &value) {
2567 std::ostringstream escaped;
2568 escaped.fill('0');
2569 escaped << std::hex;
2570
2571 for (auto c : value) {
2572 if (std::isalnum(static_cast<uint8_t>(c)) || c == '-' || c == '_' ||
2573 c == '.' || c == '!' || c == '~' || c == '*' || c == '\'' || c == '(' ||
2574 c == ')') {
2575 escaped << c;
2576 } else {
2577 escaped << std::uppercase;
2578 escaped << '%' << std::setw(2)
2579 << static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned char>(c));
2580 escaped << std::nouppercase;
2581 }
2582 }
2583
2584 return escaped.str();
2585}
2586
2587inline std::string encode_url(const std::string &s) {
2588 std::string result;
2589 result.reserve(s.size());
2590
2591 for (size_t i = 0; s[i]; i++) {
2592 switch (s[i]) {
2593 case ' ': result += "%20"; break;
2594 case '+': result += "%2B"; break;
2595 case '\r': result += "%0D"; break;
2596 case '\n': result += "%0A"; break;
2597 case '\'': result += "%27"; break;
2598 case ',': result += "%2C"; break;
2599 // case ':': result += "%3A"; break; // ok? probably...
2600 case ';': result += "%3B"; break;
2601 default:
2602 auto c = static_cast<uint8_t>(s[i]);
2603 if (c >= 0x80) {
2604 result += '%';
2605 char hex[4];
2606 auto len = snprintf(hex, sizeof(hex) - 1, "%02X", c);
2607 assert(len == 2);
2608 result.append(hex, static_cast<size_t>(len));
2609 } else {
2610 result += s[i];
2611 }
2612 break;
2613 }
2614 }
2615
2616 return result;
2617}
2618
2619inline std::string decode_url(const std::string &s,
2620 bool convert_plus_to_space) {
2621 std::string result;
2622
2623 for (size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
2624 if (s[i] == '%' && i + 1 < s.size()) {
2625 if (s[i + 1] == 'u') {
2626 auto val = 0;
2627 if (from_hex_to_i(s, i + 2, 4, val)) {
2628 // 4 digits Unicode codes
2629 char buff[4];
2630 size_t len = to_utf8(val, buff);
2631 if (len > 0) { result.append(buff, len); }
2632 i += 5; // 'u0000'
2633 } else {
2634 result += s[i];
2635 }
2636 } else {
2637 auto val = 0;
2638 if (from_hex_to_i(s, i + 1, 2, val)) {
2639 // 2 digits hex codes
2640 result += static_cast<char>(val);
2641 i += 2; // '00'
2642 } else {
2643 result += s[i];
2644 }
2645 }
2646 } else if (convert_plus_to_space && s[i] == '+') {
2647 result += ' ';
2648 } else {
2649 result += s[i];
2650 }
2651 }
2652
2653 return result;
2654}
2655
2656inline void read_file(const std::string &path, std::string &out) {
2657 std::ifstream fs(path, std::ios_base::binary);
2658 fs.seekg(0, std::ios_base::end);
2659 auto size = fs.tellg();
2660 fs.seekg(0);
2661 out.resize(static_cast<size_t>(size));
2662 fs.read(&out[0], static_cast<std::streamsize>(size));
2663}
2664
2665inline std::string file_extension(const std::string &path) {
2666 std::smatch m;
2667 static auto re = std::regex("\\.([a-zA-Z0-9]+)$");
2668 if (std::regex_search(path, m, re)) { return m[1].str(); }
2669 return std::string();
2670}
2671
2672inline bool is_space_or_tab(char c) { return c == ' ' || c == '\t'; }
2673
2674inline std::pair<size_t, size_t> trim(const char *b, const char *e, size_t left,
2675 size_t right) {
2676 while (b + left < e && is_space_or_tab(b[left])) {
2677 left++;
2678 }
2679 while (right > 0 && is_space_or_tab(b[right - 1])) {
2680 right--;
2681 }
2682 return std::make_pair(left, right);
2683}
2684
2685inline std::string trim_copy(const std::string &s) {
2686 auto r = trim(s.data(), s.data() + s.size(), 0, s.size());
2687 return s.substr(r.first, r.second - r.first);
2688}
2689
2690inline std::string trim_double_quotes_copy(const std::string &s) {
2691 if (s.length() >= 2 && s.front() == '"' && s.back() == '"') {
2692 return s.substr(1, s.size() - 2);
2693 }
2694 return s;
2695}
2696
2697inline void
2698divide(const char *data, std::size_t size, char d,
2699 std::function<void(const char *, std::size_t, const char *, std::size_t)>
2700 fn) {
2701 const auto it = std::find(data, data + size, d);
2702 const auto found = static_cast<std::size_t>(it != data + size);
2703 const auto lhs_data = data;
2704 const auto lhs_size = static_cast<std::size_t>(it - data);
2705 const auto rhs_data = it + found;
2706 const auto rhs_size = size - lhs_size - found;
2707
2708 fn(lhs_data, lhs_size, rhs_data, rhs_size);
2709}
2710
2711inline void
2712divide(const std::string &str, char d,
2713 std::function<void(const char *, std::size_t, const char *, std::size_t)>
2714 fn) {
2715 divide(str.data(), str.size(), d, std::move(fn));
2716}
2717
2718inline void split(const char *b, const char *e, char d,
2719 std::function<void(const char *, const char *)> fn) {
2720 return split(b, e, d, (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)(), std::move(fn));
2721}
2722
2723inline void split(const char *b, const char *e, char d, size_t m,
2724 std::function<void(const char *, const char *)> fn) {
2725 size_t i = 0;
2726 size_t beg = 0;
2727 size_t count = 1;
2728
2729 while (e ? (b + i < e) : (b[i] != '\0')) {
2730 if (b[i] == d && count < m) {
2731 auto r = trim(b, e, beg, i);
2732 if (r.first < r.second) { fn(&b[r.first], &b[r.second]); }
2733 beg = i + 1;
2734 count++;
2735 }
2736 i++;
2737 }
2738
2739 if (i) {
2740 auto r = trim(b, e, beg, i);
2741 if (r.first < r.second) { fn(&b[r.first], &b[r.second]); }
2742 }
2743}
2744
2745inline stream_line_reader::stream_line_reader(Stream &strm, char *fixed_buffer,
2746 size_t fixed_buffer_size)
2747 : strm_(strm), fixed_buffer_(fixed_buffer),
2748 fixed_buffer_size_(fixed_buffer_size) {}
2749
2750inline const char *stream_line_reader::ptr() const {
2751 if (glowable_buffer_.empty()) {
2752 return fixed_buffer_;
2753 } else {
2754 return glowable_buffer_.data();
2755 }
2756}
2757
2758inline size_t stream_line_reader::size() const {
2759 if (glowable_buffer_.empty()) {
2760 return fixed_buffer_used_size_;
2761 } else {
2762 return glowable_buffer_.size();
2763 }
2764}
2765
2766inline bool stream_line_reader::end_with_crlf() const {
2767 auto end = ptr() + size();
2768 return size() >= 2 && end[-2] == '\r' && end[-1] == '\n';
2769}
2770
2771inline bool stream_line_reader::getline() {
2772 fixed_buffer_used_size_ = 0;
2773 glowable_buffer_.clear();
2774
2775 for (size_t i = 0;; i++) {
2776 char byte;
2777 auto n = strm_.read(&byte, 1);
2778
2779 if (n < 0) {
2780 return false;
2781 } else if (n == 0) {
2782 if (i == 0) {
2783 return false;
2784 } else {
2785 break;
2786 }
2787 }
2788
2789 append(byte);
2790
2791 if (byte == '\n') { break; }
2792 }
2793
2794 return true;
2795}
2796
2797inline void stream_line_reader::append(char c) {
2798 if (fixed_buffer_used_size_ < fixed_buffer_size_ - 1) {
2799 fixed_buffer_[fixed_buffer_used_size_++] = c;
2800 fixed_buffer_[fixed_buffer_used_size_] = '\0';
2801 } else {
2802 if (glowable_buffer_.empty()) {
2803 assert(fixed_buffer_[fixed_buffer_used_size_] == '\0');
2804 glowable_buffer_.assign(fixed_buffer_, fixed_buffer_used_size_);
2805 }
2806 glowable_buffer_ += c;
2807 }
2808}
2809
2810inline mmap::mmap(const char *path)
2811#if defined(_WIN32)
2812 : hFile_(NULL), hMapping_(NULL)
2813#else
2814 : fd_(-1)
2815#endif
2816 ,
2817 size_(0), addr_(nullptr) {
2818 open(path);
2819}
2820
2821inline mmap::~mmap() { close(); }
2822
2823inline bool mmap::open(const char *path) {
2824 close();
2825
2826#if defined(_WIN32)
2827 std::wstring wpath;
2828 for (size_t i = 0; i < strlen(path); i++) {
2829 wpath += path[i];
2830 }
2831
2832#if WINAPI_FAMILY_PARTITION(WINAPI_PARTITION_APP | WINAPI_PARTITION_SYSTEM | \
2833 WINAPI_PARTITION_GAMES) && \
2834 (_WIN32_WINNT >= _WIN32_WINNT_WIN8)
2835 hFile_ = ::CreateFile2(wpath.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
2836 OPEN_EXISTING, NULL);
2837#else
2838 hFile_ = ::CreateFileW(wpath.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
2839 OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
2840#endif
2841
2842 if (hFile_ == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) { return false; }
2843
2844#if WINAPI_FAMILY_PARTITION(WINAPI_PARTITION_APP | WINAPI_PARTITION_SYSTEM | \
2845 WINAPI_PARTITION_GAMES)
2846 LARGE_INTEGER size{};
2847 if (!::GetFileSizeEx(hFile_, &size)) { return false; }
2848 size_ = static_cast<size_t>(size.QuadPart);
2849#else
2850 DWORD sizeHigh;
2851 DWORD sizeLow;
2852 sizeLow = ::GetFileSize(hFile_, &sizeHigh);
2853 if (sizeLow == INVALID_FILE_SIZE) { return false; }
2854 size_ = (static_cast<size_t>(sizeHigh) << (sizeof(DWORD) * 8)) | sizeLow;
2855#endif
2856
2857#if WINAPI_FAMILY_PARTITION(WINAPI_PARTITION_APP | WINAPI_PARTITION_SYSTEM) && \
2858 (_WIN32_WINNT >= _WIN32_WINNT_WIN8)
2859 hMapping_ =
2860 ::CreateFileMappingFromApp(hFile_, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, size_, NULL);
2861#else
2862 hMapping_ = ::CreateFileMappingW(hFile_, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, size.HighPart,
2863 size.LowPart, NULL);
2864#endif
2865
2866 if (hMapping_ == NULL) {
2867 close();
2868 return false;
2869 }
2870
2871#if WINAPI_FAMILY_PARTITION(WINAPI_PARTITION_APP | WINAPI_PARTITION_SYSTEM) && \
2872 (_WIN32_WINNT >= _WIN32_WINNT_WIN8)
2873 addr_ = ::MapViewOfFileFromApp(hMapping_, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0);
2874#else
2875 addr_ = ::MapViewOfFile(hMapping_, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
2876#endif
2877#else
2878 fd_ = ::open(path, O_RDONLY);
2879 if (fd_ == -1) { return false; }
2880
2881 struct stat sb;
2882 if (fstat(fd_, &sb) == -1) {
2883 close();
2884 return false;
2885 }
2886 size_ = static_cast<size_t>(sb.st_size);
2887
2888 addr_ = ::mmap(NULL, size_, PROT_READ, MAP_PRIVATE, fd_, 0);
2889#endif
2890
2891 if (addr_ == nullptr) {
2892 close();
2893 return false;
2894 }
2895
2896 return true;
2897}
2898
2899inline bool mmap::is_open() const { return addr_ != nullptr; }
2900
2901inline size_t mmap::size() const { return size_; }
2902
2903inline const char *mmap::data() const {
2904 return static_cast<const char *>(addr_);
2905}
2906
2907inline void mmap::close() {
2908#if defined(_WIN32)
2909 if (addr_) {
2910 ::UnmapViewOfFile(addr_);
2911 addr_ = nullptr;
2912 }
2913
2914 if (hMapping_) {
2915 ::CloseHandle(hMapping_);
2916 hMapping_ = NULL;
2917 }
2918
2919 if (hFile_ != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
2920 ::CloseHandle(hFile_);
2921 hFile_ = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
2922 }
2923#else
2924 if (addr_ != nullptr) {
2925 munmap(addr_, size_);
2926 addr_ = nullptr;
2927 }
2928
2929 if (fd_ != -1) {
2930 ::close(fd_);
2931 fd_ = -1;
2932 }
2933#endif
2934 size_ = 0;
2935}
2936inline int close_socket(socket_t sock) {
2937#ifdef _WIN32
2938 return closesocket(sock);
2939#else
2940 return close(sock);
2941#endif
2942}
2943
2944template <typename T> inline ssize_t handle_EINTR(T fn) {
2945 ssize_t res = 0;
2946 while (true) {
2947 res = fn();
2948 if (res < 0 && errno == EINTR) { continue; }
2949 break;
2950 }
2951 return res;
2952}
2953
2954inline ssize_t read_socket(socket_t sock, void *ptr, size_t size, int flags) {
2955 return handle_EINTR([&]() {
2956 return recv(sock,
2957#ifdef _WIN32
