2958 static_cast<char *>(ptr), static_cast<int>(size),
2959#else
2960 ptr, size,
2961#endif
2962 flags);
2963 });
2964}
2965
2966inline ssize_t send_socket(socket_t sock, const void *ptr, size_t size,
2967 int flags) {
2968 return handle_EINTR([&]() {
2969 return send(sock,
2970#ifdef _WIN32
2971 static_cast<const char *>(ptr), static_cast<int>(size),
2972#else
2973 ptr, size,
2974#endif
2975 flags);
2976 });
2977}
2978
2979inline ssize_t select_read(socket_t sock, time_t sec, time_t usec) {
2980#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_USE_POLL
2981 struct pollfd pfd_read;
2982 pfd_read.fd = sock;
2983 pfd_read.events = POLLIN;
2984
2985 auto timeout = static_cast<int>(sec * 1000 + usec / 1000);
2986
2987 return handle_EINTR([&]() { return poll(&pfd_read, 1, timeout); });
2988#else
2989#ifndef _WIN32
2990 if (sock >= FD_SETSIZE) { return -1; }
2991#endif
2992
2993 fd_set fds;
2994 FD_ZERO(&fds);
2995 FD_SET(sock, &fds);
2996
2997 timeval tv;
2998 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(sec);
2999 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(usec);
3000
3001 return handle_EINTR([&]() {
3002 return select(static_cast<int>(sock + 1), &fds, nullptr, nullptr, &tv);
3003 });
3004#endif
3005}
3006
3007inline ssize_t select_write(socket_t sock, time_t sec, time_t usec) {
3008#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_USE_POLL
3009 struct pollfd pfd_read;
3010 pfd_read.fd = sock;
3011 pfd_read.events = POLLOUT;
3012
3013 auto timeout = static_cast<int>(sec * 1000 + usec / 1000);
3014
3015 return handle_EINTR([&]() { return poll(&pfd_read, 1, timeout); });
3016#else
3017#ifndef _WIN32
3018 if (sock >= FD_SETSIZE) { return -1; }
3019#endif
3020
3021 fd_set fds;
3022 FD_ZERO(&fds);
3023 FD_SET(sock, &fds);
3024
3025 timeval tv;
3026 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(sec);
3027 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(usec);
3028
3029 return handle_EINTR([&]() {
3030 return select(static_cast<int>(sock + 1), nullptr, &fds, nullptr, &tv);
3031 });
3032#endif
3033}
3034
3035inline Error wait_until_socket_is_ready(socket_t sock, time_t sec,
3036 time_t usec) {
3037#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_USE_POLL
3038 struct pollfd pfd_read;
3039 pfd_read.fd = sock;
3040 pfd_read.events = POLLIN | POLLOUT;
3041
3042 auto timeout = static_cast<int>(sec * 1000 + usec / 1000);
3043
3044 auto poll_res = handle_EINTR([&]() { return poll(&pfd_read, 1, timeout); });
3045
3046 if (poll_res == 0) { return Error::ConnectionTimeout; }
3047
3048 if (poll_res > 0 && pfd_read.revents & (POLLIN | POLLOUT)) {
3049 auto error = 0;
3050 socklen_t len = sizeof(error);
3051 auto res = getsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR,
3052 reinterpret_cast<char *>(&error), &len);
3053 auto successful = res >= 0 && !error;
3054 return successful ? Error::Success : Error::Connection;
3055 }
3056
3057 return Error::Connection;
3058#else
3059#ifndef _WIN32
3060 if (sock >= FD_SETSIZE) { return Error::Connection; }
3061#endif
3062
3063 fd_set fdsr;
3064 FD_ZERO(&fdsr);
3065 FD_SET(sock, &fdsr);
3066
3067 auto fdsw = fdsr;
3068 auto fdse = fdsr;
3069
3070 timeval tv;
3071 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(sec);
3072 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(usec);
3073
3074 auto ret = handle_EINTR([&]() {
3075 return select(static_cast<int>(sock + 1), &fdsr, &fdsw, &fdse, &tv);
3076 });
3077
3078 if (ret == 0) { return Error::ConnectionTimeout; }
3079
3080 if (ret > 0 && (FD_ISSET(sock, &fdsr) || FD_ISSET(sock, &fdsw))) {
3081 auto error = 0;
3082 socklen_t len = sizeof(error);
3083 auto res = getsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR,
3084 reinterpret_cast<char *>(&error), &len);
3085 auto successful = res >= 0 && !error;
3086 return successful ? Error::Success : Error::Connection;
3087 }
3088 return Error::Connection;
3089#endif
3090}
3091
3092inline bool is_socket_alive(socket_t sock) {
3093 const auto val = detail::select_read(sock, 0, 0);
3094 if (val == 0) {
3095 return true;
3096 } else if (val < 0 && errno == EBADF) {
3097 return false;
3098 }
3099 char buf[1];
3100 return detail::read_socket(sock, &buf[0], sizeof(buf), MSG_PEEK) > 0;
3101}
3102
3103class SocketStream final : public Stream {
3104public:
3105 SocketStream(socket_t sock, time_t read_timeout_sec, time_t read_timeout_usec,
3106 time_t write_timeout_sec, time_t write_timeout_usec);
3107 ~SocketStream() override;
3108
3109 bool is_readable() const override;
3110 bool is_writable() const override;
3111 ssize_t read(char *ptr, size_t size) override;
3112 ssize_t write(const char *ptr, size_t size) override;
3113 void get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
3114 void get_local_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
3115 socket_t socket() const override;
3116
3117private:
3118 socket_t sock_;
3119 time_t read_timeout_sec_;
3120 time_t read_timeout_usec_;
3121 time_t write_timeout_sec_;
3122 time_t write_timeout_usec_;
3123
3124 std::vector<char> read_buff_;
3125 size_t read_buff_off_ = 0;
3126 size_t read_buff_content_size_ = 0;
3127
3128 static const size_t read_buff_size_ = 1024l * 4;
3129};
3130
3131#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
3132class SSLSocketStream final : public Stream {
3133public:
3134 SSLSocketStream(socket_t sock, SSL *ssl, time_t read_timeout_sec,
3135 time_t read_timeout_usec, time_t write_timeout_sec,
3136 time_t write_timeout_usec);
3137 ~SSLSocketStream() override;
3138
3139 bool is_readable() const override;
3140 bool is_writable() const override;
3141 ssize_t read(char *ptr, size_t size) override;
3142 ssize_t write(const char *ptr, size_t size) override;
3143 void get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
3144 void get_local_ip_and_port(std::string &ip, int &port) const override;
3145 socket_t socket() const override;
3146
3147private:
3148 socket_t sock_;
3149 SSL *ssl_;
3150 time_t read_timeout_sec_;
3151 time_t read_timeout_usec_;
3152 time_t write_timeout_sec_;
3153 time_t write_timeout_usec_;
3154};
3155#endif
3156
3157inline bool keep_alive(socket_t sock, time_t keep_alive_timeout_sec) {
3158 using namespace std::chrono;
3159 auto start = steady_clock::now();
3160 while (true) {
3161 auto val = select_read(sock, 0, 10000);
3162 if (val < 0) {
3163 return false;
3164 } else if (val == 0) {
3165 auto current = steady_clock::now();
3166 auto duration = duration_cast<milliseconds>(current - start);
3167 auto timeout = keep_alive_timeout_sec * 1000;
3168 if (duration.count() > timeout) { return false; }
3169 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(1));
3170 } else {
3171 return true;
3172 }
3173 }
3174}
3175
3176template <typename T>
3177inline bool
3178process_server_socket_core(const std::atomic<socket_t> &svr_sock, socket_t sock,
3179 size_t keep_alive_max_count,
3180 time_t keep_alive_timeout_sec, T callback) {
3181 assert(keep_alive_max_count > 0);
3182 auto ret = false;
3183 auto count = keep_alive_max_count;
3184 while (svr_sock != INVALID_SOCKET && count > 0 &&
3185 keep_alive(sock, keep_alive_timeout_sec)) {
3186 auto close_connection = count == 1;
3187 auto connection_closed = false;
3188 ret = callback(close_connection, connection_closed);
3189 if (!ret || connection_closed) { break; }
3190 count--;
3191 }
3192 return ret;
3193}
3194
3195template <typename T>
3196inline bool
3197process_server_socket(const std::atomic<socket_t> &svr_sock, socket_t sock,
3198 size_t keep_alive_max_count,
3199 time_t keep_alive_timeout_sec, time_t read_timeout_sec,
3200 time_t read_timeout_usec, time_t write_timeout_sec,
3201 time_t write_timeout_usec, T callback) {
3202 return process_server_socket_core(
3203 svr_sock, sock, keep_alive_max_count, keep_alive_timeout_sec,
3204 [&](bool close_connection, bool &connection_closed) {
3205 SocketStream strm(sock, read_timeout_sec, read_timeout_usec,
3206 write_timeout_sec, write_timeout_usec);
3207 return callback(strm, close_connection, connection_closed);
3208 });
3209}
3210
3211inline bool process_client_socket(socket_t sock, time_t read_timeout_sec,
3212 time_t read_timeout_usec,
3213 time_t write_timeout_sec,
3214 time_t write_timeout_usec,
3215 std::function<bool(Stream &)> callback) {
3216 SocketStream strm(sock, read_timeout_sec, read_timeout_usec,
3217 write_timeout_sec, write_timeout_usec);
3218 return callback(strm);
3219}
3220
3221inline int shutdown_socket(socket_t sock) {
3222#ifdef _WIN32
3223 return shutdown(sock, SD_BOTH);
3224#else
3225 return shutdown(sock, SHUT_RDWR);
3226#endif
3227}
3228
3229template <typename BindOrConnect>
3230socket_t create_socket(const std::string &host, const std::string &ip, int port,
3231 int address_family, int socket_flags, bool tcp_nodelay,
3232 SocketOptions socket_options,
3233 BindOrConnect bind_or_connect) {
3234 // Get address info
3235 const char *node = nullptr;
3236 struct addrinfo hints;
3237 struct addrinfo *result;
3238
3239 memset(&hints, 0, sizeof(struct addrinfo));
3240 hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
3241 hints.ai_protocol = 0;
3242
3243 if (!ip.empty()) {
3244 node = ip.c_str();
3245 // Ask getaddrinfo to convert IP in c-string to address
3246 hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
3247 hints.ai_flags = AI_NUMERICHOST;
3248 } else {
3249 if (!host.empty()) { node = host.c_str(); }
3250 hints.ai_family = address_family;
3251 hints.ai_flags = socket_flags;
3252 }
3253
3254#ifndef _WIN32
3255 if (hints.ai_family == AF_UNIX) {
3256 const auto addrlen = host.length();
3257 if (addrlen > sizeof(sockaddr_un::sun_path)) { return INVALID_SOCKET; }
3258
3259#ifdef SOCK_CLOEXEC
3260 auto sock = socket(hints.ai_family, hints.ai_socktype | SOCK_CLOEXEC,
3261 hints.ai_protocol);
3262#else
3263 auto sock = socket(hints.ai_family, hints.ai_socktype, hints.ai_protocol);
3264#endif
3265
3266 if (sock != INVALID_SOCKET) {
3267 sockaddr_un addr{};
3268 addr.sun_family = AF_UNIX;
3269 std::copy(host.begin(), host.end(), addr.sun_path);
3270
3271 hints.ai_addr = reinterpret_cast<sockaddr *>(&addr);
3272 hints.ai_addrlen = static_cast<socklen_t>(
3273 sizeof(addr) - sizeof(addr.sun_path) + addrlen);
3274
3275#ifndef SOCK_CLOEXEC
3276 fcntl(sock, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
3277#endif
3278
3279 if (socket_options) { socket_options(sock); }
3280
3281 bool dummy;
3282 if (!bind_or_connect(sock, hints, dummy)) {
3283 close_socket(sock);
3284 sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
3285 }
3286 }
3287 return sock;
3288 }
3289#endif
3290
3291 auto service = std::to_string(port);
3292
3293 if (getaddrinfo(node, service.c_str(), &hints, &result)) {
3294#if defined __linux__ && !defined __ANDROID__
3295 res_init();
3296#endif
3297 return INVALID_SOCKET;
3298 }
3299
3300 for (auto rp = result; rp; rp = rp->ai_next) {
3301 // Create a socket
3302#ifdef _WIN32
3303 auto sock =
3304 WSASocketW(rp->ai_family, rp->ai_socktype, rp->ai_protocol, nullptr, 0,
3305 WSA_FLAG_NO_HANDLE_INHERIT | WSA_FLAG_OVERLAPPED);
3320 if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) {
3321 sock = socket(rp->ai_family, rp->ai_socktype, rp->ai_protocol);
3322 }
3323#else
3324
3325#ifdef SOCK_CLOEXEC
3326 auto sock =
3327 socket(rp->ai_family, rp->ai_socktype | SOCK_CLOEXEC, rp->ai_protocol);
3328#else
3329 auto sock = socket(rp->ai_family, rp->ai_socktype, rp->ai_protocol);
3330#endif
3331
3332#endif
3333 if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { continue; }
3334
3335#if !defined _WIN32 && !defined SOCK_CLOEXEC
3336 if (fcntl(sock, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC) == -1) {
3337 close_socket(sock);
3338 continue;
3339 }
3340#endif
3341
3342 if (tcp_nodelay) {
3343 auto yes = 1;
3344#ifdef _WIN32
3345 setsockopt(sock, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY,
3346 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
3347#else
3348 setsockopt(sock, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY,
3349 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&yes), sizeof(yes));
3350#endif
3351 }
3352
3353 if (socket_options) { socket_options(sock); }
3354
3355 if (rp->ai_family == AF_INET6) {
3356 auto no = 0;
3357#ifdef _WIN32
3358 setsockopt(sock, IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_V6ONLY,
3359 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&no), sizeof(no));
3360#else
3361 setsockopt(sock, IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_V6ONLY,
3362 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&no), sizeof(no));
3363#endif
3364 }
3365
3366 // bind or connect
3367 auto quit = false;
3368 if (bind_or_connect(sock, *rp, quit)) {
3369 freeaddrinfo(result);
3370 return sock;
3371 }
3372
3373 close_socket(sock);
3374
3375 if (quit) { break; }
3376 }
3377
3378 freeaddrinfo(result);
3379 return INVALID_SOCKET;
3380}
3381
3382inline void set_nonblocking(socket_t sock, bool nonblocking) {
3383#ifdef _WIN32
3384 auto flags = nonblocking ? 1UL : 0UL;
3385 ioctlsocket(sock, FIONBIO, &flags);
3386#else
3387 auto flags = fcntl(sock, F_GETFL, 0);
3388 fcntl(sock, F_SETFL,
3389 nonblocking ? (flags | O_NONBLOCK) : (flags & (~O_NONBLOCK)));
3390#endif
3391}
3392
3393inline bool is_connection_error() {
3394#ifdef _WIN32
3395 return WSAGetLastError() != WSAEWOULDBLOCK;
3396#else
3397 return errno != EINPROGRESS;
3398#endif
3399}
3400
3401inline bool bind_ip_address(socket_t sock, const std::string &host) {
3402 struct addrinfo hints;
3403 struct addrinfo *result;
3404
3405 memset(&hints, 0, sizeof(struct addrinfo));
3406 hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
3407 hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
3408 hints.ai_protocol = 0;
3409
3410 if (getaddrinfo(host.c_str(), "0", &hints, &result)) { return false; }
3411
3412 auto ret = false;
3413 for (auto rp = result; rp; rp = rp->ai_next) {
3414 const auto &ai = *rp;
3415 if (!::bind(sock, ai.ai_addr, static_cast<socklen_t>(ai.ai_addrlen))) {
3416 ret = true;
3417 break;
3418 }
3419 }
3420
3421 freeaddrinfo(result);
3422 return ret;
3423}
3424
3425#if !defined _WIN32 && !defined ANDROID && !defined _AIX && !defined __MVS__
3426#define USE_IF2IP
3427#endif
3428
3429#ifdef USE_IF2IP
3430inline std::string if2ip(int address_family, const std::string &ifn) {
3431 struct ifaddrs *ifap;
3432 getifaddrs(&ifap);
3433 std::string addr_candidate;
3434 for (auto ifa = ifap; ifa; ifa = ifa->ifa_next) {
3435 if (ifa->ifa_addr && ifn == ifa->ifa_name &&
3436 (AF_UNSPEC == address_family ||
3437 ifa->ifa_addr->sa_family == address_family)) {
3438 if (ifa->ifa_addr->sa_family == AF_INET) {
3439 auto sa = reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in *>(ifa->ifa_addr);
3440 char buf[INET_ADDRSTRLEN];
3441 if (inet_ntop(AF_INET, &sa->sin_addr, buf, INET_ADDRSTRLEN)) {
3442 freeifaddrs(ifap);
3443 return std::string(buf, INET_ADDRSTRLEN);
3444 }
3445 } else if (ifa->ifa_addr->sa_family == AF_INET6) {
3446 auto sa = reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in6 *>(ifa->ifa_addr);
3447 if (!IN6_IS_ADDR_LINKLOCAL(&sa->sin6_addr)) {
3448 char buf[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN] = {};
3449 if (inet_ntop(AF_INET6, &sa->sin6_addr, buf, INET6_ADDRSTRLEN)) {
3450 // equivalent to mac's IN6_IS_ADDR_UNIQUE_LOCAL
3451 auto s6_addr_head = sa->sin6_addr.s6_addr[0];
3452 if (s6_addr_head == 0xfc || s6_addr_head == 0xfd) {
3453 addr_candidate = std::string(buf, INET6_ADDRSTRLEN);
3454 } else {
3455 freeifaddrs(ifap);
3456 return std::string(buf, INET6_ADDRSTRLEN);
3457 }
3458 }
3459 }
3460 }
3461 }
3462 }
3463 freeifaddrs(ifap);
3464 return addr_candidate;
3465}
3466#endif
3467
3468inline socket_t create_client_socket(
3469 const std::string &host, const std::string &ip, int port,
3470 int address_family, bool tcp_nodelay, SocketOptions socket_options,
3471 time_t connection_timeout_sec, time_t connection_timeout_usec,
3472 time_t read_timeout_sec, time_t read_timeout_usec, time_t write_timeout_sec,
3473 time_t write_timeout_usec, const std::string &intf, Error &error) {
3474 auto sock = create_socket(
3475 host, ip, port, address_family, 0, tcp_nodelay, std::move(socket_options),
3476 [&](socket_t sock2, struct addrinfo &ai, bool &quit) -> bool {
3477 if (!intf.empty()) {
3478#ifdef USE_IF2IP
3479 auto ip_from_if = if2ip(address_family, intf);
3480 if (ip_from_if.empty()) { ip_from_if = intf; }
3481 if (!bind_ip_address(sock2, ip_from_if)) {
3482 error = Error::BindIPAddress;
3483 return false;
3484 }
3485#endif
3486 }
3487
3488 set_nonblocking(sock2, true);
3489
3490 auto ret =
3491 ::connect(sock2, ai.ai_addr, static_cast<socklen_t>(ai.ai_addrlen));
3492
3493 if (ret < 0) {
3494 if (is_connection_error()) {
3495 error = Error::Connection;
3496 return false;
3497 }
3498 error = wait_until_socket_is_ready(sock2, connection_timeout_sec,
3499 connection_timeout_usec);
3500 if (error != Error::Success) {
3501 if (error == Error::ConnectionTimeout) { quit = true; }
3502 return false;
3503 }
3504 }
3505
3506 set_nonblocking(sock2, false);
3507
3508 {
3509#ifdef _WIN32
3510 auto timeout = static_cast<uint32_t>(read_timeout_sec * 1000 +
3511 read_timeout_usec / 1000);
3512 setsockopt(sock2, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
3513 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&timeout), sizeof(timeout));
3514#else
3515 timeval tv;
3516 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(read_timeout_sec);
3517 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(read_timeout_usec);
3518 setsockopt(sock2, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
3519 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&tv), sizeof(tv));
3520#endif
3521 }
3522 {
3523
3524#ifdef _WIN32
3525 auto timeout = static_cast<uint32_t>(write_timeout_sec * 1000 +
3526 write_timeout_usec / 1000);
3527 setsockopt(sock2, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO,
3528 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&timeout), sizeof(timeout));
3529#else
3530 timeval tv;
3531 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(write_timeout_sec);
3532 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(write_timeout_usec);
3533 setsockopt(sock2, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO,
3534 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&tv), sizeof(tv));
3535#endif
3536 }
3537
3538 error = Error::Success;
3539 return true;
3540 });
3541
3542 if (sock != INVALID_SOCKET) {
3543 error = Error::Success;
3544 } else {
3545 if (error == Error::Success) { error = Error::Connection; }
3546 }
3547
3548 return sock;
3549}
3550
3551inline bool get_ip_and_port(const struct sockaddr_storage &addr,
3552 socklen_t addr_len, std::string &ip, int &port) {
3553 if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET) {
3554 port = ntohs(reinterpret_cast<const struct sockaddr_in *>(&addr)->sin_port);
3555 } else if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET6) {
3556 port =
3557 ntohs(reinterpret_cast<const struct sockaddr_in6 *>(&addr)->sin6_port);
3558 } else {
3559 return false;
3560 }
3561
3562 std::array<char, NI_MAXHOST> ipstr{};
3563 if (getnameinfo(reinterpret_cast<const struct sockaddr *>(&addr), addr_len,
3564 ipstr.data(), static_cast<socklen_t>(ipstr.size()), nullptr,
3565 0, NI_NUMERICHOST)) {
3566 return false;
3567 }
3568
3569 ip = ipstr.data();
3570 return true;
3571}
3572
3573inline void get_local_ip_and_port(socket_t sock, std::string &ip, int &port) {
3574 struct sockaddr_storage addr;
3575 socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
3576 if (!getsockname(sock, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&addr),
3577 &addr_len)) {
3578 get_ip_and_port(addr, addr_len, ip, port);
3579 }
3580}
3581
3582inline void get_remote_ip_and_port(socket_t sock, std::string &ip, int &port) {
3583 struct sockaddr_storage addr;
3584 socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
3585
3586 if (!getpeername(sock, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&addr),
3587 &addr_len)) {
3588#ifndef _WIN32
3589 if (addr.ss_family == AF_UNIX) {
3590#if defined(__linux__)
3591 struct ucred ucred;
3592 socklen_t len = sizeof(ucred);
3593 if (getsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_PEERCRED, &ucred, &len) == 0) {
3594 port = ucred.pid;
3595 }
3596#elif defined(SOL_LOCAL) && defined(SO_PEERPID) // __APPLE__
3597 pid_t pid;
3598 socklen_t len = sizeof(pid);
3599 if (getsockopt(sock, SOL_LOCAL, SO_PEERPID, &pid, &len) == 0) {
3600 port = pid;
3601 }
3602#endif
3603 return;
3604 }
3605#endif
3606 get_ip_and_port(addr, addr_len, ip, port);
3607 }
3608}
3609
3610inline constexpr unsigned int str2tag_core(const char *s, size_t l,
3611 unsigned int h) {
3612 return (l == 0)
3613 ? h
3614 : str2tag_core(
3615 s + 1, l - 1,
3616 // Unsets the 6 high bits of h, therefore no overflow happens
3617 (((std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::max)() >> 6) &
3618 h * 33) ^
3619 static_cast<unsigned char>(*s));
3620}
3621
3622inline unsigned int str2tag(const std::string &s) {
3623 return str2tag_core(s.data(), s.size(), 0);
3624}
3625
3626namespace udl {
3627
3628inline constexpr unsigned int operator"" _t(const char *s, size_t l) {
3629 return str2tag_core(s, l, 0);
3630}
3631
3632} // namespace udl
3633
3634inline std::string
3635find_content_type(const std::string &path,
3636 const std::map<std::string, std::string> &user_data,
3637 const std::string &default_content_type) {
3638 auto ext = file_extension(path);
3639
3640 auto it = user_data.find(ext);
3641 if (it != user_data.end()) { return it->second; }
3642
3643 using udl::operator""_t;
3644
3645 switch (str2tag(ext)) {
3646 default: return default_content_type;
3647
3648 case "css"_t: return "text/css";
3649 case "csv"_t: return "text/csv";
3650 case "htm"_t:
3651 case "html"_t: return "text/html";
3652 case "js"_t:
3653 case "mjs"_t: return "text/javascript";
3654 case "txt"_t: return "text/plain";
3655 case "vtt"_t: return "text/vtt";
3656
3657 case "apng"_t: return "image/apng";
3658 case "avif"_t: return "image/avif";
3659 case "bmp"_t: return "image/bmp";
3660 case "gif"_t: return "image/gif";
3661 case "png"_t: return "image/png";
3662 case "svg"_t: return "image/svg+xml";
3663 case "webp"_t: return "image/webp";
3664 case "ico"_t: return "image/x-icon";
3665 case "tif"_t: return "image/tiff";
3666 case "tiff"_t: return "image/tiff";
3667 case "jpg"_t:
3668 case "jpeg"_t: return "image/jpeg";
3669
3670 case "mp4"_t: return "video/mp4";
3671 case "mpeg"_t: return "video/mpeg";
3672 case "webm"_t: return "video/webm";
3673
3674 case "mp3"_t: return "audio/mp3";
3675 case "mpga"_t: return "audio/mpeg";
3676 case "weba"_t: return "audio/webm";
3677 case "wav"_t: return "audio/wave";
3678
3679 case "otf"_t: return "font/otf";
3680 case "ttf"_t: return "font/ttf";
3681 case "woff"_t: return "font/woff";
3682 case "woff2"_t: return "font/woff2";
3683
3684 case "7z"_t: return "application/x-7z-compressed";
3685 case "atom"_t: return "application/atom+xml";
3686 case "pdf"_t: return "application/pdf";
3687 case "json"_t: return "application/json";
3688 case "rss"_t: return "application/rss+xml";
3689 case "tar"_t: return "application/x-tar";
3690 case "xht"_t:
3691 case "xhtml"_t: return "application/xhtml+xml";
3692 case "xslt"_t: return "application/xslt+xml";
3693 case "xml"_t: return "application/xml";
3694 case "gz"_t: return "application/gzip";
3695 case "zip"_t: return "application/zip";
3696 case "wasm"_t: return "application/wasm";
3697 }
3698}
3699
3700inline bool can_compress_content_type(const std::string &content_type) {
3701 using udl::operator""_t;
3702
3703 auto tag = str2tag(content_type);
3704
3705 switch (tag) {
3706 case "image/svg+xml"_t:
3707 case "application/javascript"_t:
3708 case "application/json"_t:
3709 case "application/xml"_t:
3710 case "application/protobuf"_t:
3711 case "application/xhtml+xml"_t: return true;
3712
3713 default:
3714 return !content_type.rfind("text/", 0) && tag != "text/event-stream"_t;
3715 }
3716}
3717
3718inline EncodingType encoding_type(const Request &req, const Response &res) {
3719 auto ret =
3720 detail::can_compress_content_type(res.get_header_value("Content-Type"));
3721 if (!ret) { return EncodingType::None; }
3722
3723 const auto &s = req.get_header_value("Accept-Encoding");
3724 (void)(s);
3725
3726#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
3727 // TODO: 'Accept-Encoding' has br, not br;q=0
3728 ret = s.find("br") != std::string::npos;
3729 if (ret) { return EncodingType::Brotli; }
3730#endif
3731
3732#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
3733 // TODO: 'Accept-Encoding' has gzip, not gzip;q=0
3734 ret = s.find("gzip") != std::string::npos;
3735 if (ret) { return EncodingType::Gzip; }
3736#endif
3737
3738 return EncodingType::None;
3739}
3740
3741inline bool nocompressor::compress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
3742 bool /*last*/, Callback callback) {
3743 if (!data_length) { return true; }
3744 return callback(data, data_length);
3745}
3746
3747#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
3748inline gzip_compressor::gzip_compressor() {
3749 std::memset(&strm_, 0, sizeof(strm_));
3750 strm_.zalloc = Z_NULL;
3751 strm_.zfree = Z_NULL;
3752 strm_.opaque = Z_NULL;
3753
3754 is_valid_ = deflateInit2(&strm_, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION, Z_DEFLATED, 31, 8,
3755 Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY) == Z_OK;
3756}
3757
3758inline gzip_compressor::~gzip_compressor() { deflateEnd(&strm_); }
3759
3760inline bool gzip_compressor::compress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
3761 bool last, Callback callback) {
3762 assert(is_valid_);
3763
3764 do {
3765 constexpr size_t max_avail_in =
3766 (std::numeric_limits<decltype(strm_.avail_in)>::max)();
3767
3768 strm_.avail_in = static_cast<decltype(strm_.avail_in)>(
3769 (std::min)(data_length, max_avail_in));
3770 strm_.next_in = const_cast<Bytef *>(reinterpret_cast<const Bytef *>(data));
3771
3772 data_length -= strm_.avail_in;
3773 data += strm_.avail_in;
3774
3775 auto flush = (last && data_length == 0) ? Z_FINISH : Z_NO_FLUSH;
3776 auto ret = Z_OK;
3777
3778 std::array<char, CPPHTTPLIB_COMPRESSION_BUFSIZ> buff{};
3779 do {
3780 strm_.avail_out = static_cast<uInt>(buff.size());
3781 strm_.next_out = reinterpret_cast<Bytef *>(buff.data());
3782
3783 ret = deflate(&strm_, flush);
3784 if (ret == Z_STREAM_ERROR) { return false; }
3785
3786 if (!callback(buff.data(), buff.size() - strm_.avail_out)) {
3787 return false;
3788 }
3789 } while (strm_.avail_out == 0);
3790
3791 assert((flush == Z_FINISH && ret == Z_STREAM_END) ||
3792 (flush == Z_NO_FLUSH && ret == Z_OK));
3793 assert(strm_.avail_in == 0);
3794 } while (data_length > 0);
3795
3796 return true;
3797}
3798
3799inline gzip_decompressor::gzip_decompressor() {
3800 std::memset(&strm_, 0, sizeof(strm_));
3801 strm_.zalloc = Z_NULL;
3802 strm_.zfree = Z_NULL;
3803 strm_.opaque = Z_NULL;
3804
3805 // 15 is the value of wbits, which should be at the maximum possible value
3806 // to ensure that any gzip stream can be decoded. The offset of 32 specifies
3807 // that the stream type should be automatically detected either gzip or
3808 // deflate.
3809 is_valid_ = inflateInit2(&strm_, 32 + 15) == Z_OK;
3810}
3811
3812inline gzip_decompressor::~gzip_decompressor() { inflateEnd(&strm_); }
3813
3814inline bool gzip_decompressor::is_valid() const { return is_valid_; }
3815
3816inline bool gzip_decompressor::decompress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
3817 Callback callback) {
3818 assert(is_valid_);
3819
3820 auto ret = Z_OK;
3821
3822 do {
3823 constexpr size_t max_avail_in =
3824 (std::numeric_limits<decltype(strm_.avail_in)>::max)();
3825
3826 strm_.avail_in = static_cast<decltype(strm_.avail_in)>(
3827 (std::min)(data_length, max_avail_in));
3828 strm_.next_in = const_cast<Bytef *>(reinterpret_cast<const Bytef *>(data));
3829
3830 data_length -= strm_.avail_in;
3831 data += strm_.avail_in;
3832
3833 std::array<char, CPPHTTPLIB_COMPRESSION_BUFSIZ> buff{};
3834 while (strm_.avail_in > 0 && ret == Z_OK) {
3835 strm_.avail_out = static_cast<uInt>(buff.size());
3836 strm_.next_out = reinterpret_cast<Bytef *>(buff.data());
3837
3838 ret = inflate(&strm_, Z_NO_FLUSH);
3839
3840 assert(ret != Z_STREAM_ERROR);
3841 switch (ret) {
3842 case Z_NEED_DICT:
3843 case Z_DATA_ERROR:
3844 case Z_MEM_ERROR: inflateEnd(&strm_); return false;
3845 }
3846
3847 if (!callback(buff.data(), buff.size() - strm_.avail_out)) {
3848 return false;
3849 }
3850 }
3851
3852 if (ret != Z_OK && ret != Z_STREAM_END) { return false; }
3853
3854 } while (data_length > 0);
3855
3856 return true;
3857}
3858#endif
3859
3860#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
3861inline brotli_compressor::brotli_compressor() {
3862 state_ = BrotliEncoderCreateInstance(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
3863}
3864
3865inline brotli_compressor::~brotli_compressor() {
3866 BrotliEncoderDestroyInstance(state_);
3867}
3868
3869inline bool brotli_compressor::compress(const char *data, size_t data_length,
3870 bool last, Callback callback) {
3871 std::array<uint8_t, CPPHTTPLIB_COMPRESSION_BUFSIZ> buff{};
3872
3873 auto operation = last ? BROTLI_OPERATION_FINISH : BROTLI_OPERATION_PROCESS;
3874 auto available_in = data_length;
3875 auto next_in = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(data);
3876
3877 for (;;) {
3878 if (last) {
3879 if (BrotliEncoderIsFinished(state_)) { break; }
3880 } else {
3881 if (!available_in) { break; }
3882 }
3883
3884 auto available_out = buff.size();
3885 auto next_out = buff.data();
3886
3887 if (!BrotliEncoderCompressStream(state_, operation, &available_in, &next_in,
3888 &available_out, &next_out, nullptr)) {
3889 return false;
3890 }
3891
3892 auto output_bytes = buff.size() - available_out;
3893 if (output_bytes) {
3894 callback(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(buff.data()), output_bytes);
3895 }
3896 }
3897
3898 return true;
3899}
3900
3901inline brotli_decompressor::brotli_decompressor() {
3902 decoder_s = BrotliDecoderCreateInstance(0, 0, 0);
3903 decoder_r = decoder_s ? BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT
3904 : BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_ERROR;
3905}
3906
3907inline brotli_decompressor::~brotli_decompressor() {
3908 if (decoder_s) { BrotliDecoderDestroyInstance(decoder_s); }
3909}
3910
3911inline bool brotli_decompressor::is_valid() const { return decoder_s; }
3912
3913inline bool brotli_decompressor::decompress(const char *data,
3914 size_t data_length,
3915 Callback callback) {
3916 if (decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_SUCCESS ||
3917 decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_ERROR) {
3918 return 0;
3919 }
3920
3921 auto next_in = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(data);
3922 size_t avail_in = data_length;
3923 size_t total_out;
3924
3925 decoder_r = BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_OUTPUT;
3926
3927 std::array<char, CPPHTTPLIB_COMPRESSION_BUFSIZ> buff{};
3928 while (decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_OUTPUT) {
3929 char *next_out = buff.data();
3930 size_t avail_out = buff.size();
3931
3932 decoder_r = BrotliDecoderDecompressStream(
3933 decoder_s, &avail_in, &next_in, &avail_out,
3934 reinterpret_cast<uint8_t **>(&next_out), &total_out);
3935
3936 if (decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_ERROR) { return false; }
3937
3938 if (!callback(buff.data(), buff.size() - avail_out)) { return false; }
3939 }
3940
3941 return decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_SUCCESS ||
3942 decoder_r == BROTLI_DECODER_RESULT_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT;
3943}
3944#endif
3945
3946inline bool has_header(const Headers &headers, const std::string &key) {
3947 return headers.find(key) != headers.end();
3948}
3949
3950inline const char *get_header_value(const Headers &headers,
3951 const std::string &key, size_t id,
3952 const char *def) {
3953 auto rng = headers.equal_range(key);
3954 auto it = rng.first;
3955 std::advance(it, static_cast<ssize_t>(id));
3956 if (it != rng.second) { return it->second.c_str(); }
3957 return def;
3958}
3959
3960inline bool compare_case_ignore(const std::string &a, const std::string &b) {
3961 if (a.size() != b.size()) { return false; }
3962 for (size_t i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) {
3963 if (::tolower(a[i]) != ::tolower(b[i])) { return false; }
3964 }
3965 return true;
3966}
3967
3968template <typename T>
3969inline bool parse_header(const char *beg, const char *end, T fn) {
3970 // Skip trailing spaces and tabs.
3971 while (beg < end && is_space_or_tab(end[-1])) {
3972 end--;
3973 }
3974
3975 auto p = beg;
3976 while (p < end && *p != ':') {
3977 p++;
3978 }
3979
3980 if (p == end) { return false; }
3981
3982 auto key_end = p;
3983
3984 if (*p++ != ':') { return false; }
3985
3986 while (p < end && is_space_or_tab(*p)) {
3987 p++;
3988 }
3989
3990 if (p < end) {
3991 auto key_len = key_end - beg;
3992 if (!key_len) { return false; }
3993
3994 auto key = std::string(beg, key_end);
3995 auto val = compare_case_ignore(key, "Location")
3996 ? std::string(p, end)
3997 : decode_url(std::string(p, end), false);
3998 fn(key, val);
3999 return true;
4000 }
4001
4002 return false;
4003}
4004
4005inline bool read_headers(Stream &strm, Headers &headers) {
4006 const auto bufsiz = 2048;
4007 char buf[bufsiz];
4008 stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf, bufsiz);
4009
4010 for (;;) {
4011 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4012
4013 // Check if the line ends with CRLF.
4014 auto line_terminator_len = 2;
4015 if (line_reader.end_with_crlf()) {
4016 // Blank line indicates end of headers.
4017 if (line_reader.size() == 2) { break; }
4018#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ALLOW_LF_AS_LINE_TERMINATOR
4019 } else {
4020 // Blank line indicates end of headers.
4021 if (line_reader.size() == 1) { break; }
4022 line_terminator_len = 1;
4023 }
4024#else
4025 } else {
4026 continue; // Skip invalid line.
4027 }
4028#endif
4029
4030 if (line_reader.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_HEADER_MAX_LENGTH) { return false; }
4031
4032 // Exclude line terminator
4033 auto end = line_reader.ptr() + line_reader.size() - line_terminator_len;
4034
4035 parse_header(line_reader.ptr(), end,
4036 [&](const std::string &key, const std::string &val) {
4037 headers.emplace(key, val);
4038 });
4039 }
4040
4041 return true;
4042}
4043
4044inline bool read_content_with_length(Stream &strm, uint64_t len,
4045 Progress progress,
4046 ContentReceiverWithProgress out) {
4047 char buf[CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ];
4048
4049 uint64_t r = 0;
4050 while (r < len) {
4051 auto read_len = static_cast<size_t>(len - r);
4052 auto n = strm.read(buf, (std::min)(read_len, CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ));
4053 if (n <= 0) { return false; }
4054
4055 if (!out(buf, static_cast<size_t>(n), r, len)) { return false; }
4056 r += static_cast<uint64_t>(n);
4057
4058 if (progress) {
4059 if (!progress(r, len)) { return false; }
4060 }
4061 }
4062
4063 return true;
4064}
4065
4066inline void skip_content_with_length(Stream &strm, uint64_t len) {
4067 char buf[CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ];
4068 uint64_t r = 0;
4069 while (r < len) {
4070 auto read_len = static_cast<size_t>(len - r);
4071 auto n = strm.read(buf, (std::min)(read_len, CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ));
4072 if (n <= 0) { return; }
4073 r += static_cast<uint64_t>(n);
4074 }
4075}
4076
4077inline bool read_content_without_length(Stream &strm,
4078 ContentReceiverWithProgress out) {
4079 char buf[CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ];
4080 uint64_t r = 0;
4081 for (;;) {
4082 auto n = strm.read(buf, CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_BUFSIZ);
4083 if (n <= 0) { return true; }
4084
4085 if (!out(buf, static_cast<size_t>(n), r, 0)) { return false; }
4086 r += static_cast<uint64_t>(n);
4087 }
4088
4089 return true;
4090}
4091
4092template <typename T>
4093inline bool read_content_chunked(Stream &strm, T &x,
4094 ContentReceiverWithProgress out) {
4095 const auto bufsiz = 16;
4096 char buf[bufsiz];
4097
4098 stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf, bufsiz);
4099
4100 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4101
4102 unsigned long chunk_len;
4103 while (true) {
4104 char *end_ptr;
4105
4106 chunk_len = std::strtoul(line_reader.ptr(), &end_ptr, 16);
4107
4108 if (end_ptr == line_reader.ptr()) { return false; }
4109 if (chunk_len == ULONG_MAX) { return false; }
4110
4111 if (chunk_len == 0) { break; }
4112
4113 if (!read_content_with_length(strm, chunk_len, nullptr, out)) {
4114 return false;
4115 }
4116
4117 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4118
4119 if (strcmp(line_reader.ptr(), "\r\n") != 0) { return false; }
4120
4121 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4122 }
4123
4124 assert(chunk_len == 0);
4125
4126 // Trailer
4127 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4128
4129 while (strcmp(line_reader.ptr(), "\r\n") != 0) {
4130 if (line_reader.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_HEADER_MAX_LENGTH) { return false; }
4131
4132 // Exclude line terminator
4133 constexpr auto line_terminator_len = 2;
4134 auto end = line_reader.ptr() + line_reader.size() - line_terminator_len;
4135
4136 parse_header(line_reader.ptr(), end,
4137 [&](const std::string &key, const std::string &val) {
4138 x.headers.emplace(key, val);
4139 });
4140
4141 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
4142 }
4143
4144 return true;
4145}
4146
4147inline bool is_chunked_transfer_encoding(const Headers &headers) {
4148 return compare_case_ignore(
4149 get_header_value(headers, "Transfer-Encoding", 0, ""), "chunked");
4150}
4151
4152template <typename T, typename U>
4153bool prepare_content_receiver(T &x, int &status,
4154 ContentReceiverWithProgress receiver,
4155 bool decompress, U callback) {
4156 if (decompress) {
4157 std::string encoding = x.get_header_value("Content-Encoding");
4158 std::unique_ptr<decompressor> decompressor;
4159
4160 if (encoding == "gzip" || encoding == "deflate") {
4161#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
4162 decompressor = detail::make_unique<gzip_decompressor>();
4163#else
4164 status = StatusCode::UnsupportedMediaType_415;
4165 return false;
4166#endif
4167 } else if (encoding.find("br") != std::string::npos) {
4168#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
4169 decompressor = detail::make_unique<brotli_decompressor>();
4170#else
4171 status = StatusCode::UnsupportedMediaType_415;
4172 return false;
4173#endif
4174 }
4175
4176 if (decompressor) {
4177 if (decompressor->is_valid()) {
4178 ContentReceiverWithProgress out = [&](const char *buf, size_t n,
4179 uint64_t off, uint64_t len) {
4180 return decompressor->decompress(buf, n,
4181 [&](const char *buf2, size_t n2) {
4182 return receiver(buf2, n2, off, len);
4183 });
4184 };
4185 return callback(std::move(out));
4186 } else {
4187 status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
4188 return false;
4189 }
4190 }
4191 }
4192
4193 ContentReceiverWithProgress out = [&](const char *buf, size_t n, uint64_t off,
4194 uint64_t len) {
4195 return receiver(buf, n, off, len);
4196 };
4197 return callback(std::move(out));
4198}
4199
4200template <typename T>
4201bool read_content(Stream &strm, T &x, size_t payload_max_length, int &status,
4202 Progress progress, ContentReceiverWithProgress receiver,
4203 bool decompress) {
4204 return prepare_content_receiver(
4205 x, status, std::move(receiver), decompress,
4206 [&](const ContentReceiverWithProgress &out) {
4207 auto ret = true;
4208 auto exceed_payload_max_length = false;
4209
4210 if (is_chunked_transfer_encoding(x.headers)) {
4211 ret = read_content_chunked(strm, x, out);
4212 } else if (!has_header(x.headers, "Content-Length")) {
4213 ret = read_content_without_length(strm, out);
4214 } else {
4215 auto len = get_header_value_u64(x.headers, "Content-Length", 0, 0);
4216 if (len > payload_max_length) {
4217 exceed_payload_max_length = true;
4218 skip_content_with_length(strm, len);
4219 ret = false;
4220 } else if (len > 0) {
4221 ret = read_content_with_length(strm, len, std::move(progress), out);
4222 }
4223 }
4224
4225 if (!ret) {
4226 status = exceed_payload_max_length ? StatusCode::PayloadTooLarge_413
4227 : StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
4228 }
4229 return ret;
4230 });
4231} // namespace detail
4232
4233inline ssize_t write_headers(Stream &strm, const Headers &headers) {
4234 ssize_t write_len = 0;
4235 for (const auto &x : headers) {
4236 auto len =
4237 strm.write_format("%s: %s\r\n", x.first.c_str(), x.second.c_str());
4238 if (len < 0) { return len; }
4239 write_len += len;
4240 }
4241 auto len = strm.write("\r\n");
4242 if (len < 0) { return len; }
4243 write_len += len;
4244 return write_len;
4245}
4246
4247inline bool write_data(Stream &strm, const char *d, size_t l) {
4248 size_t offset = 0;
4249 while (offset < l) {
4250 auto length = strm.write(d + offset, l - offset);
4251 if (length < 0) { return false; }
4252 offset += static_cast<size_t>(length);
4253 }
4254 return true;
4255}
4256
4257template <typename T>
4258inline bool write_content(Stream &strm, const ContentProvider &content_provider,
4259 size_t offset, size_t length, T is_shutting_down,
4260 Error &error) {
4261 size_t end_offset = offset + length;
4262 auto ok = true;
4263 DataSink data_sink;
4264
4265 data_sink.write = [&](const char *d, size_t l) -> bool {
4266 if (ok) {
4267 if (strm.is_writable() && write_data(strm, d, l)) {
4268 offset += l;
4269 } else {
4270 ok = false;
4271 }
4272 }
4273 return ok;
4274 };
4275
4276 data_sink.is_writable = [&]() -> bool { return strm.is_writable(); };
4277
4278 while (offset < end_offset && !is_shutting_down()) {
4279 if (!strm.is_writable()) {
4280 error = Error::Write;
4281 return false;
4282 } else if (!content_provider(offset, end_offset - offset, data_sink)) {
4283 error = Error::Canceled;
4284 return false;
4285 } else if (!ok) {
4286 error = Error::Write;
4287 return false;
4288 }
4289 }
4290
4291 error = Error::Success;
4292 return true;
4293}
4294
4295template <typename T>
4296inline bool write_content(Stream &strm, const ContentProvider &content_provider,
4297 size_t offset, size_t length,
4298 const T &is_shutting_down) {
4299 auto error = Error::Success;
4300 return write_content(strm, content_provider, offset, length, is_shutting_down,
4301 error);
4302}
4303
4304template <typename T>
4305inline bool
4306write_content_without_length(Stream &strm,
4307 const ContentProvider &content_provider,
4308 const T &is_shutting_down) {
4309 size_t offset = 0;
4310 auto data_available = true;
4311 auto ok = true;
4312 DataSink data_sink;
4313
4314 data_sink.write = [&](const char *d, size_t l) -> bool {
4315 if (ok) {
4316 offset += l;
4317 if (!strm.is_writable() || !write_data(strm, d, l)) { ok = false; }
4318 }
4319 return ok;
4320 };
4321
4322 data_sink.is_writable = [&]() -> bool { return strm.is_writable(); };
4323
4324 data_sink.done = [&](void) { data_available = false; };
4325
4326 while (data_available && !is_shutting_down()) {
4327 if (!strm.is_writable()) {
4328 return false;
4329 } else if (!content_provider(offset, 0, data_sink)) {
4330 return false;
4331 } else if (!ok) {
4332 return false;
4333 }
4334 }
4335 return true;
4336}
4337
4338template <typename T, typename U>
4339inline bool
4340write_content_chunked(Stream &strm, const ContentProvider &content_provider,
4341 const T &is_shutting_down, U &compressor, Error &error) {
4342 size_t offset = 0;
4343 auto data_available = true;
4344 auto ok = true;
4345 DataSink data_sink;
4346
4347 data_sink.write = [&](const char *d, size_t l) -> bool {
4348 if (ok) {
4349 data_available = l > 0;
4350 offset += l;
4351
4352 std::string payload;
4353 if (compressor.compress(d, l, false,
4354 [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
4355 payload.append(data, data_len);
4356 return true;
4357 })) {
4358 if (!payload.empty()) {
4359 // Emit chunked response header and footer for each chunk
4360 auto chunk =
4361 from_i_to_hex(payload.size()) + "\r\n" + payload + "\r\n";
4362 if (!strm.is_writable() ||
4363 !write_data(strm, chunk.data(), chunk.size())) {
4364 ok = false;
4365 }
4366 }
4367 } else {
4368 ok = false;
4369 }
4370 }
4371 return ok;
4372 };
4373
4374 data_sink.is_writable = [&]() -> bool { return strm.is_writable(); };
4375
4376 auto done_with_trailer = [&](const Headers *trailer) {
4377 if (!ok) { return; }
4378
4379 data_available = false;
4380
4381 std::string payload;
4382 if (!compressor.compress(nullptr, 0, true,
4383 [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
4384 payload.append(data, data_len);
4385 return true;
4386 })) {
4387 ok = false;
4388 return;
4389 }
4390
4391 if (!payload.empty()) {
4392 // Emit chunked response header and footer for each chunk
4393 auto chunk = from_i_to_hex(payload.size()) + "\r\n" + payload + "\r\n";
4394 if (!strm.is_writable() ||
4395 !write_data(strm, chunk.data(), chunk.size())) {
4396 ok = false;
4397 return;
4398 }
4399 }
4400
4401 static const std::string done_marker("0\r\n");
4402 if (!write_data(strm, done_marker.data(), done_marker.size())) {
4403 ok = false;
4404 }
4405
4406 // Trailer
4407 if (trailer) {
4408 for (const auto &kv : *trailer) {
4409 std::string field_line = kv.first + ": " + kv.second + "\r\n";
4410 if (!write_data(strm, field_line.data(), field_line.size())) {
4411 ok = false;
4412 }
4413 }
4414 }
4415
4416 static const std::string crlf("\r\n");
4417 if (!write_data(strm, crlf.data(), crlf.size())) { ok = false; }
4418 };
4419
4420 data_sink.done = [&](void) { done_with_trailer(nullptr); };
4421
4422 data_sink.done_with_trailer = [&](const Headers &trailer) {
4423 done_with_trailer(&trailer);
4424 };
4425
4426 while (data_available && !is_shutting_down()) {
4427 if (!strm.is_writable()) {
4428 error = Error::Write;
4429 return false;
4430 } else if (!content_provider(offset, 0, data_sink)) {
4431 error = Error::Canceled;
4432 return false;
4433 } else if (!ok) {
4434 error = Error::Write;
4435 return false;
4436 }
4437 }
4438
4439 error = Error::Success;
4440 return true;
4441}
4442
4443template <typename T, typename U>
4444inline bool write_content_chunked(Stream &strm,
4445 const ContentProvider &content_provider,
4446 const T &is_shutting_down, U &compressor) {
4447 auto error = Error::Success;
4448 return write_content_chunked(strm, content_provider, is_shutting_down,
4449 compressor, error);
4450}
4451
4452template <typename T>
4453inline bool redirect(T &cli, Request &req, Response &res,
4454 const std::string &path, const std::string &location,
4455 Error &error) {
4456 Request new_req = req;
4457 new_req.path = path;
4458 new_req.redirect_count_ -= 1;
4459
4460 if (res.status == StatusCode::SeeOther_303 &&
4461 (req.method != "GET" && req.method != "HEAD")) {
4462 new_req.method = "GET";
4463 new_req.body.clear();
4464 new_req.headers.clear();
4465 }
4466
4467 Response new_res;
4468
4469 auto ret = cli.send(new_req, new_res, error);
4470 if (ret) {
4471 req = new_req;
4472 res = new_res;
4473
4474 if (res.location.empty()) { res.location = location; }
4475 }
4476 return ret;
4477}
4478
4479inline std::string params_to_query_str(const Params &params) {
4480 std::string query;
4481
4482 for (auto it = params.begin(); it != params.end(); ++it) {
4483 if (it != params.begin()) { query += "&"; }
4484 query += it->first;
4485 query += "=";
4486 query += encode_query_param(it->second);
4487 }
4488 return query;
4489}
4490
4491inline void parse_query_text(const char *data, std::size_t size,
4492 Params &params) {
4493 std::set<std::string> cache;
4494 split(data, data + size, '&', [&](const char *b, const char *e) {
4495 std::string kv(b, e);
4496 if (cache.find(kv) != cache.end()) { return; }
4497 cache.insert(std::move(kv));
4498
4499 std::string key;
4500 std::string val;
4501 divide(b, static_cast<std::size_t>(e - b), '=',
4502 [&](const char *lhs_data, std::size_t lhs_size, const char *rhs_data,
4503 std::size_t rhs_size) {
4504 key.assign(lhs_data, lhs_size);
4505 val.assign(rhs_data, rhs_size);
4506 });
4507
4508 if (!key.empty()) {
4509 params.emplace(decode_url(key, true), decode_url(val, true));
4510 }
4511 });
4512}
4513
4514inline void parse_query_text(const std::string &s, Params &params) {
4515 parse_query_text(s.data(), s.size(), params);
4516}
4517
4518inline bool parse_multipart_boundary(const std::string &content_type,
4519 std::string &boundary) {
4520 auto boundary_keyword = "boundary=";
4521 auto pos = content_type.find(boundary_keyword);
4522 if (pos == std::string::npos) { return false; }
4523 auto end = content_type.find(';', pos);
4524 auto beg = pos + strlen(boundary_keyword);
4525 boundary = trim_double_quotes_copy(content_type.substr(beg, end - beg));
4526 return !boundary.empty();
4527}
4528
4529inline void parse_disposition_params(const std::string &s, Params &params) {
4530 std::set<std::string> cache;
4531 split(s.data(), s.data() + s.size(), ';', [&](const char *b, const char *e) {
4532 std::string kv(b, e);
4533 if (cache.find(kv) != cache.end()) { return; }
4534 cache.insert(kv);
4535
4536 std::string key;
4537 std::string val;
4538 split(b, e, '=', [&](const char *b2, const char *e2) {
4539 if (key.empty()) {
4540 key.assign(b2, e2);
4541 } else {
4542 val.assign(b2, e2);
4543 }
4544 });
4545
4546 if (!key.empty()) {
4547 params.emplace(trim_double_quotes_copy((key)),
4548 trim_double_quotes_copy((val)));
4549 }
4550 });
4551}
4552
4553#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4554inline bool parse_range_header(const std::string &s, Ranges &ranges) {
4555#else
4556inline bool parse_range_header(const std::string &s, Ranges &ranges) try {
4557#endif
4558 auto is_valid = [](const std::string &str) {
4559 return std::all_of(str.cbegin(), str.cend(),
4560 [](unsigned char c) { return std::isdigit(c); });
4561 };
4562
4563 if (s.size() > 7 && s.compare(0, 6, "bytes=") == 0) {
4564 const auto pos = static_cast<size_t>(6);
4565 const auto len = static_cast<size_t>(s.size() - 6);
4566 auto all_valid_ranges = true;
4567 split(&s[pos], &s[pos + len], ',', [&](const char *b, const char *e) {
4568 if (!all_valid_ranges) { return; }
4569
4570 const auto it = std::find(b, e, '-');
4571 if (it == e) {
4572 all_valid_ranges = false;
4573 return;
4574 }
4575
4576 const auto lhs = std::string(b, it);
4577 const auto rhs = std::string(it + 1, e);
4578 if (!is_valid(lhs) || !is_valid(rhs)) {
4579 all_valid_ranges = false;
4580 return;
4581 }
4582
4583 const auto first =
4584 static_cast<ssize_t>(lhs.empty() ? -1 : std::stoll(lhs));
4585 const auto last =
4586 static_cast<ssize_t>(rhs.empty() ? -1 : std::stoll(rhs));
4587 if ((first == -1 && last == -1) ||
4588 (first != -1 && last != -1 && first > last)) {
4589 all_valid_ranges = false;
4590 return;
4591 }
4592
4593 ranges.emplace_back(first, last);
4594 });
4595 return all_valid_ranges && !ranges.empty();
4596 }
4597 return false;
4598#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4599}
4600#else
4601} catch (...) { return false; }
4602#endif
4603
4604class MultipartFormDataParser {
4605public:
4606 MultipartFormDataParser() = default;
4607
4608 void set_boundary(std::string &&boundary) {
4609 boundary_ = boundary;
4610 dash_boundary_crlf_ = dash_ + boundary_ + crlf_;
4611 crlf_dash_boundary_ = crlf_ + dash_ + boundary_;
4612 }
4613
4614 bool is_valid() const { return is_valid_; }
4615
4616 bool parse(const char *buf, size_t n, const ContentReceiver &content_callback,
4617 const MultipartContentHeader &header_callback) {
4618
4619 buf_append(buf, n);
4620
4621 while (buf_size() > 0) {
4622 switch (state_) {
4623 case 0: { // Initial boundary
4624 buf_erase(buf_find(dash_boundary_crlf_));
4625 if (dash_boundary_crlf_.size() > buf_size()) { return true; }
4626 if (!buf_start_with(dash_boundary_crlf_)) { return false; }
4627 buf_erase(dash_boundary_crlf_.size());
4628 state_ = 1;
4629 break;
4630 }
4631 case 1: { // New entry
4632 clear_file_info();
4633 state_ = 2;
4634 break;
4635 }
4636 case 2: { // Headers
4637 auto pos = buf_find(crlf_);
4638 if (pos > CPPHTTPLIB_HEADER_MAX_LENGTH) { return false; }
4639 while (pos < buf_size()) {
4640 // Empty line
4641 if (pos == 0) {
4642 if (!header_callback(file_)) {
4643 is_valid_ = false;
4644 return false;
4645 }
4646 buf_erase(crlf_.size());
4647 state_ = 3;
4648 break;
4649 }
4650
4651 const auto header = buf_head(pos);
4652
4653 if (!parse_header(header.data(), header.data() + header.size(),
4654 [&](const std::string &, const std::string &) {})) {
4655 is_valid_ = false;
4656 return false;
4657 }
4658
4659 static const std::string header_content_type = "Content-Type:";
4660
4661 if (start_with_case_ignore(header, header_content_type)) {
4662 file_.content_type =
4663 trim_copy(header.substr(header_content_type.size()));
4664 } else {
4665 static const std::regex re_content_disposition(
4666 R"~(^Content-Disposition:\s*form-data;\s*(.*)$)~",
4667 std::regex_constants::icase);
4668
4669 std::smatch m;
4670 if (std::regex_match(header, m, re_content_disposition)) {
4671 Params params;
4672 parse_disposition_params(m[1], params);
4673
4674 auto it = params.find("name");
4675 if (it != params.end()) {
4676 file_.name = it->second;
4677 } else {
4678 is_valid_ = false;
4679 return false;
4680 }
4681
4682 it = params.find("filename");
4683 if (it != params.end()) { file_.filename = it->second; }
4684
4685 it = params.find("filename*");
4686 if (it != params.end()) {
4687 // Only allow UTF-8 enconnding...
4688 static const std::regex re_rfc5987_encoding(
4689 R"~(^UTF-8''(.+?)$)~", std::regex_constants::icase);
4690
4691 std::smatch m2;
4692 if (std::regex_match(it->second, m2, re_rfc5987_encoding)) {
4693 file_.filename = decode_url(m2[1], false); // override...
4694 } else {
4695 is_valid_ = false;
4696 return false;
4697 }
4698 }
4699 }
4700 }
4701 buf_erase(pos + crlf_.size());
4702 pos = buf_find(crlf_);
4703 }
4704 if (state_ != 3) { return true; }
4705 break;
4706 }
4707 case 3: { // Body
4708 if (crlf_dash_boundary_.size() > buf_size()) { return true; }
4709 auto pos = buf_find(crlf_dash_boundary_);
4710 if (pos < buf_size()) {
4711 if (!content_callback(buf_data(), pos)) {
4712 is_valid_ = false;
4713 return false;
4714 }
4715 buf_erase(pos + crlf_dash_boundary_.size());
4716 state_ = 4;
4717 } else {
4718 auto len = buf_size() - crlf_dash_boundary_.size();
4719 if (len > 0) {
4720 if (!content_callback(buf_data(), len)) {
4721 is_valid_ = false;
4722 return false;
4723 }
4724 buf_erase(len);
4725 }
4726 return true;
4727 }
4728 break;
4729 }
4730 case 4: { // Boundary
4731 if (crlf_.size() > buf_size()) { return true; }
4732 if (buf_start_with(crlf_)) {
4733 buf_erase(crlf_.size());
4734 state_ = 1;
4735 } else {
4736 if (dash_.size() > buf_size()) { return true; }
4737 if (buf_start_with(dash_)) {
4738 buf_erase(dash_.size());
4739 is_valid_ = true;
4740 buf_erase(buf_size()); // Remove epilogue
4741 } else {
4742 return true;
4743 }
4744 }
4745 break;
4746 }
4747 }
4748 }
4749
4750 return true;
4751 }
4752
4753private:
4754 void clear_file_info() {
4755 file_.name.clear();
4756 file_.filename.clear();
4757 file_.content_type.clear();
4758 }
4759
4760 bool start_with_case_ignore(const std::string &a,
4761 const std::string &b) const {
4762 if (a.size() < b.size()) { return false; }
4763 for (size_t i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) {
4764 if (::tolower(a[i]) != ::tolower(b[i])) { return false; }
4765 }
4766 return true;
4767 }
4768
4769 const std::string dash_ = "--";
4770 const std::string crlf_ = "\r\n";
4771 std::string boundary_;
4772 std::string dash_boundary_crlf_;
4773 std::string crlf_dash_boundary_;
4774
4775 size_t state_ = 0;
4776 bool is_valid_ = false;
4777 MultipartFormData file_;
4778
4779 // Buffer
4780 bool start_with(const std::string &a, size_t spos, size_t epos,
4781 const std::string &b) const {
4782 if (epos - spos < b.size()) { return false; }
4783 for (size_t i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) {
4784 if (a[i + spos] != b[i]) { return false; }
4785 }
4786 return true;
4787 }
4788
4789 size_t buf_size() const { return buf_epos_ - buf_spos_; }
4790
4791 const char *buf_data() const { return &buf_[buf_spos_]; }
4792
4793 std::string buf_head(size_t l) const { return buf_.substr(buf_spos_, l); }
4794
4795 bool buf_start_with(const std::string &s) const {
4796 return start_with(buf_, buf_spos_, buf_epos_, s);
4797 }
4798
4799 size_t buf_find(const std::string &s) const {
4800 auto c = s.front();
4801
4802 size_t off = buf_spos_;
4803 while (off < buf_epos_) {
4804 auto pos = off;
4805 while (true) {
4806 if (pos == buf_epos_) { return buf_size(); }
4807 if (buf_[pos] == c) { break; }
4808 pos++;
4809 }
4810
4811 auto remaining_size = buf_epos_ - pos;
4812 if (s.size() > remaining_size) { return buf_size(); }
4813
4814 if (start_with(buf_, pos, buf_epos_, s)) { return pos - buf_spos_; }
4815
4816 off = pos + 1;
4817 }
4818
4819 return buf_size();
4820 }
4821
4822 void buf_append(const char *data, size_t n) {
4823 auto remaining_size = buf_size();
4824 if (remaining_size > 0 && buf_spos_ > 0) {
4825 for (size_t i = 0; i < remaining_size; i++) {
4826 buf_[i] = buf_[buf_spos_ + i];
4827 }
4828 }
4829 buf_spos_ = 0;
4830 buf_epos_ = remaining_size;
4831
4832 if (remaining_size + n > buf_.size()) { buf_.resize(remaining_size + n); }
4833
4834 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {
4835 buf_[buf_epos_ + i] = data[i];
4836 }
4837 buf_epos_ += n;
4838 }
4839
4840 void buf_erase(size_t size) { buf_spos_ += size; }
4841
4842 std::string buf_;
4843 size_t buf_spos_ = 0;
4844 size_t buf_epos_ = 0;
4845};
4846
4847inline std::string to_lower(const char *beg, const char *end) {
4848 std::string out;
4849 auto it = beg;
4850 while (it != end) {
4851 out += static_cast<char>(::tolower(*it));
4852 it++;
4853 }
4854 return out;
4855}
4856
4857inline std::string random_string(size_t length) {
4858 static const char data[] =
4859 "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
4860
4861 // std::random_device might actually be deterministic on some
4862 // platforms, but due to lack of support in the c++ standard library,
4863 // doing better requires either some ugly hacks or breaking portability.
4864 static std::random_device seed_gen;
4865
4866 // Request 128 bits of entropy for initialization
4867 static std::seed_seq seed_sequence{seed_gen(), seed_gen(), seed_gen(),
4868 seed_gen()};
4869
4870 static std::mt19937 engine(seed_sequence);
4871
4872 std::string result;
4873 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
4874 result += data[engine() % (sizeof(data) - 1)];
4875 }
4876 return result;
4877}
4878
4879inline std::string make_multipart_data_boundary() {
4880 return "--cpp-httplib-multipart-data-" + detail::random_string(16);
4881}
4882
4883inline bool is_multipart_boundary_chars_valid(const std::string &boundary) {
4884 auto valid = true;
4885 for (size_t i = 0; i < boundary.size(); i++) {
4886 auto c = boundary[i];
4887 if (!std::isalnum(c) && c != '-' && c != '_') {
4888 valid = false;
4889 break;
4890 }
4891 }
4892 return valid;
4893}
4894
4895template <typename T>
4896inline std::string
4897serialize_multipart_formdata_item_begin(const T &item,
4898 const std::string &boundary) {
4899 std::string body = "--" + boundary + "\r\n";
4900 body += "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"" + item.name + "\"";
4901 if (!item.filename.empty()) {
4902 body += "; filename=\"" + item.filename + "\"";
4903 }
4904 body += "\r\n";
4905 if (!item.content_type.empty()) {
4906 body += "Content-Type: " + item.content_type + "\r\n";
4907 }
4908 body += "\r\n";
4909
4910 return body;
4911}
4912
4913inline std::string serialize_multipart_formdata_item_end() { return "\r\n"; }
4914
4915inline std::string
4916serialize_multipart_formdata_finish(const std::string &boundary) {
4917 return "--" + boundary + "--\r\n";
4918}
4919
4920inline std::string
4921serialize_multipart_formdata_get_content_type(const std::string &boundary) {
4922 return "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;
4923}
4924
4925inline std::string
4926serialize_multipart_formdata(const MultipartFormDataItems &items,
4927 const std::string &boundary, bool finish = true) {
4928 std::string body;
4929
4930 for (const auto &item : items) {
4931 body += serialize_multipart_formdata_item_begin(item, boundary);
4932 body += item.content + serialize_multipart_formdata_item_end();
4933 }
4934
4935 if (finish) { body += serialize_multipart_formdata_finish(boundary); }
4936
4937 return body;
4938}
4939
4940inline bool range_error(Request &req, Response &res) {
4941 if (!req.ranges.empty() && 200 <= res.status && res.status < 300) {
4942 ssize_t contant_len = static_cast<ssize_t>(
4943 res.content_length_ ? res.content_length_ : res.body.size());
4944
4945 ssize_t prev_first_pos = -1;
4946 ssize_t prev_last_pos = -1;
4947 size_t overwrapping_count = 0;
4948
4949 // NOTE: The following Range check is based on '14.2. Range' in RFC 9110
4950 // 'HTTP Semantics' to avoid potential denial-of-service attacks.
4951 // https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9110#section-14.2
4952
4953 // Too many ranges
4954 if (req.ranges.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_RANGE_MAX_COUNT) { return true; }
4955
4956 for (auto &r : req.ranges) {
4957 auto &first_pos = r.first;
4958 auto &last_pos = r.second;
4959
4960 if (first_pos == -1 && last_pos == -1) {
4961 first_pos = 0;
4962 last_pos = contant_len;
4963 }
4964
4965 if (first_pos == -1) {
4966 first_pos = contant_len - last_pos;
4967 last_pos = contant_len - 1;
4968 }
4969
4970 if (last_pos == -1) { last_pos = contant_len - 1; }
4971
4972 // Range must be within content length
4973 if (!(0 <= first_pos && first_pos <= last_pos &&
4974 last_pos <= contant_len - 1)) {
4975 return true;
4976 }
4977
4978 // Ranges must be in ascending order
4979 if (first_pos <= prev_first_pos) { return true; }
4980
4981 // Request must not have more than two overlapping ranges
4982 if (first_pos <= prev_last_pos) {
4983 overwrapping_count++;
4984 if (overwrapping_count > 2) { return true; }
4985 }
4986
4987 prev_first_pos = (std::max)(prev_first_pos, first_pos);
4988 prev_last_pos = (std::max)(prev_last_pos, last_pos);
4989 }
4990 }
4991
4992 return false;
4993}
4994
4995inline std::pair<size_t, size_t>
4996get_range_offset_and_length(Range r, size_t content_length) {
4997 assert(r.first != -1 && r.second != -1);
4998 assert(0 <= r.first && r.first < static_cast<ssize_t>(content_length));
4999 assert(r.first <= r.second &&
5000 r.second < static_cast<ssize_t>(content_length));
5001 (void)(content_length);
5002 return std::make_pair(r.first, static_cast<size_t>(r.second - r.first) + 1);
5003}
5004
5005inline std::string make_content_range_header_field(
5006 const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &offset_and_length, size_t content_length) {
5007 auto st = offset_and_length.first;
5008 auto ed = st + offset_and_length.second - 1;
5009
5010 std::string field = "bytes ";
5011 field += std::to_string(st);
5012 field += "-";
5013 field += std::to_string(ed);
5014 field += "/";
5015 field += std::to_string(content_length);
5016 return field;
5017}
5018
5019template <typename SToken, typename CToken, typename Content>
5020bool process_multipart_ranges_data(const Request &req,
5021 const std::string &boundary,
5022 const std::string &content_type,
5023 size_t content_length, SToken stoken,
5024 CToken ctoken, Content content) {
5025 for (size_t i = 0; i < req.ranges.size(); i++) {
5026 ctoken("--");
5027 stoken(boundary);
5028 ctoken("\r\n");
5029 if (!content_type.empty()) {
5030 ctoken("Content-Type: ");
5031 stoken(content_type);
5032 ctoken("\r\n");
5033 }
5034
5035 auto offset_and_length =
5036 get_range_offset_and_length(req.ranges[i], content_length);
5037
5038 ctoken("Content-Range: ");
5039 stoken(make_content_range_header_field(offset_and_length, content_length));
5040 ctoken("\r\n");
5041 ctoken("\r\n");
5042
5043 if (!content(offset_and_length.first, offset_and_length.second)) {
5044 return false;
5045 }
5046 ctoken("\r\n");
5047 }
5048
5049 ctoken("--");
5050 stoken(boundary);
5051 ctoken("--");
5052
5053 return true;
5054}
5055
5056inline void make_multipart_ranges_data(const Request &req, Response &res,
5057 const std::string &boundary,
5058 const std::string &content_type,
5059 size_t content_length,
5060 std::string &data) {
5061 process_multipart_ranges_data(
5062 req, boundary, content_type, content_length,
5063 [&](const std::string &token) { data += token; },
5064 [&](const std::string &token) { data += token; },
5065 [&](size_t offset, size_t length) {
5066 assert(offset + length <= content_length);
5067 data += res.body.substr(offset, length);
5068 return true;
5069 });
5070}
5071
5072inline size_t get_multipart_ranges_data_length(const Request &req,
5073 const std::string &boundary,
5074 const std::string &content_type,
5075 size_t content_length) {
5076 size_t data_length = 0;
5077
5078 process_multipart_ranges_data(
5079 req, boundary, content_type, content_length,
5080 [&](const std::string &token) { data_length += token.size(); },
5081 [&](const std::string &token) { data_length += token.size(); },
5082 [&](size_t /*offset*/, size_t length) {
5083 data_length += length;
5084 return true;
5085 });
5086
5087 return data_length;
5088}
5089
5090template <typename T>
5091inline bool
5092write_multipart_ranges_data(Stream &strm, const Request &req, Response &res,
5093 const std::string &boundary,
5094 const std::string &content_type,
5095 size_t content_length, const T &is_shutting_down) {
5096 return process_multipart_ranges_data(
5097 req, boundary, content_type, content_length,
5098 [&](const std::string &token) { strm.write(token); },
5099 [&](const std::string &token) { strm.write(token); },
5100 [&](size_t offset, size_t length) {
5101 return write_content(strm, res.content_provider_, offset, length,
5102 is_shutting_down);
5103 });
5104}
5105
5106inline bool expect_content(const Request &req) {
5107 if (req.method == "POST" || req.method == "PUT" || req.method == "PATCH" ||
5108 req.method == "PRI" || req.method == "DELETE") {
5109 return true;
5110 }
5111 // TODO: check if Content-Length is set
5112 return false;
5113}
5114
5115inline bool has_crlf(const std::string &s) {
5116 auto p = s.c_str();
5117 while (*p) {
5118 if (*p == '\r' || *p == '\n') { return true; }
5119 p++;
5120 }
5121 return false;
5122}
5123
5124#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
5125inline std::string message_digest(const std::string &s, const EVP_MD *algo) {
5126 auto context = std::unique_ptr<EVP_MD_CTX, decltype(&EVP_MD_CTX_free)>(
5127 EVP_MD_CTX_new(), EVP_MD_CTX_free);
5128
5129 unsigned int hash_length = 0;
5130 unsigned char hash[EVP_MAX_MD_SIZE];
5131
5132 EVP_DigestInit_ex(context.get(), algo, nullptr);
5133 EVP_DigestUpdate(context.get(), s.c_str(), s.size());
5134 EVP_DigestFinal_ex(context.get(), hash, &hash_length);
5135
5136 std::stringstream ss;
5137 for (auto i = 0u; i < hash_length; ++i) {
5138 ss << std::hex << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
5139 << static_cast<unsigned int>(hash[i]);
5140 }
5141
5142 return ss.str();
5143}
5144
5145inline std::string MD5(const std::string &s) {
5146 return message_digest(s, EVP_md5());
5147}
5148
5149inline std::string SHA_256(const std::string &s) {
5150 return message_digest(s, EVP_sha256());
5151}
5152
5153inline std::string SHA_512(const std::string &s) {
5154 return message_digest(s, EVP_sha512());
5155}
5156#endif
5157
5158#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
5159#ifdef _WIN32
5160// NOTE: This code came up with the following stackoverflow post:
5161// https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9507184/can-openssl-on-windows-use-the-system-certificate-store
5162inline bool load_system_certs_on_windows(X509_STORE *store) {
5163 auto hStore = CertOpenSystemStoreW((HCRYPTPROV_LEGACY)NULL, L"ROOT");
5164 if (!hStore) { return false; }
5165
5166 auto result = false;
5167 PCCERT_CONTEXT pContext = NULL;
5168 while ((pContext = CertEnumCertificatesInStore(hStore, pContext)) !=
5169 nullptr) {
5170 auto encoded_cert =
5171 static_cast<const unsigned char *>(pContext->pbCertEncoded);
5172
5173 auto x509 = d2i_X509(NULL, &encoded_cert, pContext->cbCertEncoded);
5174 if (x509) {
5175 X509_STORE_add_cert(store, x509);
5176 X509_free(x509);
5177 result = true;
5178 }
5179 }
5180
5181 CertFreeCertificateContext(pContext);
5182 CertCloseStore(hStore, 0);
5183
5184 return result;
5185}
5186#elif defined(CPPHTTPLIB_USE_CERTS_FROM_MACOSX_KEYCHAIN) && defined(__APPLE__)
5187#if TARGET_OS_OSX
5188template <typename T>
5189using CFObjectPtr =
5190 std::unique_ptr<typename std::remove_pointer<T>::type, void (*)(CFTypeRef)>;
5191
5192inline void cf_object_ptr_deleter(CFTypeRef obj) {
5193 if (obj) { CFRelease(obj); }
5194}
5195
5196inline bool retrieve_certs_from_keychain(CFObjectPtr<CFArrayRef> &certs) {
5197 CFStringRef keys[] = {kSecClass, kSecMatchLimit, kSecReturnRef};
5198 CFTypeRef values[] = {kSecClassCertificate, kSecMatchLimitAll,
5199 kCFBooleanTrue};
5200
5201 CFObjectPtr<CFDictionaryRef> query(
5202 CFDictionaryCreate(nullptr, reinterpret_cast<const void **>(keys), values,
5203 sizeof(keys) / sizeof(keys[0]),
5204 &kCFTypeDictionaryKeyCallBacks,
5205 &kCFTypeDictionaryValueCallBacks),
5206 cf_object_ptr_deleter);
5207
5208 if (!query) { return false; }
5209
5210 CFTypeRef security_items = nullptr;
5211 if (SecItemCopyMatching(query.get(), &security_items) != errSecSuccess ||
5212 CFArrayGetTypeID() != CFGetTypeID(security_items)) {
5213 return false;
5214 }
5215
5216 certs.reset(reinterpret_cast<CFArrayRef>(security_items));
5217 return true;
5218}
5219
5220inline bool retrieve_root_certs_from_keychain(CFObjectPtr<CFArrayRef> &certs) {
5221 CFArrayRef root_security_items = nullptr;
5222 if (SecTrustCopyAnchorCertificates(&root_security_items) != errSecSuccess) {
5223 return false;
5224 }
5225
5226 certs.reset(root_security_items);
5227 return true;
5228}
5229
5230inline bool add_certs_to_x509_store(CFArrayRef certs, X509_STORE *store) {
5231 auto result = false;
5232 for (auto i = 0; i < CFArrayGetCount(certs); ++i) {
5233 const auto cert = reinterpret_cast<const __SecCertificate *>(
5234 CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(certs, i));
5235
5236 if (SecCertificateGetTypeID() != CFGetTypeID(cert)) { continue; }
5237
5238 CFDataRef cert_data = nullptr;
5239 if (SecItemExport(cert, kSecFormatX509Cert, 0, nullptr, &cert_data) !=
5240 errSecSuccess) {
5241 continue;
5242 }
5243
5244 CFObjectPtr<CFDataRef> cert_data_ptr(cert_data, cf_object_ptr_deleter);
5245
5246 auto encoded_cert = static_cast<const unsigned char *>(
5247 CFDataGetBytePtr(cert_data_ptr.get()));
5248
5249 auto x509 =
5250 d2i_X509(NULL, &encoded_cert, CFDataGetLength(cert_data_ptr.get()));
5251
5252 if (x509) {
5253 X509_STORE_add_cert(store, x509);
5254 X509_free(x509);
5255 result = true;
5256 }
5257 }
5258
5259 return result;
5260}
5261
5262inline bool load_system_certs_on_macos(X509_STORE *store) {
5263 auto result = false;
5264 CFObjectPtr<CFArrayRef> certs(nullptr, cf_object_ptr_deleter);
5265 if (retrieve_certs_from_keychain(certs) && certs) {
5266 result = add_certs_to_x509_store(certs.get(), store);
5267 }
5268
5269 if (retrieve_root_certs_from_keychain(certs) && certs) {
5270 result = add_certs_to_x509_store(certs.get(), store) || result;
5271 }
5272
5273 return result;
5274}
5275#endif // TARGET_OS_OSX
5276#endif // _WIN32
5277#endif // CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
5278
5279#ifdef _WIN32
5280class WSInit {
5281public:
5282 WSInit() {
5283 WSADATA wsaData;
5284 if (WSAStartup(0x0002, &wsaData) == 0) is_valid_ = true;
5285 }
5286
5287 ~WSInit() {
5288 if (is_valid_) WSACleanup();
5289 }
5290
5291 bool is_valid_ = false;
5292};
5293
5294static WSInit wsinit_;
5295#endif
5296
5297#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
5298inline std::pair<std::string, std::string> make_digest_authentication_header(
5299 const Request &req, const std::map<std::string, std::string> &auth,
5300 size_t cnonce_count, const std::string &cnonce, const std::string &username,
5301 const std::string &password, bool is_proxy = false) {
5302 std::string nc;
5303 {
5304 std::stringstream ss;
5305 ss << std::setfill('0') << std::setw(8) << std::hex << cnonce_count;
5306 nc = ss.str();
5307 }
5308
5309 std::string qop;
5310 if (auth.find("qop") != auth.end()) {
5311 qop = auth.at("qop");
5312 if (qop.find("auth-int") != std::string::npos) {
5313 qop = "auth-int";
5314 } else if (qop.find("auth") != std::string::npos) {
5315 qop = "auth";
5316 } else {
5317 qop.clear();
5318 }
5319 }
5320
5321 std::string algo = "MD5";
5322 if (auth.find("algorithm") != auth.end()) { algo = auth.at("algorithm"); }
5323
5324 std::string response;
5325 {
5326 auto H = algo == "SHA-256" ? detail::SHA_256
5327 : algo == "SHA-512" ? detail::SHA_512
5328 : detail::MD5;
5329
5330 auto A1 = username + ":" + auth.at("realm") + ":" + password;
5331
5332 auto A2 = req.method + ":" + req.path;
5333 if (qop == "auth-int") { A2 += ":" + H(req.body); }
5334
5335 if (qop.empty()) {
5336 response = H(H(A1) + ":" + auth.at("nonce") + ":" + H(A2));
5337 } else {
5338 response = H(H(A1) + ":" + auth.at("nonce") + ":" + nc + ":" + cnonce +
5339 ":" + qop + ":" + H(A2));
5340 }
5341 }
5342
5343 auto opaque = (auth.find("opaque") != auth.end()) ? auth.at("opaque") : "";
5344
5345 auto field = "Digest username=\"" + username + "\", realm=\"" +
5346 auth.at("realm") + "\", nonce=\"" + auth.at("nonce") +
5347 "\", uri=\"" + req.path + "\", algorithm=" + algo +
5348 (qop.empty() ? ", response=\""
5349 : ", qop=" + qop + ", nc=" + nc + ", cnonce=\"" +
5350 cnonce + "\", response=\"") +
5351 response + "\"" +
5352 (opaque.empty() ? "" : ", opaque=\"" + opaque + "\"");
5353
5354 auto key = is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authorization" : "Authorization";
5355 return std::make_pair(key, field);
5356}
5357#endif
5358
5359inline bool parse_www_authenticate(const Response &res,
5360 std::map<std::string, std::string> &auth,
5361 bool is_proxy) {
5362 auto auth_key = is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authenticate" : "WWW-Authenticate";
5363 if (res.has_header(auth_key)) {
5364 static auto re = std::regex(R"~((?:(?:,\s*)?(.+?)=(?:"(.*?)"|([^,]*))))~");
5365 auto s = res.get_header_value(auth_key);
5366 auto pos = s.find(' ');
5367 if (pos != std::string::npos) {
5368 auto type = s.substr(0, pos);
5369 if (type == "Basic") {
5370 return false;
5371 } else if (type == "Digest") {
5372 s = s.substr(pos + 1);
5373 auto beg = std::sregex_iterator(s.begin(), s.end(), re);
5374 for (auto i = beg; i != std::sregex_iterator(); ++i) {
5375 const auto &m = *i;
5376 auto key = s.substr(static_cast<size_t>(m.position(1)),
5377 static_cast<size_t>(m.length(1)));
5378 auto val = m.length(2) > 0
5379 ? s.substr(static_cast<size_t>(m.position(2)),
5380 static_cast<size_t>(m.length(2)))
5381 : s.substr(static_cast<size_t>(m.position(3)),
5382 static_cast<size_t>(m.length(3)));
5383 auth[key] = val;
5384 }
5385 return true;
5386 }
5387 }
5388 }
5389 return false;
5390}
5391
5392class ContentProviderAdapter {
5393public:
5394 explicit ContentProviderAdapter(
5395 ContentProviderWithoutLength &&content_provider)
5396 : content_provider_(content_provider) {}
5397
5398 bool operator()(size_t offset, size_t, DataSink &sink) {
5399 return content_provider_(offset, sink);
5400 }
5401
5402private:
5403 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_;
5404};
5405
5406} // namespace detail
5407
5408inline std::string hosted_at(const std::string &hostname) {
5409 std::vector<std::string> addrs;
5410 hosted_at(hostname, addrs);
5411 if (addrs.empty()) { return std::string(); }
5412 return addrs[0];
5413}
5414
5415inline void hosted_at(const std::string &hostname,
5416 std::vector<std::string> &addrs) {
5417 struct addrinfo hints;
5418 struct addrinfo *result;
5419
5420 memset(&hints, 0, sizeof(struct addrinfo));
5421 hints.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
5422 hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
5423 hints.ai_protocol = 0;
5424
5425 if (getaddrinfo(hostname.c_str(), nullptr, &hints, &result)) {
5426#if defined __linux__ && !defined __ANDROID__
5427 res_init();
5428#endif
5429 return;
5430 }
5431
5432 for (auto rp = result; rp; rp = rp->ai_next) {
5433 const auto &addr =
5434 *reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_storage *>(rp->ai_addr);
5435 std::string ip;
5436 auto dummy = -1;
5437 if (detail::get_ip_and_port(addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_storage), ip,
5438 dummy)) {
5439 addrs.push_back(ip);
5440 }
5441 }
5442
5443 freeaddrinfo(result);
5444}
5445
5446inline std::string append_query_params(const std::string &path,
5447 const Params &params) {
5448 std::string path_with_query = path;
5449 const static std::regex re("[^?]+\\?.*");
5450 auto delm = std::regex_match(path, re) ? '&' : '?';
5451 path_with_query += delm + detail::params_to_query_str(params);
5452 return path_with_query;
5453}
5454
5455// Header utilities
5456inline std::pair<std::string, std::string>
5457make_range_header(const Ranges &ranges) {
5458 std::string field = "bytes=";
5459 auto i = 0;
5460 for (const auto &r : ranges) {
5461 if (i != 0) { field += ", "; }
5462 if (r.first != -1) { field += std::to_string(r.first); }
5463 field += '-';
5464 if (r.second != -1) { field += std::to_string(r.second); }
5465 i++;
5466 }
5467 return std::make_pair("Range", std::move(field));
5468}
5469
5470inline std::pair<std::string, std::string>
5471make_basic_authentication_header(const std::string &username,
5472 const std::string &password, bool is_proxy) {
5473 auto field = "Basic " + detail::base64_encode(username + ":" + password);
5474 auto key = is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authorization" : "Authorization";
5475 return std::make_pair(key, std::move(field));
5476}
5477
5478inline std::pair<std::string, std::string>
5479make_bearer_token_authentication_header(const std::string &token,
5480 bool is_proxy = false) {
5481 auto field = "Bearer " + token;
5482 auto key = is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authorization" : "Authorization";
5483 return std::make_pair(key, std::move(field));
5484}
5485
5486// Request implementation
5487inline bool Request::has_header(const std::string &key) const {
5488 return detail::has_header(headers, key);
5489}
5490
5491inline std::string Request::get_header_value(const std::string &key,
5492 size_t id) const {
5493 return detail::get_header_value(headers, key, id, "");
5494}
5495
5496inline size_t Request::get_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const {
5497 auto r = headers.equal_range(key);
5498 return static_cast<size_t>(std::distance(r.first, r.second));
5499}
5500
5501inline void Request::set_header(const std::string &key,
5502 const std::string &val) {
5503 if (!detail::has_crlf(key) && !detail::has_crlf(val)) {
5504 headers.emplace(key, val);
5505 }
5506}
5507
5508inline bool Request::has_param(const std::string &key) const {
5509 return params.find(key) != params.end();
5510}
5511
5512inline std::string Request::get_param_value(const std::string &key,
5513 size_t id) const {
5514 auto rng = params.equal_range(key);
5515 auto it = rng.first;
5516 std::advance(it, static_cast<ssize_t>(id));
5517 if (it != rng.second) { return it->second; }
5518 return std::string();
5519}
5520
5521inline size_t Request::get_param_value_count(const std::string &key) const {
5522 auto r = params.equal_range(key);
5523 return static_cast<size_t>(std::distance(r.first, r.second));
5524}
5525
5526inline bool Request::is_multipart_form_data() const {
5527 const auto &content_type = get_header_value("Content-Type");
5528 return !content_type.rfind("multipart/form-data", 0);
5529}
5530
5531inline bool Request::has_file(const std::string &key) const {
5532 return files.find(key) != files.end();
5533}
5534
5535inline MultipartFormData Request::get_file_value(const std::string &key) const {
5536 auto it = files.find(key);
5537 if (it != files.end()) { return it->second; }
5538 return MultipartFormData();
5539}
5540
5541inline std::vector<MultipartFormData>
5542Request::get_file_values(const std::string &key) const {
5543 std::vector<MultipartFormData> values;
5544 auto rng = files.equal_range(key);
5545 for (auto it = rng.first; it != rng.second; it++) {
5546 values.push_back(it->second);
5547 }
5548 return values;
5549}
5550
5551// Response implementation
5552inline bool Response::has_header(const std::string &key) const {
5553 return headers.find(key) != headers.end();
5554}
5555
5556inline std::string Response::get_header_value(const std::string &key,
5557 size_t id) const {
5558 return detail::get_header_value(headers, key, id, "");
5559}
5560
5561inline size_t Response::get_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const {
5562 auto r = headers.equal_range(key);
5563 return static_cast<size_t>(std::distance(r.first, r.second));
5564}
5565
5566inline void Response::set_header(const std::string &key,
5567 const std::string &val) {
5568 if (!detail::has_crlf(key) && !detail::has_crlf(val)) {
5569 headers.emplace(key, val);
5570 }
5571}
5572
5573inline void Response::set_redirect(const std::string &url, int stat) {
5574 if (!detail::has_crlf(url)) {
5575 set_header("Location", url);
5576 if (300 <= stat && stat < 400) {
5577 this->status = stat;
5578 } else {
5579 this->status = StatusCode::Found_302;
5580 }
5581 }
5582}
5583
5584inline void Response::set_content(const char *s, size_t n,
5585 const std::string &content_type) {
5586 body.assign(s, n);
5587
5588 auto rng = headers.equal_range("Content-Type");
5589 headers.erase(rng.first, rng.second);
5590 set_header("Content-Type", content_type);
5591}
5592
5593inline void Response::set_content(const std::string &s,
5594 const std::string &content_type) {
5595 set_content(s.data(), s.size(), content_type);
5596}
5597
5598inline void Response::set_content(std::string &&s,
5599 const std::string &content_type) {
5600 body = std::move(s);
5601
5602 auto rng = headers.equal_range("Content-Type");
5603 headers.erase(rng.first, rng.second);
5604 set_header("Content-Type", content_type);
5605}
5606
5607inline void Response::set_content_provider(
