5608 size_t in_length, const std::string &content_type, ContentProvider provider,
5609 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser) {
5610 set_header("Content-Type", content_type);
5611 content_length_ = in_length;
5612 if (in_length > 0) { content_provider_ = std::move(provider); }
5613 content_provider_resource_releaser_ = std::move(resource_releaser);
5614 is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
5615}
5616
5617inline void Response::set_content_provider(
5618 const std::string &content_type, ContentProviderWithoutLength provider,
5619 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser) {
5620 set_header("Content-Type", content_type);
5621 content_length_ = 0;
5622 content_provider_ = detail::ContentProviderAdapter(std::move(provider));
5623 content_provider_resource_releaser_ = std::move(resource_releaser);
5624 is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
5625}
5626
5627inline void Response::set_chunked_content_provider(
5628 const std::string &content_type, ContentProviderWithoutLength provider,
5629 ContentProviderResourceReleaser resource_releaser) {
5630 set_header("Content-Type", content_type);
5631 content_length_ = 0;
5632 content_provider_ = detail::ContentProviderAdapter(std::move(provider));
5633 content_provider_resource_releaser_ = std::move(resource_releaser);
5634 is_chunked_content_provider_ = true;
5635}
5636
5637// Result implementation
5638inline bool Result::has_request_header(const std::string &key) const {
5639 return request_headers_.find(key) != request_headers_.end();
5640}
5641
5642inline std::string Result::get_request_header_value(const std::string &key,
5643 size_t id) const {
5644 return detail::get_header_value(request_headers_, key, id, "");
5645}
5646
5647inline size_t
5648Result::get_request_header_value_count(const std::string &key) const {
5649 auto r = request_headers_.equal_range(key);
5650 return static_cast<size_t>(std::distance(r.first, r.second));
5651}
5652
5653// Stream implementation
5654inline ssize_t Stream::write(const char *ptr) {
5655 return write(ptr, strlen(ptr));
5656}
5657
5658inline ssize_t Stream::write(const std::string &s) {
5659 return write(s.data(), s.size());
5660}
5661
5662namespace detail {
5663
5664// Socket stream implementation
5665inline SocketStream::SocketStream(socket_t sock, time_t read_timeout_sec,
5666 time_t read_timeout_usec,
5667 time_t write_timeout_sec,
5668 time_t write_timeout_usec)
5669 : sock_(sock), read_timeout_sec_(read_timeout_sec),
5670 read_timeout_usec_(read_timeout_usec),
5671 write_timeout_sec_(write_timeout_sec),
5672 write_timeout_usec_(write_timeout_usec), read_buff_(read_buff_size_, 0) {}
5673
5674inline SocketStream::~SocketStream() = default;
5675
5676inline bool SocketStream::is_readable() const {
5677 return select_read(sock_, read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_) > 0;
5678}
5679
5680inline bool SocketStream::is_writable() const {
5681 return select_write(sock_, write_timeout_sec_, write_timeout_usec_) > 0 &&
5682 is_socket_alive(sock_);
5683}
5684
5685inline ssize_t SocketStream::read(char *ptr, size_t size) {
5686#ifdef _WIN32
5687 size =
5688 (std::min)(size, static_cast<size_t>((std::numeric_limits<int>::max)()));
5689#else
5690 size = (std::min)(size,
5691 static_cast<size_t>((std::numeric_limits<ssize_t>::max)()));
5692#endif
5693
5694 if (read_buff_off_ < read_buff_content_size_) {
5695 auto remaining_size = read_buff_content_size_ - read_buff_off_;
5696 if (size <= remaining_size) {
5697 memcpy(ptr, read_buff_.data() + read_buff_off_, size);
5698 read_buff_off_ += size;
5699 return static_cast<ssize_t>(size);
5700 } else {
5701 memcpy(ptr, read_buff_.data() + read_buff_off_, remaining_size);
5702 read_buff_off_ += remaining_size;
5703 return static_cast<ssize_t>(remaining_size);
5704 }
5705 }
5706
5707 if (!is_readable()) { return -1; }
5708
5709 read_buff_off_ = 0;
5710 read_buff_content_size_ = 0;
5711
5712 if (size < read_buff_size_) {
5713 auto n = read_socket(sock_, read_buff_.data(), read_buff_size_,
5714 CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_FLAGS);
5715 if (n <= 0) {
5716 return n;
5717 } else if (n <= static_cast<ssize_t>(size)) {
5718 memcpy(ptr, read_buff_.data(), static_cast<size_t>(n));
5719 return n;
5720 } else {
5721 memcpy(ptr, read_buff_.data(), size);
5722 read_buff_off_ = size;
5723 read_buff_content_size_ = static_cast<size_t>(n);
5724 return static_cast<ssize_t>(size);
5725 }
5726 } else {
5727 return read_socket(sock_, ptr, size, CPPHTTPLIB_RECV_FLAGS);
5728 }
5729}
5730
5731inline ssize_t SocketStream::write(const char *ptr, size_t size) {
5732 if (!is_writable()) { return -1; }
5733
5734#if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_WIN64)
5735 size =
5736 (std::min)(size, static_cast<size_t>((std::numeric_limits<int>::max)()));
5737#endif
5738
5739 return send_socket(sock_, ptr, size, CPPHTTPLIB_SEND_FLAGS);
5740}
5741
5742inline void SocketStream::get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string &ip,
5743 int &port) const {
5744 return detail::get_remote_ip_and_port(sock_, ip, port);
5745}
5746
5747inline void SocketStream::get_local_ip_and_port(std::string &ip,
5748 int &port) const {
5749 return detail::get_local_ip_and_port(sock_, ip, port);
5750}
5751
5752inline socket_t SocketStream::socket() const { return sock_; }
5753
5754// Buffer stream implementation
5755inline bool BufferStream::is_readable() const { return true; }
5756
5757inline bool BufferStream::is_writable() const { return true; }
5758
5759inline ssize_t BufferStream::read(char *ptr, size_t size) {
5760#if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1910
5761 auto len_read = buffer._Copy_s(ptr, size, size, position);
5762#else
5763 auto len_read = buffer.copy(ptr, size, position);
5764#endif
5765 position += static_cast<size_t>(len_read);
5766 return static_cast<ssize_t>(len_read);
5767}
5768
5769inline ssize_t BufferStream::write(const char *ptr, size_t size) {
5770 buffer.append(ptr, size);
5771 return static_cast<ssize_t>(size);
5772}
5773
5774inline void BufferStream::get_remote_ip_and_port(std::string & /*ip*/,
5775 int & /*port*/) const {}
5776
5777inline void BufferStream::get_local_ip_and_port(std::string & /*ip*/,
5778 int & /*port*/) const {}
5779
5780inline socket_t BufferStream::socket() const { return 0; }
5781
5782inline const std::string &BufferStream::get_buffer() const { return buffer; }
5783
5784inline PathParamsMatcher::PathParamsMatcher(const std::string &pattern) {
5785 // One past the last ending position of a path param substring
5786 std::size_t last_param_end = 0;
5787
5788#ifndef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
5789 // Needed to ensure that parameter names are unique during matcher
5790 // construction
5791 // If exceptions are disabled, only last duplicate path
5792 // parameter will be set
5793 std::unordered_set<std::string> param_name_set;
5794#endif
5795
5796 while (true) {
5797 const auto marker_pos = pattern.find(marker, last_param_end);
5798 if (marker_pos == std::string::npos) { break; }
5799
5800 static_fragments_.push_back(
5801 pattern.substr(last_param_end, marker_pos - last_param_end));
5802
5803 const auto param_name_start = marker_pos + 1;
5804
5805 auto sep_pos = pattern.find(separator, param_name_start);
5806 if (sep_pos == std::string::npos) { sep_pos = pattern.length(); }
5807
5808 auto param_name =
5809 pattern.substr(param_name_start, sep_pos - param_name_start);
5810
5811#ifndef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
5812 if (param_name_set.find(param_name) != param_name_set.cend()) {
5813 std::string msg = "Encountered path parameter '" + param_name +
5814 "' multiple times in route pattern '" + pattern + "'.";
5815 throw std::invalid_argument(msg);
5816 }
5817#endif
5818
5819 param_names_.push_back(std::move(param_name));
5820
5821 last_param_end = sep_pos + 1;
5822 }
5823
5824 if (last_param_end < pattern.length()) {
5825 static_fragments_.push_back(pattern.substr(last_param_end));
5826 }
5827}
5828
5829inline bool PathParamsMatcher::match(Request &request) const {
5830 request.matches = std::smatch();
5831 request.path_params.clear();
5832 request.path_params.reserve(param_names_.size());
5833
5834 // One past the position at which the path matched the pattern last time
5835 std::size_t starting_pos = 0;
5836 for (size_t i = 0; i < static_fragments_.size(); ++i) {
5837 const auto &fragment = static_fragments_[i];
5838
5839 if (starting_pos + fragment.length() > request.path.length()) {
5840 return false;
5841 }
5842
5843 // Avoid unnecessary allocation by using strncmp instead of substr +
5844 // comparison
5845 if (std::strncmp(request.path.c_str() + starting_pos, fragment.c_str(),
5846 fragment.length()) != 0) {
5847 return false;
5848 }
5849
5850 starting_pos += fragment.length();
5851
5852 // Should only happen when we have a static fragment after a param
5853 // Example: '/users/:id/subscriptions'
5854 // The 'subscriptions' fragment here does not have a corresponding param
5855 if (i >= param_names_.size()) { continue; }
5856
5857 auto sep_pos = request.path.find(separator, starting_pos);
5858 if (sep_pos == std::string::npos) { sep_pos = request.path.length(); }
5859
5860 const auto &param_name = param_names_[i];
5861
5862 request.path_params.emplace(
5863 param_name, request.path.substr(starting_pos, sep_pos - starting_pos));
5864
5865 // Mark everythin up to '/' as matched
5866 starting_pos = sep_pos + 1;
5867 }
5868 // Returns false if the path is longer than the pattern
5869 return starting_pos >= request.path.length();
5870}
5871
5872inline bool RegexMatcher::match(Request &request) const {
5873 request.path_params.clear();
5874 return std::regex_match(request.path, request.matches, regex_);
5875}
5876
5877} // namespace detail
5878
5879// HTTP server implementation
5880inline Server::Server()
5881 : new_task_queue(
5882 [] { return new ThreadPool(CPPHTTPLIB_THREAD_POOL_COUNT); }) {
5883#ifndef _WIN32
5884 signal(SIGPIPE, SIG_IGN);
5885#endif
5886}
5887
5888inline Server::~Server() = default;
5889
5890inline std::unique_ptr<detail::MatcherBase>
5891Server::make_matcher(const std::string &pattern) {
5892 if (pattern.find("/:") != std::string::npos) {
5893 return detail::make_unique<detail::PathParamsMatcher>(pattern);
5894 } else {
5895 return detail::make_unique<detail::RegexMatcher>(pattern);
5896 }
5897}
5898
5899inline Server &Server::Get(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5900 get_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5901 return *this;
5902}
5903
5904inline Server &Server::Post(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5905 post_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5906 return *this;
5907}
5908
5909inline Server &Server::Post(const std::string &pattern,
5910 HandlerWithContentReader handler) {
5911 post_handlers_for_content_reader_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern),
5912 std::move(handler));
5913 return *this;
5914}
5915
5916inline Server &Server::Put(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5917 put_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5918 return *this;
5919}
5920
5921inline Server &Server::Put(const std::string &pattern,
5922 HandlerWithContentReader handler) {
5923 put_handlers_for_content_reader_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern),
5924 std::move(handler));
5925 return *this;
5926}
5927
5928inline Server &Server::Patch(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5929 patch_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5930 return *this;
5931}
5932
5933inline Server &Server::Patch(const std::string &pattern,
5934 HandlerWithContentReader handler) {
5935 patch_handlers_for_content_reader_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern),
5936 std::move(handler));
5937 return *this;
5938}
5939
5940inline Server &Server::Delete(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5941 delete_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5942 return *this;
5943}
5944
5945inline Server &Server::Delete(const std::string &pattern,
5946 HandlerWithContentReader handler) {
5947 delete_handlers_for_content_reader_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern),
5948 std::move(handler));
5949 return *this;
5950}
5951
5952inline Server &Server::Options(const std::string &pattern, Handler handler) {
5953 options_handlers_.emplace_back(make_matcher(pattern), std::move(handler));
5954 return *this;
5955}
5956
5957inline bool Server::set_base_dir(const std::string &dir,
5958 const std::string &mount_point) {
5959 return set_mount_point(mount_point, dir);
5960}
5961
5962inline bool Server::set_mount_point(const std::string &mount_point,
5963 const std::string &dir, Headers headers) {
5964 if (detail::is_dir(dir)) {
5965 std::string mnt = !mount_point.empty() ? mount_point : "/";
5966 if (!mnt.empty() && mnt[0] == '/') {
5967 base_dirs_.push_back({mnt, dir, std::move(headers)});
5968 return true;
5969 }
5970 }
5971 return false;
5972}
5973
5974inline bool Server::remove_mount_point(const std::string &mount_point) {
5975 for (auto it = base_dirs_.begin(); it != base_dirs_.end(); ++it) {
5976 if (it->mount_point == mount_point) {
5977 base_dirs_.erase(it);
5978 return true;
5979 }
5980 }
5981 return false;
5982}
5983
5984inline Server &
5985Server::set_file_extension_and_mimetype_mapping(const std::string &ext,
5986 const std::string &mime) {
5987 file_extension_and_mimetype_map_[ext] = mime;
5988 return *this;
5989}
5990
5991inline Server &Server::set_default_file_mimetype(const std::string &mime) {
5992 default_file_mimetype_ = mime;
5993 return *this;
5994}
5995
5996inline Server &Server::set_file_request_handler(Handler handler) {
5997 file_request_handler_ = std::move(handler);
5998 return *this;
5999}
6000
6001inline Server &Server::set_error_handler_core(HandlerWithResponse handler,
6002 std::true_type) {
6003 error_handler_ = std::move(handler);
6004 return *this;
6005}
6006
6007inline Server &Server::set_error_handler_core(Handler handler,
6008 std::false_type) {
6009 error_handler_ = [handler](const Request &req, Response &res) {
6010 handler(req, res);
6011 return HandlerResponse::Handled;
6012 };
6013 return *this;
6014}
6015
6016inline Server &Server::set_exception_handler(ExceptionHandler handler) {
6017 exception_handler_ = std::move(handler);
6018 return *this;
6019}
6020
6021inline Server &Server::set_pre_routing_handler(HandlerWithResponse handler) {
6022 pre_routing_handler_ = std::move(handler);
6023 return *this;
6024}
6025
6026inline Server &Server::set_post_routing_handler(Handler handler) {
6027 post_routing_handler_ = std::move(handler);
6028 return *this;
6029}
6030
6031inline Server &Server::set_logger(Logger logger) {
6032 logger_ = std::move(logger);
6033 return *this;
6034}
6035
6036inline Server &
6037Server::set_expect_100_continue_handler(Expect100ContinueHandler handler) {
6038 expect_100_continue_handler_ = std::move(handler);
6039 return *this;
6040}
6041
6042inline Server &Server::set_address_family(int family) {
6043 address_family_ = family;
6044 return *this;
6045}
6046
6047inline Server &Server::set_tcp_nodelay(bool on) {
6048 tcp_nodelay_ = on;
6049 return *this;
6050}
6051
6052inline Server &Server::set_socket_options(SocketOptions socket_options) {
6053 socket_options_ = std::move(socket_options);
6054 return *this;
6055}
6056
6057inline Server &Server::set_default_headers(Headers headers) {
6058 default_headers_ = std::move(headers);
6059 return *this;
6060}
6061
6062inline Server &Server::set_header_writer(
6063 std::function<ssize_t(Stream &, Headers &)> const &writer) {
6064 header_writer_ = writer;
6065 return *this;
6066}
6067
6068inline Server &Server::set_keep_alive_max_count(size_t count) {
6069 keep_alive_max_count_ = count;
6070 return *this;
6071}
6072
6073inline Server &Server::set_keep_alive_timeout(time_t sec) {
6074 keep_alive_timeout_sec_ = sec;
6075 return *this;
6076}
6077
6078inline Server &Server::set_read_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec) {
6079 read_timeout_sec_ = sec;
6080 read_timeout_usec_ = usec;
6081 return *this;
6082}
6083
6084inline Server &Server::set_write_timeout(time_t sec, time_t usec) {
6085 write_timeout_sec_ = sec;
6086 write_timeout_usec_ = usec;
6087 return *this;
6088}
6089
6090inline Server &Server::set_idle_interval(time_t sec, time_t usec) {
6091 idle_interval_sec_ = sec;
6092 idle_interval_usec_ = usec;
6093 return *this;
6094}
6095
6096inline Server &Server::set_payload_max_length(size_t length) {
6097 payload_max_length_ = length;
6098 return *this;
6099}
6100
6101inline bool Server::bind_to_port(const std::string &host, int port,
6102 int socket_flags) {
6103 return bind_internal(host, port, socket_flags) >= 0;
6104}
6105inline int Server::bind_to_any_port(const std::string &host, int socket_flags) {
6106 return bind_internal(host, 0, socket_flags);
6107}
6108
6109inline bool Server::listen_after_bind() {
6110 auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() { done_ = true; });
6111 return listen_internal();
6112}
6113
6114inline bool Server::listen(const std::string &host, int port,
6115 int socket_flags) {
6116 auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() { done_ = true; });
6117 return bind_to_port(host, port, socket_flags) && listen_internal();
6118}
6119
6120inline bool Server::is_running() const { return is_running_; }
6121
6122inline void Server::wait_until_ready() const {
6123 while (!is_running() && !done_) {
6124 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds{1});
6125 }
6126}
6127
6128inline void Server::stop() {
6129 if (is_running_) {
6130 assert(svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET);
6131 std::atomic<socket_t> sock(svr_sock_.exchange(INVALID_SOCKET));
6132 detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
6133 detail::close_socket(sock);
6134 }
6135}
6136
6137inline bool Server::parse_request_line(const char *s, Request &req) const {
6138 auto len = strlen(s);
6139 if (len < 2 || s[len - 2] != '\r' || s[len - 1] != '\n') { return false; }
6140 len -= 2;
6141
6142 {
6143 size_t count = 0;
6144
6145 detail::split(s, s + len, ' ', [&](const char *b, const char *e) {
6146 switch (count) {
6147 case 0: req.method = std::string(b, e); break;
6148 case 1: req.target = std::string(b, e); break;
6149 case 2: req.version = std::string(b, e); break;
6150 default: break;
6151 }
6152 count++;
6153 });
6154
6155 if (count != 3) { return false; }
6156 }
6157
6158 static const std::set<std::string> methods{
6159 "GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE",
6160 "CONNECT", "OPTIONS", "TRACE", "PATCH", "PRI"};
6161
6162 if (methods.find(req.method) == methods.end()) { return false; }
6163
6164 if (req.version != "HTTP/1.1" && req.version != "HTTP/1.0") { return false; }
6165
6166 {
6167 // Skip URL fragment
6168 for (size_t i = 0; i < req.target.size(); i++) {
6169 if (req.target[i] == '#') {
6170 req.target.erase(i);
6171 break;
6172 }
6173 }
6174
6175 detail::divide(req.target, '?',
6176 [&](const char *lhs_data, std::size_t lhs_size,
6177 const char *rhs_data, std::size_t rhs_size) {
6178 req.path = detail::decode_url(
6179 std::string(lhs_data, lhs_size), false);
6180 detail::parse_query_text(rhs_data, rhs_size, req.params);
6181 });
6182 }
6183
6184 return true;
6185}
6186
6187inline bool Server::write_response(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
6188 Request &req, Response &res) {
6189 // NOTE: `req.ranges` should be empty, otherwise it will be applied
6190 // incorrectly to the error content.
6191 req.ranges.clear();
6192 return write_response_core(strm, close_connection, req, res, false);
6193}
6194
6195inline bool Server::write_response_with_content(Stream &strm,
6196 bool close_connection,
6197 const Request &req,
6198 Response &res) {
6199 return write_response_core(strm, close_connection, req, res, true);
6200}
6201
6202inline bool Server::write_response_core(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
6203 const Request &req, Response &res,
6204 bool need_apply_ranges) {
6205 assert(res.status != -1);
6206
6207 if (400 <= res.status && error_handler_ &&
6208 error_handler_(req, res) == HandlerResponse::Handled) {
6209 need_apply_ranges = true;
6210 }
6211
6212 std::string content_type;
6213 std::string boundary;
6214 if (need_apply_ranges) { apply_ranges(req, res, content_type, boundary); }
6215
6216 // Prepare additional headers
6217 if (close_connection || req.get_header_value("Connection") == "close") {
6218 res.set_header("Connection", "close");
6219 } else {
6220 std::stringstream ss;
6221 ss << "timeout=" << keep_alive_timeout_sec_
6222 << ", max=" << keep_alive_max_count_;
6223 res.set_header("Keep-Alive", ss.str());
6224 }
6225
6226 if (!res.has_header("Content-Type") &&
6227 (!res.body.empty() || res.content_length_ > 0 || res.content_provider_)) {
6228 res.set_header("Content-Type", "text/plain");
6229 }
6230
6231 if (!res.has_header("Content-Length") && res.body.empty() &&
6232 !res.content_length_ && !res.content_provider_) {
6233 res.set_header("Content-Length", "0");
6234 }
6235
6236 if (!res.has_header("Accept-Ranges") && req.method == "HEAD") {
6237 res.set_header("Accept-Ranges", "bytes");
6238 }
6239
6240 if (post_routing_handler_) { post_routing_handler_(req, res); }
6241
6242 // Response line and headers
6243 {
6244 detail::BufferStream bstrm;
6245
6246 if (!bstrm.write_format("HTTP/1.1 %d %s\r\n", res.status,
6247 status_message(res.status))) {
6248 return false;
6249 }
6250
6251 if (!header_writer_(bstrm, res.headers)) { return false; }
6252
6253 // Flush buffer
6254 auto &data = bstrm.get_buffer();
6255 detail::write_data(strm, data.data(), data.size());
6256 }
6257
6258 // Body
6259 auto ret = true;
6260 if (req.method != "HEAD") {
6261 if (!res.body.empty()) {
6262 if (!detail::write_data(strm, res.body.data(), res.body.size())) {
6263 ret = false;
6264 }
6265 } else if (res.content_provider_) {
6266 if (write_content_with_provider(strm, req, res, boundary, content_type)) {
6267 res.content_provider_success_ = true;
6268 } else {
6269 ret = false;
6270 }
6271 }
6272 }
6273
6274 // Log
6275 if (logger_) { logger_(req, res); }
6276
6277 return ret;
6278}
6279
6280inline bool
6281Server::write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
6282 Response &res, const std::string &boundary,
6283 const std::string &content_type) {
6284 auto is_shutting_down = [this]() {
6285 return this->svr_sock_ == INVALID_SOCKET;
6286 };
6287
6288 if (res.content_length_ > 0) {
6289 if (req.ranges.empty()) {
6290 return detail::write_content(strm, res.content_provider_, 0,
6291 res.content_length_, is_shutting_down);
6292 } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
6293 auto offset_and_length = detail::get_range_offset_and_length(
6294 req.ranges[0], res.content_length_);
6295
6296 return detail::write_content(strm, res.content_provider_,
6297 offset_and_length.first,
6298 offset_and_length.second, is_shutting_down);
6299 } else {
6300 return detail::write_multipart_ranges_data(
6301 strm, req, res, boundary, content_type, res.content_length_,
6302 is_shutting_down);
6303 }
6304 } else {
6305 if (res.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
6306 auto type = detail::encoding_type(req, res);
6307
6308 std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
6309 if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
6310#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
6311 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
6312#endif
6313 } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
6314#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
6315 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::brotli_compressor>();
6316#endif
6317 } else {
6318 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::nocompressor>();
6319 }
6320 assert(compressor != nullptr);
6321
6322 return detail::write_content_chunked(strm, res.content_provider_,
6323 is_shutting_down, *compressor);
6324 } else {
6325 return detail::write_content_without_length(strm, res.content_provider_,
6326 is_shutting_down);
6327 }
6328 }
6329}
6330
6331inline bool Server::read_content(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res) {
6332 MultipartFormDataMap::iterator cur;
6333 auto file_count = 0;
6334 if (read_content_core(
6335 strm, req, res,
6336 // Regular
6337 [&](const char *buf, size_t n) {
6338 if (req.body.size() + n > req.body.max_size()) { return false; }
6339 req.body.append(buf, n);
6340 return true;
6341 },
6342 // Multipart
6343 [&](const MultipartFormData &file) {
6344 if (file_count++ == CPPHTTPLIB_MULTIPART_FORM_DATA_FILE_MAX_COUNT) {
6345 return false;
6346 }
6347 cur = req.files.emplace(file.name, file);
6348 return true;
6349 },
6350 [&](const char *buf, size_t n) {
6351 auto &content = cur->second.content;
6352 if (content.size() + n > content.max_size()) { return false; }
6353 content.append(buf, n);
6354 return true;
6355 })) {
6356 const auto &content_type = req.get_header_value("Content-Type");
6357 if (!content_type.find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")) {
6358 if (req.body.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_FORM_URL_ENCODED_PAYLOAD_MAX_LENGTH) {
6359 res.status = StatusCode::PayloadTooLarge_413; // NOTE: should be 414?
6360 return false;
6361 }
6362 detail::parse_query_text(req.body, req.params);
6363 }
6364 return true;
6365 }
6366 return false;
6367}
6368
6369inline bool Server::read_content_with_content_receiver(
6370 Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res, ContentReceiver receiver,
6371 MultipartContentHeader multipart_header,
6372 ContentReceiver multipart_receiver) {
6373 return read_content_core(strm, req, res, std::move(receiver),
6374 std::move(multipart_header),
6375 std::move(multipart_receiver));
6376}
6377
6378inline bool
6379Server::read_content_core(Stream &strm, Request &req, Response &res,
6380 ContentReceiver receiver,
6381 MultipartContentHeader multipart_header,
6382 ContentReceiver multipart_receiver) const {
6383 detail::MultipartFormDataParser multipart_form_data_parser;
6384 ContentReceiverWithProgress out;
6385
6386 if (req.is_multipart_form_data()) {
6387 const auto &content_type = req.get_header_value("Content-Type");
6388 std::string boundary;
6389 if (!detail::parse_multipart_boundary(content_type, boundary)) {
6390 res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
6391 return false;
6392 }
6393
6394 multipart_form_data_parser.set_boundary(std::move(boundary));
6395 out = [&](const char *buf, size_t n, uint64_t /*off*/, uint64_t /*len*/) {
6396 /* For debug
6397 size_t pos = 0;
6398 while (pos < n) {
6399 auto read_size = (std::min)<size_t>(1, n - pos);
6400 auto ret = multipart_form_data_parser.parse(
6401 buf + pos, read_size, multipart_receiver, multipart_header);
6402 if (!ret) { return false; }
6403 pos += read_size;
6404 }
6405 return true;
6406 */
6407 return multipart_form_data_parser.parse(buf, n, multipart_receiver,
6408 multipart_header);
6409 };
6410 } else {
6411 out = [receiver](const char *buf, size_t n, uint64_t /*off*/,
6412 uint64_t /*len*/) { return receiver(buf, n); };
6413 }
6414
6415 if (req.method == "DELETE" && !req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
6416 return true;
6417 }
6418
6419 if (!detail::read_content(strm, req, payload_max_length_, res.status, nullptr,
6420 out, true)) {
6421 return false;
6422 }
6423
6424 if (req.is_multipart_form_data()) {
6425 if (!multipart_form_data_parser.is_valid()) {
6426 res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
6427 return false;
6428 }
6429 }
6430
6431 return true;
6432}
6433
6434inline bool Server::handle_file_request(const Request &req, Response &res,
6435 bool head) {
6436 for (const auto &entry : base_dirs_) {
6437 // Prefix match
6438 if (!req.path.compare(0, entry.mount_point.size(), entry.mount_point)) {
6439 std::string sub_path = "/" + req.path.substr(entry.mount_point.size());
6440 if (detail::is_valid_path(sub_path)) {
6441 auto path = entry.base_dir + sub_path;
6442 if (path.back() == '/') { path += "index.html"; }
6443
6444 if (detail::is_file(path)) {
6445 for (const auto &kv : entry.headers) {
6446 res.set_header(kv.first, kv.second);
6447 }
6448
6449 auto mm = std::make_shared<detail::mmap>(path.c_str());
6450 if (!mm->is_open()) { return false; }
6451
6452 res.set_content_provider(
6453 mm->size(),
6454 detail::find_content_type(path, file_extension_and_mimetype_map_,
6455 default_file_mimetype_),
6456 [mm](size_t offset, size_t length, DataSink &sink) -> bool {
6457 sink.write(mm->data() + offset, length);
6458 return true;
6459 });
6460
6461 if (!head && file_request_handler_) {
6462 file_request_handler_(req, res);
6463 }
6464
6465 return true;
6466 }
6467 }
6468 }
6469 }
6470 return false;
6471}
6472
6473inline socket_t
6474Server::create_server_socket(const std::string &host, int port,
6475 int socket_flags,
6476 SocketOptions socket_options) const {
6477 return detail::create_socket(
6478 host, std::string(), port, address_family_, socket_flags, tcp_nodelay_,
6479 std::move(socket_options),
6480 [](socket_t sock, struct addrinfo &ai, bool & /*quit*/) -> bool {
6481 if (::bind(sock, ai.ai_addr, static_cast<socklen_t>(ai.ai_addrlen))) {
6482 return false;
6483 }
6484 if (::listen(sock, CPPHTTPLIB_LISTEN_BACKLOG)) { return false; }
6485 return true;
6486 });
6487}
6488
6489inline int Server::bind_internal(const std::string &host, int port,
6490 int socket_flags) {
6491 if (!is_valid()) { return -1; }
6492
6493 svr_sock_ = create_server_socket(host, port, socket_flags, socket_options_);
6494 if (svr_sock_ == INVALID_SOCKET) { return -1; }
6495
6496 if (port == 0) {
6497 struct sockaddr_storage addr;
6498 socklen_t addr_len = sizeof(addr);
6499 if (getsockname(svr_sock_, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&addr),
6500 &addr_len) == -1) {
6501 return -1;
6502 }
6503 if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET) {
6504 return ntohs(reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in *>(&addr)->sin_port);
6505 } else if (addr.ss_family == AF_INET6) {
6506 return ntohs(reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in6 *>(&addr)->sin6_port);
6507 } else {
6508 return -1;
6509 }
6510 } else {
6511 return port;
6512 }
6513}
6514
6515inline bool Server::listen_internal() {
6516 auto ret = true;
6517 is_running_ = true;
6518 auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() { is_running_ = false; });
6519
6520 {
6521 std::unique_ptr<TaskQueue> task_queue(new_task_queue());
6522
6523 while (svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET) {
6524#ifndef _WIN32
6525 if (idle_interval_sec_ > 0 || idle_interval_usec_ > 0) {
6526#endif
6527 auto val = detail::select_read(svr_sock_, idle_interval_sec_,
6528 idle_interval_usec_);
6529 if (val == 0) { // Timeout
6530 task_queue->on_idle();
6531 continue;
6532 }
6533#ifndef _WIN32
6534 }
6535#endif
6536
6537#if defined _WIN32
6538 // sockets conneced via WASAccept inherit flags NO_HANDLE_INHERIT,
6539 // OVERLAPPED
6540 socket_t sock = WSAAccept(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, 0);
6541#elif defined SOCK_CLOEXEC
6542 socket_t sock = accept4(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr, SOCK_CLOEXEC);
6543#else
6544 socket_t sock = accept(svr_sock_, nullptr, nullptr);
6545#endif
6546
6547 if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) {
6548 if (errno == EMFILE) {
6549 // The per-process limit of open file descriptors has been reached.
6550 // Try to accept new connections after a short sleep.
6551 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(1));
6552 continue;
6553 } else if (errno == EINTR || errno == EAGAIN) {
6554 continue;
6555 }
6556 if (svr_sock_ != INVALID_SOCKET) {
6557 detail::close_socket(svr_sock_);
6558 ret = false;
6559 } else {
6560 ; // The server socket was closed by user.
6561 }
6562 break;
6563 }
6564
6565 {
6566#ifdef _WIN32
6567 auto timeout = static_cast<uint32_t>(read_timeout_sec_ * 1000 +
6568 read_timeout_usec_ / 1000);
6569 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
6570 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&timeout), sizeof(timeout));
6571#else
6572 timeval tv;
6573 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(read_timeout_sec_);
6574 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(read_timeout_usec_);
6575 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,
6576 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&tv), sizeof(tv));
6577#endif
6578 }
6579 {
6580
6581#ifdef _WIN32
6582 auto timeout = static_cast<uint32_t>(write_timeout_sec_ * 1000 +
6583 write_timeout_usec_ / 1000);
6584 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO,
6585 reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&timeout), sizeof(timeout));
6586#else
6587 timeval tv;
6588 tv.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(write_timeout_sec_);
6589 tv.tv_usec = static_cast<decltype(tv.tv_usec)>(write_timeout_usec_);
6590 setsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDTIMEO,
6591 reinterpret_cast<const void *>(&tv), sizeof(tv));
6592#endif
6593 }
6594
6595 if (!task_queue->enqueue(
6596 [this, sock]() { process_and_close_socket(sock); })) {
6597 detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
6598 detail::close_socket(sock);
6599 }
6600 }
6601
6602 task_queue->shutdown();
6603 }
6604
6605 return ret;
6606}
6607
6608inline bool Server::routing(Request &req, Response &res, Stream &strm) {
6609 if (pre_routing_handler_ &&
6610 pre_routing_handler_(req, res) == HandlerResponse::Handled) {
6611 return true;
6612 }
6613
6614 // File handler
6615 auto is_head_request = req.method == "HEAD";
6616 if ((req.method == "GET" || is_head_request) &&
6617 handle_file_request(req, res, is_head_request)) {
6618 return true;
6619 }
6620
6621 if (detail::expect_content(req)) {
6622 // Content reader handler
6623 {
6624 ContentReader reader(
6625 [&](ContentReceiver receiver) {
6626 return read_content_with_content_receiver(
6627 strm, req, res, std::move(receiver), nullptr, nullptr);
6628 },
6629 [&](MultipartContentHeader header, ContentReceiver receiver) {
6630 return read_content_with_content_receiver(strm, req, res, nullptr,
6631 std::move(header),
6632 std::move(receiver));
6633 });
6634
6635 if (req.method == "POST") {
6636 if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
6637 req, res, std::move(reader),
6638 post_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
6639 return true;
6640 }
6641 } else if (req.method == "PUT") {
6642 if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
6643 req, res, std::move(reader),
6644 put_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
6645 return true;
6646 }
6647 } else if (req.method == "PATCH") {
6648 if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
6649 req, res, std::move(reader),
6650 patch_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
6651 return true;
6652 }
6653 } else if (req.method == "DELETE") {
6654 if (dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
6655 req, res, std::move(reader),
6656 delete_handlers_for_content_reader_)) {
6657 return true;
6658 }
6659 }
6660 }
6661
6662 // Read content into `req.body`
6663 if (!read_content(strm, req, res)) { return false; }
6664 }
6665
6666 // Regular handler
6667 if (req.method == "GET" || req.method == "HEAD") {
6668 return dispatch_request(req, res, get_handlers_);
6669 } else if (req.method == "POST") {
6670 return dispatch_request(req, res, post_handlers_);
6671 } else if (req.method == "PUT") {
6672 return dispatch_request(req, res, put_handlers_);
6673 } else if (req.method == "DELETE") {
6674 return dispatch_request(req, res, delete_handlers_);
6675 } else if (req.method == "OPTIONS") {
6676 return dispatch_request(req, res, options_handlers_);
6677 } else if (req.method == "PATCH") {
6678 return dispatch_request(req, res, patch_handlers_);
6679 }
6680
6681 res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
6682 return false;
6683}
6684
6685inline bool Server::dispatch_request(Request &req, Response &res,
6686 const Handlers &handlers) const {
6687 for (const auto &x : handlers) {
6688 const auto &matcher = x.first;
6689 const auto &handler = x.second;
6690
6691 if (matcher->match(req)) {
6692 handler(req, res);
6693 return true;
6694 }
6695 }
6696 return false;
6697}
6698
6699inline void Server::apply_ranges(const Request &req, Response &res,
6700 std::string &content_type,
6701 std::string &boundary) const {
6702 if (req.ranges.size() > 1 && res.status == StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
6703 auto it = res.headers.find("Content-Type");
6704 if (it != res.headers.end()) {
6705 content_type = it->second;
6706 res.headers.erase(it);
6707 }
6708
6709 boundary = detail::make_multipart_data_boundary();
6710
6711 res.set_header("Content-Type",
6712 "multipart/byteranges; boundary=" + boundary);
6713 }
6714
6715 auto type = detail::encoding_type(req, res);
6716
6717 if (res.body.empty()) {
6718 if (res.content_length_ > 0) {
6719 size_t length = 0;
6720 if (req.ranges.empty() || res.status != StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
6721 length = res.content_length_;
6722 } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
6723 auto offset_and_length = detail::get_range_offset_and_length(
6724 req.ranges[0], res.content_length_);
6725
6726 length = offset_and_length.second;
6727
6728 auto content_range = detail::make_content_range_header_field(
6729 offset_and_length, res.content_length_);
6730 res.set_header("Content-Range", content_range);
6731 } else {
6732 length = detail::get_multipart_ranges_data_length(
6733 req, boundary, content_type, res.content_length_);
6734 }
6735 res.set_header("Content-Length", std::to_string(length));
6736 } else {
6737 if (res.content_provider_) {
6738 if (res.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
6739 res.set_header("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked");
6740 if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
6741 res.set_header("Content-Encoding", "gzip");
6742 } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
6743 res.set_header("Content-Encoding", "br");
6744 }
6745 }
6746 }
6747 }
6748 } else {
6749 if (req.ranges.empty() || res.status != StatusCode::PartialContent_206) {
6750 ;
6751 } else if (req.ranges.size() == 1) {
6752 auto offset_and_length =
6753 detail::get_range_offset_and_length(req.ranges[0], res.body.size());
6754 auto offset = offset_and_length.first;
6755 auto length = offset_and_length.second;
6756
6757 auto content_range = detail::make_content_range_header_field(
6758 offset_and_length, res.body.size());
6759 res.set_header("Content-Range", content_range);
6760
6761 assert(offset + length <= res.body.size());
6762 res.body = res.body.substr(offset, length);
6763 } else {
6764 std::string data;
6765 detail::make_multipart_ranges_data(req, res, boundary, content_type,
6766 res.body.size(), data);
6767 res.body.swap(data);
6768 }
6769
6770 if (type != detail::EncodingType::None) {
6771 std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
6772 std::string content_encoding;
6773
6774 if (type == detail::EncodingType::Gzip) {
6775#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
6776 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
6777 content_encoding = "gzip";
6778#endif
6779 } else if (type == detail::EncodingType::Brotli) {
6780#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_BROTLI_SUPPORT
6781 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::brotli_compressor>();
6782 content_encoding = "br";
6783#endif
6784 }
6785
6786 if (compressor) {
6787 std::string compressed;
6788 if (compressor->compress(res.body.data(), res.body.size(), true,
6789 [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
6790 compressed.append(data, data_len);
6791 return true;
6792 })) {
6793 res.body.swap(compressed);
6794 res.set_header("Content-Encoding", content_encoding);
6795 }
6796 }
6797 }
6798
6799 auto length = std::to_string(res.body.size());
6800 res.set_header("Content-Length", length);
6801 }
6802}
6803
6804inline bool Server::dispatch_request_for_content_reader(
6805 Request &req, Response &res, ContentReader content_reader,
6806 const HandlersForContentReader &handlers) const {
6807 for (const auto &x : handlers) {
6808 const auto &matcher = x.first;
6809 const auto &handler = x.second;
6810
6811 if (matcher->match(req)) {
6812 handler(req, res, content_reader);
6813 return true;
6814 }
6815 }
6816 return false;
6817}
6818
6819inline bool
6820Server::process_request(Stream &strm, bool close_connection,
6821 bool &connection_closed,
6822 const std::function<void(Request &)> &setup_request) {
6823 std::array<char, 2048> buf{};
6824
6825 detail::stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf.data(), buf.size());
6826
6827 // Connection has been closed on client
6828 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
6829
6830 Request req;
6831
6832 Response res;
6833 res.version = "HTTP/1.1";
6834 res.headers = default_headers_;
6835
6836#ifdef _WIN32
6837 // TODO: Increase FD_SETSIZE statically (libzmq), dynamically (MySQL).
6838#else
6839#ifndef CPPHTTPLIB_USE_POLL
6840 // Socket file descriptor exceeded FD_SETSIZE...
6841 if (strm.socket() >= FD_SETSIZE) {
6842 Headers dummy;
6843 detail::read_headers(strm, dummy);
6844 res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
6845 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6846 }
6847#endif
6848#endif
6849
6850 // Check if the request URI doesn't exceed the limit
6851 if (line_reader.size() > CPPHTTPLIB_REQUEST_URI_MAX_LENGTH) {
6852 Headers dummy;
6853 detail::read_headers(strm, dummy);
6854 res.status = StatusCode::UriTooLong_414;
6855 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6856 }
6857
6858 // Request line and headers
6859 if (!parse_request_line(line_reader.ptr(), req) ||
6860 !detail::read_headers(strm, req.headers)) {
6861 res.status = StatusCode::BadRequest_400;
6862 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6863 }
6864
6865 if (req.get_header_value("Connection") == "close") {
6866 connection_closed = true;
6867 }
6868
6869 if (req.version == "HTTP/1.0" &&
6870 req.get_header_value("Connection") != "Keep-Alive") {
6871 connection_closed = true;
6872 }
6873
6874 strm.get_remote_ip_and_port(req.remote_addr, req.remote_port);
6875 req.set_header("REMOTE_ADDR", req.remote_addr);
6876 req.set_header("REMOTE_PORT", std::to_string(req.remote_port));
6877
6878 strm.get_local_ip_and_port(req.local_addr, req.local_port);
6879 req.set_header("LOCAL_ADDR", req.local_addr);
6880 req.set_header("LOCAL_PORT", std::to_string(req.local_port));
6881
6882 if (req.has_header("Range")) {
6883 const auto &range_header_value = req.get_header_value("Range");
6884 if (!detail::parse_range_header(range_header_value, req.ranges)) {
6885 res.status = StatusCode::RangeNotSatisfiable_416;
6886 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6887 }
6888 }
6889
6890 if (setup_request) { setup_request(req); }
6891
6892 if (req.get_header_value("Expect") == "100-continue") {
6893 int status = StatusCode::Continue_100;
6894 if (expect_100_continue_handler_) {
6895 status = expect_100_continue_handler_(req, res);
6896 }
6897 switch (status) {
6898 case StatusCode::Continue_100:
6899 case StatusCode::ExpectationFailed_417:
6900 strm.write_format("HTTP/1.1 %d %s\r\n\r\n", status,
6901 status_message(status));
6902 break;
6903 default: return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6904 }
6905 }
6906
6907 // Routing
6908 auto routed = false;
6909#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_EXCEPTIONS
6910 routed = routing(req, res, strm);
6911#else
6912 try {
6913 routed = routing(req, res, strm);
6914 } catch (std::exception &e) {
6915 if (exception_handler_) {
6916 auto ep = std::current_exception();
6917 exception_handler_(req, res, ep);
6918 routed = true;
6919 } else {
6920 res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
6921 std::string val;
6922 auto s = e.what();
6923 for (size_t i = 0; s[i]; i++) {
6924 switch (s[i]) {
6925 case '\r': val += "\\r"; break;
6926 case '\n': val += "\\n"; break;
6927 default: val += s[i]; break;
6928 }
6929 }
6930 res.set_header("EXCEPTION_WHAT", val);
6931 }
6932 } catch (...) {
6933 if (exception_handler_) {
6934 auto ep = std::current_exception();
6935 exception_handler_(req, res, ep);
6936 routed = true;
6937 } else {
6938 res.status = StatusCode::InternalServerError_500;
6939 res.set_header("EXCEPTION_WHAT", "UNKNOWN");
6940 }
6941 }
6942#endif
6943 if (routed) {
6944 if (res.status == -1) {
6945 res.status = req.ranges.empty() ? StatusCode::OK_200
6946 : StatusCode::PartialContent_206;
6947 }
6948
6949 if (detail::range_error(req, res)) {
6950 res.body.clear();
6951 res.content_length_ = 0;
6952 res.content_provider_ = nullptr;
6953 res.status = StatusCode::RangeNotSatisfiable_416;
6954 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6955 }
6956
6957 return write_response_with_content(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6958 } else {
6959 if (res.status == -1) { res.status = StatusCode::NotFound_404; }
6960
6961 return write_response(strm, close_connection, req, res);
6962 }
6963}
6964
6965inline bool Server::is_valid() const { return true; }
6966
6967inline bool Server::process_and_close_socket(socket_t sock) {
6968 auto ret = detail::process_server_socket(
6969 svr_sock_, sock, keep_alive_max_count_, keep_alive_timeout_sec_,
6970 read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
6971 write_timeout_usec_,
6972 [this](Stream &strm, bool close_connection, bool &connection_closed) {
6973 return process_request(strm, close_connection, connection_closed,
6974 nullptr);
6975 });
6976
6977 detail::shutdown_socket(sock);
6978 detail::close_socket(sock);
6979 return ret;
6980}
6981
6982// HTTP client implementation
6983inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host)
6984 : ClientImpl(host, 80, std::string(), std::string()) {}
6985
6986inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port)
6987 : ClientImpl(host, port, std::string(), std::string()) {}
6988
6989inline ClientImpl::ClientImpl(const std::string &host, int port,
6990 const std::string &client_cert_path,
6991 const std::string &client_key_path)
6992 : host_(host), port_(port),
6993 host_and_port_(adjust_host_string(host) + ":" + std::to_string(port)),
6994 client_cert_path_(client_cert_path), client_key_path_(client_key_path) {}
6995
6996inline ClientImpl::~ClientImpl() {
6997 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
6998 shutdown_socket(socket_);
6999 close_socket(socket_);
7000}
7001
7002inline bool ClientImpl::is_valid() const { return true; }
7003
7004inline void ClientImpl::copy_settings(const ClientImpl &rhs) {
7005 client_cert_path_ = rhs.client_cert_path_;
7006 client_key_path_ = rhs.client_key_path_;
7007 connection_timeout_sec_ = rhs.connection_timeout_sec_;
7008 read_timeout_sec_ = rhs.read_timeout_sec_;
7009 read_timeout_usec_ = rhs.read_timeout_usec_;
7010 write_timeout_sec_ = rhs.write_timeout_sec_;
7011 write_timeout_usec_ = rhs.write_timeout_usec_;
7012 basic_auth_username_ = rhs.basic_auth_username_;
7013 basic_auth_password_ = rhs.basic_auth_password_;
7014 bearer_token_auth_token_ = rhs.bearer_token_auth_token_;
7015#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7016 digest_auth_username_ = rhs.digest_auth_username_;
7017 digest_auth_password_ = rhs.digest_auth_password_;
7018#endif
7019 keep_alive_ = rhs.keep_alive_;
7020 follow_location_ = rhs.follow_location_;
7021 url_encode_ = rhs.url_encode_;
7022 address_family_ = rhs.address_family_;
7023 tcp_nodelay_ = rhs.tcp_nodelay_;
7024 socket_options_ = rhs.socket_options_;
7025 compress_ = rhs.compress_;
7026 decompress_ = rhs.decompress_;
7027 interface_ = rhs.interface_;
7028 proxy_host_ = rhs.proxy_host_;
7029 proxy_port_ = rhs.proxy_port_;
7030 proxy_basic_auth_username_ = rhs.proxy_basic_auth_username_;
7031 proxy_basic_auth_password_ = rhs.proxy_basic_auth_password_;
7032 proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_ = rhs.proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_;
7033#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7034 proxy_digest_auth_username_ = rhs.proxy_digest_auth_username_;
7035 proxy_digest_auth_password_ = rhs.proxy_digest_auth_password_;
7036#endif
7037#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7038 ca_cert_file_path_ = rhs.ca_cert_file_path_;
7039 ca_cert_dir_path_ = rhs.ca_cert_dir_path_;
7040 ca_cert_store_ = rhs.ca_cert_store_;
7041#endif
7042#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7043 server_certificate_verification_ = rhs.server_certificate_verification_;
7044#endif
7045 logger_ = rhs.logger_;
7046}
7047
7048inline socket_t ClientImpl::create_client_socket(Error &error) const {
7049 if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
7050 return detail::create_client_socket(
7051 proxy_host_, std::string(), proxy_port_, address_family_, tcp_nodelay_,
7052 socket_options_, connection_timeout_sec_, connection_timeout_usec_,
7053 read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
7054 write_timeout_usec_, interface_, error);
7055 }
7056
7057 // Check is custom IP specified for host_
7058 std::string ip;
7059 auto it = addr_map_.find(host_);
7060 if (it != addr_map_.end()) { ip = it->second; }
7061
7062 return detail::create_client_socket(
7063 host_, ip, port_, address_family_, tcp_nodelay_, socket_options_,
7064 connection_timeout_sec_, connection_timeout_usec_, read_timeout_sec_,
7065 read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_, write_timeout_usec_, interface_,
7066 error);
7067}
7068
7069inline bool ClientImpl::create_and_connect_socket(Socket &socket,
7070 Error &error) {
7071 auto sock = create_client_socket(error);
7072 if (sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return false; }
7073 socket.sock = sock;
7074 return true;
7075}
7076
7077inline void ClientImpl::shutdown_ssl(Socket & /*socket*/,
7078 bool /*shutdown_gracefully*/) {
7079 // If there are any requests in flight from threads other than us, then it's
7080 // a thread-unsafe race because individual ssl* objects are not thread-safe.
7081 assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0 ||
7082 socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
7083}
7084
7085inline void ClientImpl::shutdown_socket(Socket &socket) const {
7086 if (socket.sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return; }
7087 detail::shutdown_socket(socket.sock);
7088}
7089
7090inline void ClientImpl::close_socket(Socket &socket) {
7091 // If there are requests in flight in another thread, usually closing
7092 // the socket will be fine and they will simply receive an error when
7093 // using the closed socket, but it is still a bug since rarely the OS
7094 // may reassign the socket id to be used for a new socket, and then
7095 // suddenly they will be operating on a live socket that is different
7096 // than the one they intended!
7097 assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0 ||
7098 socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
7099
7100 // It is also a bug if this happens while SSL is still active
7101#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7102 assert(socket.ssl == nullptr);
7103#endif
7104 if (socket.sock == INVALID_SOCKET) { return; }
7105 detail::close_socket(socket.sock);
7106 socket.sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
7107}
7108
7109inline bool ClientImpl::read_response_line(Stream &strm, const Request &req,
7110 Response &res) const {
7111 std::array<char, 2048> buf{};
7112
7113 detail::stream_line_reader line_reader(strm, buf.data(), buf.size());
7114
7115 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; }
7116
7117#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ALLOW_LF_AS_LINE_TERMINATOR
7118 const static std::regex re("(HTTP/1\\.[01]) (\\d{3})(?: (.*?))?\r?\n");
7119#else
7120 const static std::regex re("(HTTP/1\\.[01]) (\\d{3})(?: (.*?))?\r\n");
7121#endif
7122
7123 std::cmatch m;
7124 if (!std::regex_match(line_reader.ptr(), m, re)) {
7125 return req.method == "CONNECT";
7126 }
7127 res.version = std::string(m[1]);
7128 res.status = std::stoi(std::string(m[2]));
7129 res.reason = std::string(m[3]);
7130
7131 // Ignore '100 Continue'
7132 while (res.status == StatusCode::Continue_100) {
7133 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; } // CRLF
7134 if (!line_reader.getline()) { return false; } // next response line
7135
7136 if (!std::regex_match(line_reader.ptr(), m, re)) { return false; }
7137 res.version = std::string(m[1]);
7138 res.status = std::stoi(std::string(m[2]));
7139 res.reason = std::string(m[3]);
7140 }
7141
7142 return true;
7143}
7144
7145inline bool ClientImpl::send(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
7146 std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> request_mutex_guard(request_mutex_);
7147 auto ret = send_(req, res, error);
7148 if (error == Error::SSLPeerCouldBeClosed_) {
7149 assert(!ret);
7150 ret = send_(req, res, error);
7151 }
7152 return ret;
7153}
7154
7155inline bool ClientImpl::send_(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
7156 {
7157 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
7158
7159 // Set this to false immediately - if it ever gets set to true by the end of
7160 // the request, we know another thread instructed us to close the socket.
7161 socket_should_be_closed_when_request_is_done_ = false;
7162
7163 auto is_alive = false;
7164 if (socket_.is_open()) {
7165 is_alive = detail::is_socket_alive(socket_.sock);
7166 if (!is_alive) {
7167 // Attempt to avoid sigpipe by shutting down nongracefully if it seems
7168 // like the other side has already closed the connection Also, there
7169 // cannot be any requests in flight from other threads since we locked
7170 // request_mutex_, so safe to close everything immediately
7171 const bool shutdown_gracefully = false;
7172 shutdown_ssl(socket_, shutdown_gracefully);
7173 shutdown_socket(socket_);
7174 close_socket(socket_);
7175 }
7176 }
7177
7178 if (!is_alive) {
7179 if (!create_and_connect_socket(socket_, error)) { return false; }
7180
7181#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7182 // TODO: refactoring
7183 if (is_ssl()) {
7184 auto &scli = static_cast<SSLClient &>(*this);
7185 if (!proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
7186 auto success = false;
7187 if (!scli.connect_with_proxy(socket_, res, success, error)) {
7188 return success;
7189 }
7190 }
7191
7192 if (!scli.initialize_ssl(socket_, error)) { return false; }
7193 }
7194#endif
7195 }
7196
7197 // Mark the current socket as being in use so that it cannot be closed by
7198 // anyone else while this request is ongoing, even though we will be
7199 // releasing the mutex.
7200 if (socket_requests_in_flight_ > 1) {
7201 assert(socket_requests_are_from_thread_ == std::this_thread::get_id());
7202 }
7203 socket_requests_in_flight_ += 1;
7204 socket_requests_are_from_thread_ = std::this_thread::get_id();
7205 }
7206
7207 for (const auto &header : default_headers_) {
7208 if (req.headers.find(header.first) == req.headers.end()) {
7209 req.headers.insert(header);
7210 }
7211 }
7212
7213 auto ret = false;
7214 auto close_connection = !keep_alive_;
7215
7216 auto se = detail::scope_exit([&]() {
7217 // Briefly lock mutex in order to mark that a request is no longer ongoing
7218 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
7219 socket_requests_in_flight_ -= 1;
7220 if (socket_requests_in_flight_ <= 0) {
7221 assert(socket_requests_in_flight_ == 0);
7222 socket_requests_are_from_thread_ = std::thread::id();
7223 }
7224
7225 if (socket_should_be_closed_when_request_is_done_ || close_connection ||
7226 !ret) {
7227 shutdown_ssl(socket_, true);
7228 shutdown_socket(socket_);
7229 close_socket(socket_);
7230 }
7231 });
7232
7233 ret = process_socket(socket_, [&](Stream &strm) {
7234 return handle_request(strm, req, res, close_connection, error);
7235 });
7236
7237 if (!ret) {
7238 if (error == Error::Success) { error = Error::Unknown; }
7239 }
7240
7241 return ret;
7242}
7243
7244inline Result ClientImpl::send(const Request &req) {
7245 auto req2 = req;
7246 return send_(std::move(req2));
7247}
7248
7249inline Result ClientImpl::send_(Request &&req) {
7250 auto res = detail::make_unique<Response>();
7251 auto error = Error::Success;
7252 auto ret = send(req, *res, error);
7253 return Result{ret ? std::move(res) : nullptr, error, std::move(req.headers)};
7254}
7255
7256inline bool ClientImpl::handle_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
7257 Response &res, bool close_connection,
7258 Error &error) {
7259 if (req.path.empty()) {
7260 error = Error::Connection;
7261 return false;
7262 }
7263
7264 auto req_save = req;
7265
7266 bool ret;
7267
7268 if (!is_ssl() && !proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1) {
7269 auto req2 = req;
7270 req2.path = "http://" + host_and_port_ + req.path;
7271 ret = process_request(strm, req2, res, close_connection, error);
7272 req = req2;
7273 req.path = req_save.path;
7274 } else {
7275 ret = process_request(strm, req, res, close_connection, error);
7276 }
7277
7278 if (!ret) { return false; }
7279
7280 if (res.get_header_value("Connection") == "close" ||
7281 (res.version == "HTTP/1.0" && res.reason != "Connection established")) {
7282 // TODO this requires a not-entirely-obvious chain of calls to be correct
7283 // for this to be safe.
7284
7285 // This is safe to call because handle_request is only called by send_
7286 // which locks the request mutex during the process. It would be a bug
7287 // to call it from a different thread since it's a thread-safety issue
7288 // to do these things to the socket if another thread is using the socket.
7289 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(socket_mutex_);
7290 shutdown_ssl(socket_, true);
7291 shutdown_socket(socket_);
7292 close_socket(socket_);
7293 }
7294
7295 if (300 < res.status && res.status < 400 && follow_location_) {
7296 req = req_save;
7297 ret = redirect(req, res, error);
7298 }
7299
7300#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7301 if ((res.status == StatusCode::Unauthorized_401 ||
7302 res.status == StatusCode::ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407) &&
7303 req.authorization_count_ < 5) {
7304 auto is_proxy = res.status == StatusCode::ProxyAuthenticationRequired_407;
7305 const auto &username =
7306 is_proxy ? proxy_digest_auth_username_ : digest_auth_username_;
7307 const auto &password =
7308 is_proxy ? proxy_digest_auth_password_ : digest_auth_password_;
7309
7310 if (!username.empty() && !password.empty()) {
7311 std::map<std::string, std::string> auth;
7312 if (detail::parse_www_authenticate(res, auth, is_proxy)) {
7313 Request new_req = req;
7314 new_req.authorization_count_ += 1;
7315 new_req.headers.erase(is_proxy ? "Proxy-Authorization"
7316 : "Authorization");
7317 new_req.headers.insert(detail::make_digest_authentication_header(
7318 req, auth, new_req.authorization_count_, detail::random_string(10),
7319 username, password, is_proxy));
7320
7321 Response new_res;
7322
7323 ret = send(new_req, new_res, error);
7324 if (ret) { res = new_res; }
7325 }
7326 }
7327 }
7328#endif
7329
7330 return ret;
7331}
7332
7333inline bool ClientImpl::redirect(Request &req, Response &res, Error &error) {
7334 if (req.redirect_count_ == 0) {
7335 error = Error::ExceedRedirectCount;
7336 return false;
7337 }
7338
7339 auto location = res.get_header_value("location");
7340 if (location.empty()) { return false; }
7341
7342 const static std::regex re(
7343 R"((?:(https?):)?(?://(?:\[([a-fA-F\d:]+)\]|([^:/?#]+))(?::(\d+))?)?([^?#]*)(\?[^#]*)?(?:#.*)?)");
7344
7345 std::smatch m;
7346 if (!std::regex_match(location, m, re)) { return false; }
7347
7348 auto scheme = is_ssl() ? "https" : "http";
7349
7350 auto next_scheme = m[1].str();
7351 auto next_host = m[2].str();
7352 if (next_host.empty()) { next_host = m[3].str(); }
7353 auto port_str = m[4].str();
7354 auto next_path = m[5].str();
7355 auto next_query = m[6].str();
7356
7357 auto next_port = port_;
7358 if (!port_str.empty()) {
7359 next_port = std::stoi(port_str);
7360 } else if (!next_scheme.empty()) {
7361 next_port = next_scheme == "https" ? 443 : 80;
7362 }
7363
7364 if (next_scheme.empty()) { next_scheme = scheme; }
7365 if (next_host.empty()) { next_host = host_; }
7366 if (next_path.empty()) { next_path = "/"; }
7367
7368 auto path = detail::decode_url(next_path, true) + next_query;
7369
7370 if (next_scheme == scheme && next_host == host_ && next_port == port_) {
7371 return detail::redirect(*this, req, res, path, location, error);
7372 } else {
7373 if (next_scheme == "https") {
7374#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7375 SSLClient cli(next_host, next_port);
7376 cli.copy_settings(*this);
7377 if (ca_cert_store_) { cli.set_ca_cert_store(ca_cert_store_); }
7378 return detail::redirect(cli, req, res, path, location, error);
7379#else
7380 return false;
7381#endif
7382 } else {
7383 ClientImpl cli(next_host, next_port);
7384 cli.copy_settings(*this);
7385 return detail::redirect(cli, req, res, path, location, error);
7386 }
7387 }
7388}
7389
7390inline bool ClientImpl::write_content_with_provider(Stream &strm,
7391 const Request &req,
7392 Error &error) const {
7393 auto is_shutting_down = []() { return false; };
7394
7395 if (req.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
7396 // TODO: Brotli support
7397 std::unique_ptr<detail::compressor> compressor;
7398#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
7399 if (compress_) {
7400 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::gzip_compressor>();
7401 } else
7402#endif
7403 {
7404 compressor = detail::make_unique<detail::nocompressor>();
7405 }
7406
7407 return detail::write_content_chunked(strm, req.content_provider_,
7408 is_shutting_down, *compressor, error);
7409 } else {
7410 return detail::write_content(strm, req.content_provider_, 0,
7411 req.content_length_, is_shutting_down, error);
7412 }
7413}
7414
7415inline bool ClientImpl::write_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
7416 bool close_connection, Error &error) {
7417 // Prepare additional headers
7418 if (close_connection) {
7419 if (!req.has_header("Connection")) {
7420 req.set_header("Connection", "close");
7421 }
7422 }
7423
7424 if (!req.has_header("Host")) {
7425 if (is_ssl()) {
7426 if (port_ == 443) {
7427 req.set_header("Host", host_);
7428 } else {
7429 req.set_header("Host", host_and_port_);
7430 }
7431 } else {
7432 if (port_ == 80) {
7433 req.set_header("Host", host_);
7434 } else {
7435 req.set_header("Host", host_and_port_);
7436 }
7437 }
7438 }
7439
7440 if (!req.has_header("Accept")) { req.set_header("Accept", "*/*"); }
7441
7442#ifndef CPPHTTPLIB_NO_DEFAULT_USER_AGENT
7443 if (!req.has_header("User-Agent")) {
7444 auto agent = std::string("cpp-httplib/") + CPPHTTPLIB_VERSION;
7445 req.set_header("User-Agent", agent);
7446 }
7447#endif
7448
7449 if (req.body.empty()) {
7450 if (req.content_provider_) {
7451 if (!req.is_chunked_content_provider_) {
7452 if (!req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
7453 auto length = std::to_string(req.content_length_);
7454 req.set_header("Content-Length", length);
7455 }
7456 }
7457 } else {
7458 if (req.method == "POST" || req.method == "PUT" ||
7459 req.method == "PATCH") {
7460 req.set_header("Content-Length", "0");
7461 }
7462 }
7463 } else {
7464 if (!req.has_header("Content-Type")) {
7465 req.set_header("Content-Type", "text/plain");
7466 }
7467
7468 if (!req.has_header("Content-Length")) {
7469 auto length = std::to_string(req.body.size());
7470 req.set_header("Content-Length", length);
7471 }
7472 }
7473
7474 if (!basic_auth_password_.empty() || !basic_auth_username_.empty()) {
7475 if (!req.has_header("Authorization")) {
7476 req.headers.insert(make_basic_authentication_header(
7477 basic_auth_username_, basic_auth_password_, false));
7478 }
7479 }
7480
7481 if (!proxy_basic_auth_username_.empty() &&
7482 !proxy_basic_auth_password_.empty()) {
7483 if (!req.has_header("Proxy-Authorization")) {
7484 req.headers.insert(make_basic_authentication_header(
7485 proxy_basic_auth_username_, proxy_basic_auth_password_, true));
7486 }
7487 }
7488
7489 if (!bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
7490 if (!req.has_header("Authorization")) {
7491 req.headers.insert(make_bearer_token_authentication_header(
7492 bearer_token_auth_token_, false));
7493 }
7494 }
7495
7496 if (!proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_.empty()) {
7497 if (!req.has_header("Proxy-Authorization")) {
7498 req.headers.insert(make_bearer_token_authentication_header(
7499 proxy_bearer_token_auth_token_, true));
7500 }
7501 }
7502
7503 // Request line and headers
7504 {
7505 detail::BufferStream bstrm;
7506
7507 const auto &path = url_encode_ ? detail::encode_url(req.path) : req.path;
7508 bstrm.write_format("%s %s HTTP/1.1\r\n", req.method.c_str(), path.c_str());
7509
7510 header_writer_(bstrm, req.headers);
7511
7512 // Flush buffer
7513 auto &data = bstrm.get_buffer();
7514 if (!detail::write_data(strm, data.data(), data.size())) {
7515 error = Error::Write;
7516 return false;
7517 }
7518 }
7519
7520 // Body
7521 if (req.body.empty()) {
7522 return write_content_with_provider(strm, req, error);
7523 }
7524
7525 if (!detail::write_data(strm, req.body.data(), req.body.size())) {
7526 error = Error::Write;
7527 return false;
7528 }
7529
7530 return true;
7531}
7532
7533inline std::unique_ptr<Response> ClientImpl::send_with_content_provider(
7534 Request &req, const char *body, size_t content_length,
7535 ContentProvider content_provider,
7536 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
7537 const std::string &content_type, Error &error) {
7538 if (!content_type.empty()) { req.set_header("Content-Type", content_type); }
7539
7540#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
7541 if (compress_) { req.set_header("Content-Encoding", "gzip"); }
7542#endif
7543
7544#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_ZLIB_SUPPORT
7545 if (compress_ && !content_provider_without_length) {
7546 // TODO: Brotli support
7547 detail::gzip_compressor compressor;
7548
7549 if (content_provider) {
7550 auto ok = true;
7551 size_t offset = 0;
7552 DataSink data_sink;
7553
7554 data_sink.write = [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) -> bool {
7555 if (ok) {
7556 auto last = offset + data_len == content_length;
7557
7558 auto ret = compressor.compress(
7559 data, data_len, last,
7560 [&](const char *compressed_data, size_t compressed_data_len) {
7561 req.body.append(compressed_data, compressed_data_len);
7562 return true;
7563 });
7564
7565 if (ret) {
7566 offset += data_len;
7567 } else {
7568 ok = false;
7569 }
7570 }
7571 return ok;
7572 };
7573
7574 while (ok && offset < content_length) {
7575 if (!content_provider(offset, content_length - offset, data_sink)) {
7576 error = Error::Canceled;
7577 return nullptr;
7578 }
7579 }
7580 } else {
7581 if (!compressor.compress(body, content_length, true,
7582 [&](const char *data, size_t data_len) {
7583 req.body.append(data, data_len);
7584 return true;
7585 })) {
7586 error = Error::Compression;
7587 return nullptr;
7588 }
7589 }
7590 } else
7591#endif
7592 {
7593 if (content_provider) {
7594 req.content_length_ = content_length;
7595 req.content_provider_ = std::move(content_provider);
7596 req.is_chunked_content_provider_ = false;
7597 } else if (content_provider_without_length) {
7598 req.content_length_ = 0;
7599 req.content_provider_ = detail::ContentProviderAdapter(
7600 std::move(content_provider_without_length));
7601 req.is_chunked_content_provider_ = true;
7602 req.set_header("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked");
7603 } else {
7604 req.body.assign(body, content_length);
7605 }
7606 }
7607
7608 auto res = detail::make_unique<Response>();
7609 return send(req, *res, error) ? std::move(res) : nullptr;
7610}
7611
7612inline Result ClientImpl::send_with_content_provider(
7613 const std::string &method, const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7614 const char *body, size_t content_length, ContentProvider content_provider,
7615 ContentProviderWithoutLength content_provider_without_length,
7616 const std::string &content_type, Progress progress) {
7617 Request req;
7618 req.method = method;
7619 req.headers = headers;
7620 req.path = path;
7621 req.progress = progress;
7622
7623 auto error = Error::Success;
7624
7625 auto res = send_with_content_provider(
7626 req, body, content_length, std::move(content_provider),
7627 std::move(content_provider_without_length), content_type, error);
7628
7629 return Result{std::move(res), error, std::move(req.headers)};
7630}
7631
7632inline std::string
7633ClientImpl::adjust_host_string(const std::string &host) const {
7634 if (host.find(':') != std::string::npos) { return "[" + host + "]"; }
7635 return host;
7636}
7637
7638inline bool ClientImpl::process_request(Stream &strm, Request &req,
7639 Response &res, bool close_connection,
7640 Error &error) {
7641 // Send request
7642 if (!write_request(strm, req, close_connection, error)) { return false; }
7643
7644#ifdef CPPHTTPLIB_OPENSSL_SUPPORT
7645 if (is_ssl()) {
7646 auto is_proxy_enabled = !proxy_host_.empty() && proxy_port_ != -1;
7647 if (!is_proxy_enabled) {
7648 char buf[1];
7649 if (SSL_peek(socket_.ssl, buf, 1) == 0 &&
7650 SSL_get_error(socket_.ssl, 0) == SSL_ERROR_ZERO_RETURN) {
7651 error = Error::SSLPeerCouldBeClosed_;
7652 return false;
7653 }
7654 }
7655 }
7656#endif
7657
7658 // Receive response and headers
7659 if (!read_response_line(strm, req, res) ||
7660 !detail::read_headers(strm, res.headers)) {
7661 error = Error::Read;
7662 return false;
7663 }
7664
7665 // Body
7666 if ((res.status != StatusCode::NoContent_204) && req.method != "HEAD" &&
7667 req.method != "CONNECT") {
7668 auto redirect = 300 < res.status && res.status < 400 && follow_location_;
7669
7670 if (req.response_handler && !redirect) {
7671 if (!req.response_handler(res)) {
7672 error = Error::Canceled;
7673 return false;
7674 }
7675 }
7676
7677 auto out =
7678 req.content_receiver
7679 ? static_cast<ContentReceiverWithProgress>(
7680 [&](const char *buf, size_t n, uint64_t off, uint64_t len) {
7681 if (redirect) { return true; }
7682 auto ret = req.content_receiver(buf, n, off, len);
7683 if (!ret) { error = Error::Canceled; }
7684 return ret;
7685 })
7686 : static_cast<ContentReceiverWithProgress>(
7687 [&](const char *buf, size_t n, uint64_t /*off*/,
7688 uint64_t /*len*/) {
7689 if (res.body.size() + n > res.body.max_size()) {
7690 return false;
7691 }
7692 res.body.append(buf, n);
7693 return true;
7694 });
7695
7696 auto progress = [&](uint64_t current, uint64_t total) {
7697 if (!req.progress || redirect) { return true; }
7698 auto ret = req.progress(current, total);
7699 if (!ret) { error = Error::Canceled; }
7700 return ret;
7701 };
7702
7703 int dummy_status;
7704 if (!detail::read_content(strm, res, (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)(),
7705 dummy_status, std::move(progress), std::move(out),
7706 decompress_)) {
7707 if (error != Error::Canceled) { error = Error::Read; }
7708 return false;
7709 }
7710 }
7711
7712 // Log
7713 if (logger_) { logger_(req, res); }
7714
7715 return true;
7716}
7717
7718inline ContentProviderWithoutLength ClientImpl::get_multipart_content_provider(
7719 const std::string &boundary, const MultipartFormDataItems &items,
7720 const MultipartFormDataProviderItems &provider_items) const {
7721 size_t cur_item = 0;
7722 size_t cur_start = 0;
7723 // cur_item and cur_start are copied to within the std::function and maintain
7724 // state between successive calls
7725 return [&, cur_item, cur_start](size_t offset,
7726 DataSink &sink) mutable -> bool {
7727 if (!offset && !items.empty()) {
7728 sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata(items, boundary, false);
7729 return true;
7730 } else if (cur_item < provider_items.size()) {
7731 if (!cur_start) {
7732 const auto &begin = detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_item_begin(
7733 provider_items[cur_item], boundary);
7734 offset += begin.size();
7735 cur_start = offset;
7736 sink.os << begin;
7737 }
7738
7739 DataSink cur_sink;
7740 auto has_data = true;
7741 cur_sink.write = sink.write;
7742 cur_sink.done = [&]() { has_data = false; };
7743
7744 if (!provider_items[cur_item].provider(offset - cur_start, cur_sink)) {
7745 return false;
7746 }
7747
7748 if (!has_data) {
7749 sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_item_end();
7750 cur_item++;
7751 cur_start = 0;
7752 }
7753 return true;
7754 } else {
7755 sink.os << detail::serialize_multipart_formdata_finish(boundary);
7756 sink.done();
7757 return true;
7758 }
7759 };
7760}
7761
7762inline bool
7763ClientImpl::process_socket(const Socket &socket,
7764 std::function<bool(Stream &strm)> callback) {
7765 return detail::process_client_socket(
7766 socket.sock, read_timeout_sec_, read_timeout_usec_, write_timeout_sec_,
7767 write_timeout_usec_, std::move(callback));
7768}
7769
7770inline bool ClientImpl::is_ssl() const { return false; }
7771
7772inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path) {
7773 return Get(path, Headers(), Progress());
7774}
7775
7776inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, Progress progress) {
7777 return Get(path, Headers(), std::move(progress));
7778}
7779
7780inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers) {
7781 return Get(path, headers, Progress());
7782}
7783
7784inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7785 Progress progress) {
7786 Request req;
7787 req.method = "GET";
7788 req.path = path;
7789 req.headers = headers;
7790 req.progress = std::move(progress);
7791
7792 return send_(std::move(req));
7793}
7794
7795inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
7796 ContentReceiver content_receiver) {
7797 return Get(path, Headers(), nullptr, std::move(content_receiver), nullptr);
7798}
7799
7800inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
7801 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7802 Progress progress) {
7803 return Get(path, Headers(), nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
7804 std::move(progress));
7805}
7806
7807inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7808 ContentReceiver content_receiver) {
7809 return Get(path, headers, nullptr, std::move(content_receiver), nullptr);
7810}
7811
7812inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7813 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7814 Progress progress) {
7815 return Get(path, headers, nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
7816 std::move(progress));
7817}
7818
7819inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
7820 ResponseHandler response_handler,
7821 ContentReceiver content_receiver) {
7822 return Get(path, Headers(), std::move(response_handler),
7823 std::move(content_receiver), nullptr);
7824}
7825
7826inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7827 ResponseHandler response_handler,
7828 ContentReceiver content_receiver) {
7829 return Get(path, headers, std::move(response_handler),
7830 std::move(content_receiver), nullptr);
7831}
7832
7833inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path,
7834 ResponseHandler response_handler,
7835 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7836 Progress progress) {
7837 return Get(path, Headers(), std::move(response_handler),
7838 std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
7839}
7840
7841inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7842 ResponseHandler response_handler,
7843 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7844 Progress progress) {
7845 Request req;
7846 req.method = "GET";
7847 req.path = path;
7848 req.headers = headers;
7849 req.response_handler = std::move(response_handler);
7850 req.content_receiver =
7851 [content_receiver](const char *data, size_t data_length,
7852 uint64_t /*offset*/, uint64_t /*total_length*/) {
7853 return content_receiver(data, data_length);
7854 };
7855 req.progress = std::move(progress);
7856
7857 return send_(std::move(req));
7858}
7859
7860inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
7861 const Headers &headers, Progress progress) {
7862 if (params.empty()) { return Get(path, headers); }
7863
7864 std::string path_with_query = append_query_params(path, params);
7865 return Get(path_with_query, headers, std::move(progress));
7866}
7867
7868inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
7869 const Headers &headers,
7870 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7871 Progress progress) {
7872 return Get(path, params, headers, nullptr, std::move(content_receiver),
7873 std::move(progress));
7874}
7875
7876inline Result ClientImpl::Get(const std::string &path, const Params &params,
7877 const Headers &headers,
7878 ResponseHandler response_handler,
7879 ContentReceiver content_receiver,
7880 Progress progress) {
7881 if (params.empty()) {
7882 return Get(path, headers, std::move(response_handler),
7883 std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
7884 }
7885
7886 std::string path_with_query = append_query_params(path, params);
7887 return Get(path_with_query, headers, std::move(response_handler),
7888 std::move(content_receiver), std::move(progress));
7889}
7890
7891inline Result ClientImpl::Head(const std::string &path) {
7892 return Head(path, Headers());
7893}
7894
7895inline Result ClientImpl::Head(const std::string &path,
7896 const Headers &headers) {
7897 Request req;
7898 req.method = "HEAD";
7899 req.headers = headers;
7900 req.path = path;
7901
7902 return send_(std::move(req));
7903}
7904
7905inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path) {
7906 return Post(path, std::string(), std::string());
7907}
7908
7909inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path,
7910 const Headers &headers) {
7911 return Post(path, headers, nullptr, 0, std::string());
7912}
7913
7914inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const char *body,
7915 size_t content_length,
7916 const std::string &content_type) {
7917 return Post(path, Headers(), body, content_length, content_type, nullptr);
7918}
7919
7920inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7921 const char *body, size_t content_length,
7922 const std::string &content_type) {
7923 return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body, content_length,
7924 nullptr, nullptr, content_type, nullptr);
7925}
7926
7927inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7928 const char *body, size_t content_length,
7929 const std::string &content_type,
7930 Progress progress) {
7931 return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body, content_length,
7932 nullptr, nullptr, content_type, progress);
7933}
7934
7935inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
7936 const std::string &content_type) {
7937 return Post(path, Headers(), body, content_type);
7938}
7939
7940inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const std::string &body,
7941 const std::string &content_type,
7942 Progress progress) {
7943 return Post(path, Headers(), body, content_type, progress);
7944}
7945
7946inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7947 const std::string &body,
7948 const std::string &content_type) {
7949 return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body.data(),
7950 body.size(), nullptr, nullptr, content_type,
7951 nullptr);
7952}
7953
7954inline Result ClientImpl::Post(const std::string &path, const Headers &headers,
7955 const std::string &body,
7956 const std::string &content_type,
7957 Progress progress) {
7958 return send_with_content_provider("POST", path, headers, body.data(),
7959 body.size(), nullptr, nullptr, content_type,
7960 progress);
7961}
